111222222221.content:
Mikoto Uchiha sighed, her thoughts drifting to her best-friend-to-the-point-of-sisterhood-in-all-but-blood's only child again.

She just couldn't help but worry for Naruto. It was heartbreaking that most of the village would treat the boy as a pariah, all because of the Kyuubi sealed inside him. It was not his fault the Fourth sealed the Nine-Tails in him, for Naruto was only a baby at the time. She wanted to be there for him...if her friend couldn't do it, Mikoto would have to fill the gap in Naruto's life with enough love for both herself and Kushina.

Unfortunatly, she was barred from adopting him, and in all honesty, as much as it stung to even consider it, maybe it was for the best. Given Fugaku's plans, as well as the Uchiha's and the Kyubbi's history with one another (a large case in point being that madman Madara's showcasing his Sharingan hypnosis being used on the kitsuine way back when during his fight with the Shodai Hokage) it would only have ended poorly in one way or another if she tried giving Naruto a home and family by taking him in. Even if people didn't misinterpret why she would take him in, the bijū within him would have gone aboslutly rabbid for the ways the Uchiha wronged it in the past.

If that didn't happen, the rest of the Uchiha would have wanted to see Naruto weaponized. If Mikoto gave Naruto the kind of life he deserved, then he would have developed a sense of attachment to her that the rest of the Uchiha would have exploited. Worse case senarieo, they would have tried breaking the seal open...

Mikoto didn't want to see ANY of that happen to Naruto, so...no matter haw much she ached to...she couldn't be there for him—BUT DAMN DID IT HURT EVEN THINKING THAT WAY!

Those things aside, there was another major obsticale besides the Kyubbi's utter loathing for the Uchiha to factor into why she couldn't give Naruto a home, no matter how badly she'd wanted to. One that was an even bigger issue.

After all...she was married to it!

As for the coup? She didn't even WANT it to happen! If the Uchihas succeeded, they would plunge the village into a civil war. With the village weakened, enemy villages would have used the opportunity to destroy Konoha and kill everyone—the Uchiha included. She'd told Fugaku, but the stubborn fool wouldn't listen to reason.

But what could she do? The moment she was forced to marry Fugaku, Mikoto was forced to retire from active duty as a kunoichi. What was worse was that after Minato and Kushina's deaths, she'd lost good connections within the shinobi force as there were suspitions about the Uchiha, and the few remaining friends she had outside the clan lacked any good connections either. The Uchiha and their position as the villages' police force actually benifitted their plots of a take over since they were able to be watchful hawks within the system, thus they would have silenced anyone the moment they suspected someone was leaking information. To make matters worse, she knew the clan was staging a coup, but didn't know when, even if Fugaku was busy thinking up "inspiring speechs" to tell the rest of the Uchiha for when that day came, he'd been doing that since the Kyubbi attack and the Uchiha had started to be mistrusted.

Funny thing about that was the sheer irony of it. There was a saying: "The price of Uchiha pride must always be paid in blood, yet never their own'...the Uchiha utterly loathed that saying, but had never given much—if any—evedence to the contrary about it. Now the Uchiha wanted to set it in stone that their legacy was one of madness, megalomania, death and rebellion. And what person in their right minds would TRUST people like that?!

Her attention was pulled from contemplating her delima when she heard something from the direction of Naruto's apartment and lept up to an adjacent rooftop and looked to see what was going on. When she did, Mikoto's fists clench and shake with the knuckles turning white and her eyes turned red as her dojutsu activated unconsciously before changing.

What she saw made her blood turn to lava in her veins. Those...those...HOW DARE THEY?!

*****

"ENOUGH!" Mikoto shouted, leaping into the room, her declaration was accompanied by a giant, glowing, free-floating skeletal hand composed of a luminous, ruby quartz red-hued energy manifesting and grabbed the woman that was forcing Naruto to kiss her on the butt in a vice grip and instantly crushed the bitch into a smear.

The other women shreaked in horror.

When Mikoto was an active ninja, they called her the Violet Killer. She was able to kill a large amount of people, without injury and without them knowing until it's too late. During the last shinobi war, Uchiha Mikoto single-handedly took out a Iwa garrison, didn't even have an injury...and the best part was, she refused to be awarded for the feat and even refused to be placed in Anbu. I think that was more shocking to the shinobi than the deed itself. Not that many people remembered her being a kunoichi surprisingly, she retired, became a housewife and basically as far as things went, disappeared for the most part.

Mikoto was so skilled, it was actually believed she had two Kekkei Genkai, the Sharingan and the ability to produce and control various types of poison. The types of poison could vary in strength and forms, which could be as simple as breathing out minor poison gas, or as complex as being concentrated and corrosive indigo-colored liquid produced directly out of their own body. Having a body that was completely covered in poison at will, any person who touched her would be poisoned. She alos had immunity from all poison as well. Mikoto even had full control of any poison she released, whether it be in liquid or gaseous form. Mikoto could simply poison someone by breathing or using a complex move.

In battle, Mikoto could even coat herself in liquid poison to serve as armor, preventing any opponent of easily landing any direct physical attack without getting poisoned in the process. Despite being coated, Mikoto had enough control to delicately handle small objects while in this state. And aside from lethal poison, Mikoto could produce different types of poison that affects the opponents' sensory, or dissolve them.

Those were only basic examples of how deadly the Violet Killer's poison was. There was a reason everyone feared being served anything by her or simply being near her. You never knew if you were about to die or not... and you wouldn't know until you were already in the grave.

"Shinigami Doku Ito no jutsu (Death god poison string jutsu)" Mikoto hissed, the other women in the room suddenly screamed as they were slashed into pieces by poisonus lines that were thin as hair, yet strong enough to cut through skin...yet in this case, the poison was burning through the ladies.

"Die." Mikoto said coldly, twitching her fingers. An instant later, the women all screamed as they were severed to pieces by the poison jutsu.

That done, Mikoto's eyes reverted to their normal black and she approched Naruto. Unsurprisingly, he shrank away from her, but she took his hands in hers and carefully removed the needles from the earlier torture before wrapping him in his blanket and hugging him.and using shunshin to arrive in a nearby safehouse.

After casting a sleep-inducing genjutsu on him, Mikoto sighed quietly as she cleaned up the safehouse, it was dusty, dirty and likely had not seen a soul since now. Still though, it served its purpose. Naruto was lying in a bed, resting.

Fortunately, since the safehouse fell into such disuse that no one else remembered it and if they did, would never consider checking it. She spent the next couple of hours, cleaning the place up and making it remotely livable, clecking on Naruto every now and then.

Once she was done, Mikoto nodded to herself. Now she just had to wait for Naruto to wake up, as she did, she made up her mind about something.

The red haired woman sneered and tightened her grip to where soon a loud sickening crunch was heard.

The 13 year old boy fell limp as the superhuman grip had literally crushed his windpipe, causing instant death. His eyes frozen over in terror forever.

Naruto was watching in shock and hope. This woman had killed the one who had been hurting him. His hurting soul began to ease up a bit at the realization he would be saved.

The rest of the once cheering crowd were frozen in terror. None of them even could move, they were literally petrified in fear of the red haired woman.

The girl shrieks hysterically, "NOOOOOOO PLEASE DON'T KILL ME! MOMMY HELP ME!" she quickly turned and made a run for it.

The red haired woman smirked and did a handseal. "Kongō Fūsa!" From her back sprouted several golden colored chains with spikes on them and she shot them directly at the girl.

The girl ran trying to get to safety. Sadly the chains crossed the distance and several speared the girl through her vital organs. She fell instantly as multiple important organs were struck and she died by MOF or Multiple Organ Failure.

The red haired terror retracted her now blood coated chains from the corpse and turned her attention on the rest of the crowd. She performed a few handseals. A complex seal made the area glow red. Now no one would ever see what happens here not even the Hokage.

She gave the civilians a chilling smile that would scare Orochimaru and shot her chains at them.

The crowd of poor villagers never stood a chance as the chains quickly tore into them, tearing them to pieces in a way only a shinobi could decimate their foes. For this women was a formerly deceased kunoichi brought back by pure wrath and the thoughts of vengeance. As her body had been rotting in the ground for a few years now, she had to get a new one and she chose the body of another mature woman.

Naruto was just stunned by what he had witnessed. Despite all the horrible things that he had been through in his whole 4 years of life, Naruto had never seen death like this before.

The red haired woman retracted her chains seeing she had killed the entire group and walks towards Naruto.

Naruto was shaking scared. He was wondering if she was going to kill him next or do worse. He closed his eyes to not see the inevitable coming. He felt a soft touch on his hair.

"Its ok Naru-chan, you're safe now that I'm back." Her voice was loving and mother-like.

Naruto opened his eyes and sees the red haired woman kneeling before him with one hand caressing his hair like...a mother would. He opens his mouth to try and speak even though it would sound garbled due to his shattered teeth.

The red head put her other hand to his cheek and a soft green glow enveloped her hand.

Naruto also felt something warm in his stomach. An orange chakra was coating the inside of his mouth healing his shattered teeth and the woman's own chakra seemed to be helping. Soon Naruto's teeth were fully restored good as new.

Naruto was still too stunned to speak.

I will answer them, but not here....I was technically dead...So if any shinobi see me, they will think that I'm an imposter. Let's take this conversation somewhere private." Naruto tried to talk, but it wasn't possible with a broken jaw, so he nodded.

At that, Tekiya suddenly squealed, "Oh, but you're everything I ever wanted! Cute, sassy and a troublemaker!" Tekiya laughed and pinched his cheek as she cooed at him. "Yes you are! Such a cute little prize! I have JUST the place for you! It'll be just the two of us and I'll never use you up or never ever let you go!"

As Naruto was climbing, Jiri wakes up feeling her nose is itchy in her right nostril, so she carefully shifts her eyes from left to right and slowly she moves her index finger close to her right nostril and begins to pick her nose.

Naruto was still climbing until he felt Jiri's entire head shift again and the wall was now the floor, quickly getting to his bare feet, he then begins to run, until he sees the nostril was blocked and Naruto couldn't see anything and felt Jiri's nose was shaking like an earthquake, what he didn't know was that Jiri was picking her her nose to find the cause of what woke her up, as her finger was heading towards him.

Naruto didn't know what was causing this rumbling, but he knew it was coming from the entrance of the nostril and was coming for him!

So turning away from what was causing the rumbling, Naruto began to run, but with each step he felt like he was running through pudding as his bare feet kept getting stuck in the mucus, but he kept on going as he felt the rumbling getting closer to him.

And as he ran, Naruto suddenly tripped on something and before he knew it, something pinned him down face first into the mucus-covered floor and was now pulling him towards the nostril's entrance.

As she was picking her nose, Jiri felt like she got something and pulled out her index finger and brought it close to her eye to see what it was, and her eye widened at what she thought was a bug, and it was still MOVING!!!

"Eww! A icky, yucky bug was in my nose!" Jiri said disgusted to see a bug come out of her nose.

Naruto looked up at the young girl as she glared down at him with her big, green eyes. He gulped as she sniffed, her nose still bothering her. But as she shiffed in an attempt to breath, she accidentally suck him back up her nose.

After her shock of seeing the bug fly right back into her nose through her left nostril, Jiri stuck her finger up her nose to get it.

Looking behind him, Naruto yelped at the finger coming at him and climbed like crazy, faster than he knew he could. As Naruto reached the top of her nose where Jiri couldn't reach, he saw something. A kind of big, spiky, floating, puffy ball that didn't seem to belong there. There were a lot of them lodged into her nasal wall. But what were they doing in Jiri's nose? Going up to the nearest one, Naruto grabbed it and started carrying it out and when he got down far enough, he tossed the thing out of her nose, being sure it exited her body. After the last of the feeling bothering her since yesterday vanished, Jiri thought of how to get the bug out and came with an idea. She pressed her right index finger against the right side of her nose, inhaled through her mouth and blew very hard through the left side of her nose.

After Naruto got rid of the last of the pollen, he felt Jiri's nose rumbling again but before he could run, a tidal wave of mucus is heading his way as Jiri was attempting to get Naruto out of her nose again and swept him off his feet and he was sent tumbling. As he did, Jiri's finger quickly appeared behind him and pulled him back out of her nose and was now looking up at her.

After that, the little bug had been lots of fun to play with.

It made her so happy having it as her pet. And she enjoyed playing "house" with her as the mom and him as the baby like this!

"Time for you're num-nums!" she smiled, opening the applesauce, but then Jiri frowned. Her pet was too little for a spoon to fit. That wouldn't do. She thought for a moment, then remembered something and went ovet to the drawers and started looking through them.

"Here it is!" She held a small, miniture funnel between her fingers. This should work to help feed her pet. The funnel was 1 1/4" tall with a diameter of 3/4" at the top, while her bug was 1/16th to 1/8th of an inch tall.

"Alua...open wide!" she laughed, bringing the end of the tiny funnel towards her bug.

Naruto opened wide alright, open wide to scream at the sight of the funnel end coming towards him, as he thought Jiri was gonna stab him, until his mouth was covered (or stuffed) with the funnel's end.

Smiling, Jiri held the funnel steady and scooped out some of the applesauce and brought it to the wide end of it so she could feed her sweet bug.

Naruto gagged at the tube being put in his mouth and then he suddenly began to taste the applesauce and tried to swallow it, but it was coming into his mouth way too fast for him to swallow but he had no choice but to try and do so as Jiri could barley see him so he wouldn't be able to show her that he could't swallow the applesauce.

After what seemed like forever, but in truth it was only three minutes of being fed three or four scoops of the applesauce, Jiri finally pulled the funnel end back away from Naruto as he now laid on his back, in agony as his stomach now felt bloated. All he felt the stomachache from eating the applesauce too fast.

As he looked up to see Jiri eating the rest of the applesauce herself she smiled at him with affection, and he shivered at the smile, Naruto thinking that Jiri had n idea for some kind of torture for him to go through.

As Jiri finished feeding Naruto, she picked him up and held him close to her eye and he could swear he saw her eyes gain a heart shape in them.

That alone left him extremely terrified, since the last time a lady looked at him like that, he woke up in the hospital wrapped like a mummy.

Jiri picked her bug up and held Alua with her index finger and thumb, bringing her other index finger up and tickled him with the tip."Is baby's tummy nice and full now?" she asked, then laid him facedown on her palm.

Naruto raised his head and looked behind him, only to panic at the sight of Jiri's finger nearing him, then it started gentily pressing on his back, but the act still slammed him into the skin of her palm repeatedly before he burped. After he did, Jiri rolled him over onto his back.

Smiling, Jiri carried her nice little bug back into her room then went to her toy chest and removed doll's cradle. She laid her pet down in it and pulled the blanket up to his chin, and tucked Alua in. Making sure it was taunt enough to where he couldn't move.

"Bedtime, Alua. Sweet dreams to the baby." she cooed softly to Naruto, slowly moving the cradle so Naruto was being rocked. Naruto had no idea what she was doing, but he couldn't help but he yawned, his full stomach and the slow, gentle swaying from the rocking was starting to get to him.

Suddenly, there was a knock at the door and Jiri stood, looking a bit disappointed. " There's the babbysitter. And I was having so much fun with it being just us, Alua." she sighed, then leaned over and gave the flea-sized Uzumaki a kiss. "Mommy will be right back."
1122111.title: Feeding time & house

choices: Naruto gets woken up by Jiri
11221111.content:
Naruto couldn't help but fall asleep after Jiri left and as he did, the Uzumaki began to dream.

****

Naruto suddenly woke up in an empty room, then he remembered that he was in Jiri's room, but there was no sign of her anywhere, and the window was opened.

"This could be my chance to get out of here!" Naruto said to himself as he quickly jumped out of his "bed" and quickly ran to the window and climbed up to the windowsill.

However, just as Naruto was just about to jump out the window and to his freedom; the door to Jiri's room opened and she entered just in time to see her pet bug attempting to escape.

"Trying to run away, Alua?! Then it's time for you to come back home where you belong!"

Jiri then began to take a big sniff of the air with a vaccum force, and Naruto tried to pull away but the vaccum like winds were too strong, then Naruto was pulled off his feet and was now flying to Jiri's right nostril until he was back inside her nose. His bare back hit the nasal wall and then suddenly nose hairs quickly sprouted and cacooned him from the neck down leaving his head bare then mucus covered his nose hair prison effectively trapping him and leaving him immobilized and all he could do now, was scream.

"Fee-fi-fo-fum! I'm gonna hug you and squeeze you and pat you and pet you and rub you and caress you and kiss you and love you forever into itty-bitty pieces and never use you up, little one!" Jiri laughed in delight as she repeatedly pressed her right index finger against the right side of her nose, sending the nostral pressing into the other side of the fleshy cavern, squishing Naruto between the warm walls almost as if she were hugging him over and over.

Eventually, Jiri stopped and wondered what she could do with her pet next now that Alua was in trouble fortrying to run away from her.

Now how else could she smother her cute little buggy wuggy with her lovey dovey? She wasn't letting Alua out again, but she still wanted to love him to bits for the rest of forever. The question was what the four-year-old girl could do to express that love to her pet bug.
11221111.title: Naruto's nasal nightmare

choices: follow Naruto's hardships at the park/playground
meanwhile, Jiri gets home, notices "Alua" missing, panics, and tells her brother
112211112.content:
After Naruto fell asleep, which was about for a good two hours worth, he was awoken to find himself suspended in the air and coughing, not to mention covered in pink makeup powder from head to toe.

It took him a moment to realize he was being held by the index finger and thumb of a very familiar four-year-old girl with strawberry blond hair, green eyes, and a pink bow in her hair.

As soon as he remembered that, he looked up at the giant smiling face of Jiri as she spoke, "Yay! Now Alua's even prettier than before!"

Before Naruto could say anything about his rude awakening, Jiri said, "Now Alua, the babysitter wants me to go with her for my mommy and daddy's errands and you're coming with me, but just to keep you close to me, you get to ride in my pocket, close to my heart." then she placed Naruto into the breast pocket of her shirt and she also placed a cotton ball inside the pocket right above Naruto, leaving just enough space to give her pet bug air and began to walk to the babysitter.

As Jiri was walking, Naruto felt each step the four year old girl made as well as listen to her heartbeat. Beyond that, he had nothing to do but brush the makeup off of himself. Good thing that was proving a time-consuming task because the cotton ball Jiri had added to ensure he couldn't get away made it hard to move.

Outside of the pocket, Jiri looked up at the sitter, one of the doggie people, named Hana. "Can we go play at the park for a bit?" the little girl asked.

"I thought you were sick?" retorted Hana.

"I think the yellow stuff in flowers makes my nose feel icky, but they just have grass at the park." Jiri explained.

The Inuzuka girl blinked. Pollon allergy? That explained a lot. The Inuzuka hated stuff like that since it messed with their sense of smell. "How did you find that out?"

Jiri smiled and pat her shirt pocket a few times, "Alua helped me get it out. My pet is very nice like that. Love him to bits forever."

Hana blinked. A good pet helped her out, huh? Again, that was something an Inuzuka could understand. "And what kind of pet is Alua, then?" she snickered playfully.

"Mine." Jiri said happily.

Hana laughed. Figuring that was all the four-year-old would explain. Whatever Alua was, Jiri obviously loved her pet and that was all she was going to say about him. Which was perfectly reasonable to Hana.

"Well...ok, as long as we go when I tell you to, ok? Can't be out all day at the park."

"Ok!" Jiri nodded.

When Hana and Jiri made it to the park, after getting the Inuzuka's permission, Jiri ran to play with one of the many toys in the playground.

Meanwhile inside her pocket, Naruto heard Jiri's heartbeat quicken as he then felt her run, then suddenly his whole world began to spin as he was also suddenly pressed against the cotton ball and felt himself and the cotton ball slowly rise upwards and Naruto could only think to himself, 'What's happening!?'

As it turned out, Jiri ran to one of her most favorite things to play with at the park, the cyclone, a toy that children have to use one leg to cause the toy to move and spin at a fast speed, and as she was spinning, Jiri had her eyes closed and she began to spin faster and faster, unaware that she had just launched her pet "bug" high into the air.

Naruto had no idea what just happened, but now he was flying!

It must have been from Jiri's spinning that caused him to be launched on the air and before he knew where he was going, he made contact with the ground, though it was softer than he seemed to remember until he realized that he was now in the sandbox at the playground.

He sighed, feeling relieved now that he was free from Jiri. Good thing she was having too much fun playing to notice him being launched like that. But why did he have a bad feeling about that? Like he was in worse trouble outside of Jiri's ownership?

After a good while of spinning, Jiri said, "Wow, that was fun! What did you think Alua?" As Jiri looked into her pocket her eyes widened as she saw the cotton ball keeping her bug from escaping was gone then began to search frantically for it until she saw it nearby in the sandbox.

Inside the sandbox, Naruto heard the thunderous sounds of feet coming closer and he quickly covered his naked body in sand, leaving just his eyes so he could see if he had to run or not.

Being a flea-sized four-year-old in a place that he was universally hated by just about everyone for being alive was terrifying. Maybe he WAS better off with Jiri as her pet?

Speaking of Jiri, Naruto watched as she walked ouver and picked up the cotton ball, brushed it off, then put it back in her shirt pocket.

"Don't want to loose this, otherwise you might fall out and get lost Alua. Don't want that to happen to you. I love you, Alua." the young girl said to her now-empity pocket, not realizing "Alua" had indeed fallen out since he was so tiny at 1/16th to 1/8th of an inch.

Naruto watched all of this. Jiri still thought he was with her? And she loved him? What was "love" suppossed to be, anyways?

"Jiri, time to go!" Hana called and Jiri turned and went to her, unknowingly leaving Naruto stranded.

As he dug himself out of the sand, Naruto got that bad feeling again that he was better off with Jiri as her pet again. What was he suppossed to do NOW?!
112211112.title: Park, playground, or prison?

choices: Naruto makes it to the dango, but is caught
Naruto is caught by one of Ami's friends before reaching the dango
Naruto keeps running and escapes from Ami and her friends
1122111121.content:
Naruto saw that he was alone in the park's sandbox and it was the middle of the afternoon and he looked around to see sand, sand and more sand as far as his eyes could see, this sandbox was now a desert to the shrunken, naked four year old blonde Uzumaki. The good news was that Naruto then saw that he is close to the edge of the sandbox and decided to at least get out of the sandbox, after what felt to Naruto were hours he finally made out of the sandbox and slid down on a nearby tall blade of grass down to the ground and went under the blade of grass to catch his breath and finally rest.

After a while of resting however, Naruto then suddenly felt the ground begin to shake and it then the shaking got more powerful and seemed to be getting closer, Naruto then began to hear loud thundering stomping in rapid succession, the shaking then got so powerful as it got closer to him that Naruto then began to bounce upon the ground and then when Naruto saw what was the cause of all this shaking and thunderous stomping, Naruto suddenly felt his heart drop as he then saw a full sized group of kids of various ages who looked like they were the size of mountains compared to himself, but he also saw some adults who dwarfed the children making it really hard for the shrunken Uzumaki to see their faces without causing him back pains, then Naruto saw the children's sandal wearing feet heading his way and Naruto then began to quickly run, jump and dodge as best as he could, to avoid getting crushed by the stampede of colossal sized children as they ran into the park to play.

Then, Naruto suddenly soon felt himself being caught and lifted up off of the ground as he saw he was now in someone's hand and he then turned to look up at who caught him and he then saw a colossal (to him) sized girl with purple hair styled in an asymmetrical cut and brown eyes. She also wore a striped blouse that was tied at her neck and waist over a dark blues dress that had a marking on the left sleeve but none on the right which she wore along with a pair of dark pants and sandals.

The girl then grinned in a intimidating way at Naruto, The girl then began to "Play" with Naruto by using her fingers to attempt to squish him into her palm but Naruto kept moving then suddenly the girl began to breath into her hand that Naruto was on trying to blow him off her hand, but Naruto grabbed on her skin and held on then before he knew it... Naruto saw the girl's thumb about to crush him when suddenly he heard someone, "Ami Come on, Fuki and I are just about to play bug wars and it wouldn't be the same without you playing!"

The now named Ami then looked at Naruto and she suddenly smirked and yelled back, "I'm coming Kasumi! I just had to find a new bug to play the game with!"

Ami then closed her hand around Naruto and then went to where her friend were at, "Now before we begin guys do you remember your roles?" Ami asked her two friend.

Both girls nodded as Kasumi held up a bag filled with giant marbles, "Yep Ami, I handle the marble bombs."

Fuki squat down to her knees while placing a finger on an end of a popsicle stick, "And I'm in charge of the minefield."

Ami nodded and then pulled out a large magnifying glass out of her pocket and smiled up a large grin, "and I control the laser."

The other two grinned.

"So, Ami, find a good one, then?"

"Yep. Have a good feeling about this one, too. Going to be a lot of fun for us if it makes it through the war!" Ami said, holding up Naruto.

As he was presented to them, Naruto got a look at the other two girls.

One had short, spiky red hair and big brown eyes. She wore a blouse that was half green and half yellow along with a grey scarf. She also wore a pair of light-colored pants.

The other one had ginger hair that was done in an afro style with a shuriken-like mark on the front left side of her haircut. She wore a purple dress with mesh underneath and long light pink sleeves along with two sets of belt-like fixtures to it.

The redhead pulled out a tub full of other bugs and the afro girl set a dango stick down at the end of the playing area as bait, then Naruto was put on the ground and the other bugs the girls were going to wage war on were dumped on the ground around him.

As the bugs made their way to the bait, however, Naruto stayed put.

"Hey, this last one ain't moving!" Fuki said with irritation in her voice as she looked down at Naruto and then both Ami and Kasumi saw that Naruto wasn't moving.

Ami grinned, "Maybe he just needs a little "motivation", right girls?" She said as she raised her right foot into the air and seeing what their leader was hinting at, Kasumi and Fuki lifted their feet up and suddenly all together they stomped their feet hard onto the ground just barely missing Naruto as he looked up at them in horror and then he saw them lift their feet again and soon enough Naruto ran as fast as his legs could go catching up to the insects as they headed towards the dango.

While Naruto and the other bugs were running for their lives, Kasumi then stood up and held some giant marbles in her hand and dropped them right on top of some of the running bugs, Naruto then suddenly heard a loud bang and turned he head to see giant sized marbles chasing after him and the bugs ahead while crushing the slower bugs behind, after a while, Naruto and some of the surviving bugs made it out of the "bombing zone" and made it to a path that had popsicle sticks half way buried in sand and as they moved through Naruto then saw Fuki then flick the popsicle sticks out of the ground causing the sand and dirt to explode onto Naruto and the surviving bugs causing them to run in terror, some poor bugs were on the dirt when Fuki flicked the popsicle sticks and were caught in the explosions and flung to their deaths, but Naruto and now a smaller group of surviving bugs escaped from the "minefield" and were now halfway to the giant dango waiting for them.

As the bugs got closer, however, Naruto froze. And a good thing, too; a distortion covered the sky before the bugs suddenly burnt to death in front of him.

"Ah...there you are!"

Naruto then saw Ami tower over him as she held the large magnifying glass in her right hand and aimed it at him and then shined it under the sun and moved the beam towards him at a slow pace.

Naruto then saw that he was trapped against a rock and then he saw a colossal shadow cover over him and he turned around and Naruto saw Ami towering over him as she held her large magnifying glass in her right hand and aimed it at him and then she began to move her left index finger towards him to crush him against the rock.

As Ami's finger moved closer towards him, Naruto frantically tried to think of a way to escape, but it was too late as Ami's colossal finger covered his entire body and he was now feeling the pressure and then suddenly Naruto closed his eyes and opened his mouth and then....CHOMP

Ami felt his bite, but she wasn't feeling the desired effect, in fact, poor Naruto's teeth were so small he didn't even leave a bite mark or even a shadow of one, but Naruto didn't care as he still kept biting at Ami's finger, but it was always the same result, nothing...

"You're really fighting, huh? Good, I like it when my opponent makes things difficult." Ami sneered.

Ami then withdrew her finger off of Naruto but he saw that she was going to try to squish him again, ignoring the pain he was feeling in his body, he stood up and began to run as fast as he could, then before Ami could try to stop him, Naruto had already made it inside hr sleeve and was still running, then suddenly Naruto heard Ami start to laugh as he ran on top of her skin and figured she must be ticklish, but he kept running until he suddenly dropped as he ran off her shoulder and down to her lower abdomen until he grabbed the edge of her panties and shimmied his way towards her right leg and slowly but carefully slide down to her sandal and once he made it there, he ran on top of the sandal and jumped off Ami's big toe and ran as he made it to the ground ignoring the now dead bugs as he ran.

Naruto made it and seemed to be the only survivor of this "bug war" game as the dango was right in his sight, hearing his stomach roar with hunger Naruto just ran as fast as he could to start eating, he was now so close that he could jump onto the dango but then...
1122111121.title: Bug War

choices: Jiri takes "Alua" somewhere she likes—her sceret crush Naruto's appartment!
Jiri has Naruto sleep in her hair
1122111122.content:
As Jiri made it home, and went to her room to play with Alua, she reached into her pocket only to have her eyes widen in shock and fear as she didn't feel her pet bug against her fingers.

When did...? Jiri's eyes widened. The playground! The cyclone! Alua must have gotten thrown out of her pocket by her spinning after all!

Jiri felt the begining of tears prickle her eyes. She lost Alua! He was lost and all alone because she didn't check for him! How could she?! She loved her little pet bug so much, but didn't see if he was safe! She was a bad pet owner! What if he got squished?! What if he go eaten?! What if he got washed away or bruied?! What if he couldn't find his way back to her?!

The very thought of what could happen to her sweet little bug was too much for her as horrible events went through her mind! Not wanting to imagin any more bad possabilities, the four-year-old rushed to the door, only to crash into Fauru as he entered the house.

Seeing his little sister's tears and how frantic she was, Fauru felt a stab of alarm. "Jiri, what's wrong?!"

"Big brother! I have to find Alua!" the little girl wailed.

"Who?"

"My pet! Alua's a nice and sweet little bug that helped me feel better when I was sick and so Imade him my pet! The sitter took me to the park while I had Alua in my pocket...I was playing on the cyclone...spun so fast, it tossed Alua away! And I didn't notice! I have to go get him back! I love him so much!"

Fauru's eyes widened. A pet bug that had helped his sister's nose feel better?! That had to be...! Oh, that little bastard! Making Jiri cry! Fauru was gonna get him for that! NOBODY made Fauru's sister sad! NOBODY!

Fighting down a snarl that threatened to show, Fauru stood up and guided his sibling to the couch and sat her down.

"Jiri, wait here, ok?"

"B-b-but...!"

"Don't worry Jiri, I'll go get him for you. Just stay here and wait for me to get back with your pet, promise that before you know it, you'll have Alua safe and sound back in your hand. I'll see to that." he said.

Jiri hugged her big brother around the waist. "Ok. Big brother."

As Fauru exited the house and made his way to the park, equiped with a magnifying glass, he snarled. Damn that little brat trying to escape (though Jiri was insistant her pet hadn't left her by choice) and upseting his little sister!

Oh...Jiri would get "Alua", or should he say Naruto, back alright, but AFTER Fauru made him pay for making Jiri cry! Oh, that little flea-shit was so lucky Jiri loved him as her pet bug so much!

Arriving at the park, Fauru checked around where his little sister had said she'd noticed where that cotton ball had landed.

Good thing he still had to do his insect report. No one was at the park, but if he used the report as an excuse for what he was doing, nobody would question it.

Now where was that piece of shit?

Huh? A quick flash of movement at the edge of what the magnifying glass improved. Fauru focused on it.

Well...asked and answered, there was his sister's pet!

Furious, the older brother swept a hand and smacked the shrunken bastard child, sending him flying until he hit the ground and rolled a few times before coming to a stop and he looked up as Fauru narrowed his eyes on him. "You got a lotta nerve. Making my little sister cry like that! That's the one thing I hate more than you! So...a person I hate did something I hate...what do you think happens now?"

The shrunk brat backed up. Clearly understanding the position making Jiri cry had put him in.

Slamming a fist down next to him, Fauru continued. "Promised Jiri I'd get you back to her in one piece and alive so she can keep owning you as her pet...but that doesn't mean I can't make you suffer for upsetting her first!"

Fauru then aimed the magnifying glass under the sun and watched as the beam moved towards Naruto and saw the shrunken child run in fear as the beam followed him for a good while until Fauru had the blonde Uzumaki bastard child trapped as he slowly moved the laser at Naruto until he stopped it.

Naruto thought his torment was over until he heard Fauru give a loud snort and suddenly Naruto was hit and covered in Fauru's saliva mixed with his own snot.

Before Naruto could even attempt to clean himself off, he didn't see Fauru take his sandal off and quickly stomped on top of Naruto smothering his saliva, snot, foot sweat, dirt and smell of his feet after a long days worth of being on his feet over the shrunken and naked four year old Uzumaki.

After that, Fauru lifted his bare footand put it back into his sandal, not after peeling Naruto of his foot though and held him in his hand until he used his other hand and slammed it right on top of Naruto with a loud clap.

Looking at the shrunken and naked blonde Uzumaki now laying on the palm of his hand, Fauru knew that Naruto was alive but now he was in agonizing amounts of pain. Good. Bet now he'll think twice about making Jiri cry again as he then stuffed Naruto back into his pocket and just walked away from the park.

After getting home, Fauru smiled and reached into his pocket. "Here you go Jiri...he might need a bath first, but..." he pulled out Naruto and showed his sister.

"ALUA!!! Jiri happily exclaimed as she took Naruto out of Fauru's hand and immediately nuzzled his body against her cheek.

Naruto, still sore from Fauru's treatment, couldn't say or do anything to resist her.

After her nuzziling, Jiri then said, "Poor little Alua, you must've been so scared and alone! Well from now on, mommy's gonna never, ever, ever leave you alone for a single second ever again!"

Naruto could only look defeated as he thought that he will never escape from this fate. It seemed all roads lead right into Jiri's arms.

Jiri put her sweet little pet bug into her shirt pocket and then hugged her big brother. "Thank you, big brother! Thank you so much! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you for bringing Alua back to me!"

Fauru smiled. "Just happy to make my little sister happy. It's what big brothers are for."

Letting go of her brother...
1122111122.title: Continued captivity

choices: The living room, where Fauru invited both Sakura and Ino to play
11221111222.content:
Jiri let go of Fauru, she was just so happy that her pet bug was safe and sound and Fauru said, " Hey sis, why don't you take Alua to your room and play for a while? I'll tell you when mom and dad are coming home." Jiri nodded and went up to her room keeping a firm, but not too hard, grip on her pet bug and placed her pet in her hair.

After Jiri placed Naruto deep into her hair, the flea sized blonde and naked Uzumaki began to run to escape this jungle Jiri calls her hair.

As he ran, Naruto felt Jiri's head shake as she giggled at the feel of his bare feet ran on top of her scalp saying his tiny feet tickled, after what seemed like hours when it was only minutes, Naruto was so very tired but just as he stopped running, he felt his foot get caught in one of Jiri's hairs and he began to struggle and as he did, it was getting harder for him to break free and once he finally got freed he stumbled backwards until he hit something pink and when he looked up he saw that he found Jiri's hair ribbon and it was the size of a mountain compared to him and due to Jiri's continuous giggling, since she really loved the feeling that her pet bug was tickling her inside her hair that made her giggle up a storm and that was undoing her hair ribbon, when Naruto got to it, causing it to fall and when Jiri finally controlled her giggles, she saw that her ribbon was out of place and fixed it.

As Naruto was tangled in Jiri's ribbon trying to escape it, a colossal shadow covered over him and he looked up saw it was Jiri's hand, he desperately attempted to escape but it was too late, as she then grabbed the ribbon and himself along with it, and she began to move her hands and the ribbon into it's proper place.

Naruto had no idea what just happened but now he found himself trapped in the ribbon after Jiri fixed it and now he was literally tied up and he could barley move and what made it worse was that Jiri was now begging to walk out of her room and into the...
11221111222.title: Naruto's "Hairy" situation

choices: Naruto makes Jiri sneeze and he's sent elsewhere, or he explores inside her
Jiri notices something in her nose
11222.content:
Naruto didn't know what time it was, but when he woke up he felt like he had the strangest dream, until he felt the wind blowing against his head and whwn he looked at his body, it was covered in some wet and sticky slime and it was then, Naruto's eyes widened as he now realized that this was no dream, as he was shrunken to the size of a flea, naked and inside the nose of some girl!

Seeing that the girl Jiri was still sleeping as the floor of the nose was still the wall, Naruto attempted to break free from his mucus prison but no matter how hard he tried or struggled, he was trapped.

With a sigh, Naruto tried thinking ou a way out. But the goo that held him refused to budge. Ok, how was he going to get out of this?

That was when he remembered that jerk Fauru's taunting him before.

"Hope you like the taste of my little sister's snot, cause that's all you're going to be eating for a very long time, you piece of flea shit."

"Hope you had a good meal before I shrank you, flea boy. Cause that was the VERY last decent meal you're EVER going to have again, my little sister's snot will change you're taste for anything else!"

Making a face of sheer disgust, Naruto realized the only way that he was going to get out without being blown into a tissue and getting crumpled up or getting squashed be getting pressed into anything, he was going to have to do what that creep this girl called a brother had planned.

Reluctantly, he looked down and opened his mouth and took a bite.

Ugh...it left an seriously unpleasant taste in his mouth, and as for the taste, it was like trying to chew on an old piece of taffy covered in salt. Not to mention it was like chewing melting rubber! Naruto felt himself shudder in disgust as he forced himself to swallow.

Ok...he NEEDED to free his hands! He would be able to handle digging his way out, but he needed his hands!

He forced himself to keep eating Jiri's snot that covered him, wanting to vomit more and more as he did so. But at least he was freeing himself.

Finally, after eating about forty percent of the snot encasing him, Naruto cheered in victory as he was able to free his hands. Vendictivily, he dug at the snot, ripping it away. He laughed as he finally freed himself all the way and leaned against the squishy wall of the inner flesh and cartilage of Jiri's nose, tired, but triumphant.

Now if only he could get the nasty taste out of his mouth and stomach...

"Ok...now how to get out of here?" He muttered to himself. One option was to get Jiri to sneeze him out, as fast as that would be, though, he had no idea where he'd end up if that happened.

Another was to go up her nose and try finding another way out. He could try and explore his unaware host, to see all his options? That was an idea.

Or...the option Naruto didn't like would happen and Jiri would notice something in her nose and fish him out somehow. The idea made Naruto gulp.

Well, whatever happened, he would need to get out of her nose to do anything if he wanted to get back to normal.

Meanwhile, while Naruto had been literally eating his way to freedom, Jiri was with her mother while Fauru was at the academy and her father was at work, doing errands and shopping at the market place. Currently, Jiri was standing with her mother in a restaurant and she was taking in the different smells of the food, until she felt her nose tickle.
11222.title: Snot a snack

choices: Some girls from the Ninja Academy

112321112111.content:
As Tsume left the petting zoo, she was highly aware of the frightened, shrunk, boy in his bouncy, fleshy prison as Tsume's reast shook with each step she took, causing him to rikochet around between them like a pinball.

In an attempt to keep from being tossed around, Naruto grabbed the first thing he could reach. Unfortunatly, it was Tsume's nibble.

"Oh-hooo! Looks like a little someone is really eager to start "training" on how to make women throw all thier dildos away and scream his name with how bad they want to get their hands on him with me!" the Inuzuka woman told her "passenger".

Seeing what he'd done, Naruto paled, "I'm sorry! It was an accident! I didn't mean to, honest! Please don't be mad at me!" he begged.

"You have it backwards I LIKE you being in my brests. If I could, I'd squish you into them until you were turned into a little living tattoo and keep you." Tsume laughed as Naruto turned red as Tsume got home. Once there, Tsume saw her daughter was back from the Academy and was waiting for her to get there and unlock the door.

"Mom!" Hana smiled, seeing her.

The two female Inuzuka hugged each other tightly, making Naruto yell ashe was squished between the mother and daughter.

"What was that?!"Hana cried, pulling back, startled.

Seeing her daughter's curiosity, Tsume pulled Naruto out and held him up to her while explaining the situation with Naruto, the petting zoo, and the rules about renting him to Hana. When Tsume finished, Hana stared at him in sheer wonder.

"Oh, C'mere!"

Naruto's head snapped up.

"Wait, wha-ACK!"

The blond's protests dissolved into a strangled squawk as a large, hand closed around his body and hoisted him into the air with alarming speed. The next thing he knew, he found himself face to face with Hana, who promptly proceeded to nuzzle him into the side of her face, rubbing her much-larger cheek against his. That soon proved the least of Naruto's worries. He'd never been physically glommed by someone several times his height before and Hana easily exceeded his expectations in that category. It was...well, rather strange, all things considered.

Seeing that, Tsume couldn't help but tease them. "Awww...would you look at that! You know Hana, if you want, you could practice seducing a guy on our litte guest here!"

"MOMMMM! That's gross! I'm only eleven!" Hana cried, going red in the face as Tsume laughed.

Hearing a frightened yelp from the tiny blond, the young girl quickly shifted her attention to calming him down.

"Shhh, shhh, shhh...It's ok, its going to be ok. Even IF I decided to do that to you, It'd just be a game. I'll be gentle, I promise. While I might tease you a bit, I'm going to hug you and squeeze you and pat you and pet you and rub you and caress you and and kiss you. I'll be gentle with you, promise! And if there's anything you don't like or makes you feel uncomfortable, just let me know and I'll stop. It'll be alright." Hana reassured, her words soft despite their close proximity to one another, as if speaking to a frightened animal.

Seeing the interaction between her eleven year old daughter and the terrified, four-year-old outcast, Tsume smiled. Her daughter had her heart in the right place. It was good to see, especially considering that not only did the people older than Naruto despise him, but that they caused their kids' entire generation to hate Naruto just because their parents did---and for what? Saving the village and the lives of everyone in it just by being born in the first place?! Naruto never asked to carry the demon, yet he was shunned and hated for what he was by the villagers for stopping the Kyuubi. If it weren't for the kid, none of them would be here. This village seemed to forget that the only reason they were alive was because of Naruto. And people claimed that he was a demon in human form...HAH! If he was the Kyuubi, he would have killed them all by now!

The fact that they were still alive and the village was still standing were proof of Naruto's humanity, yet the people around him were too stupid to figure that out!

Hana carried Naruto inside, still cooing reassurances at him. When Tsume followed, she found her eleven year old fashioning their "guest" a sackcloth-like shirt out of a dishcloth.

Seeing that, her mother got an idea. "Hana, you know...seeing as there's twenty-four hours in a day, and twelve is half of twenty-four...what do you say we split the hours we have our little guest rented to us? We each get twelve hours with him, once those are up, he gets passed to the other one of the two of us?" Tsume said.

Hana hesitated, then turned to Naruto. "That ok?" she asked.

Naruto gulped, but knowing he didn't have much choice, grudgingly nodded.

At that show of acceptance, the mother and daughter set about deciding on who would have Naruto for the first twelve hours.

11232112.content:
Naruto groaned as he woke up. Huh? Where was he? Why was it so dark here? Why did it feel like this place was shaking? He didn't understand.

"Shame the petting zoo idea didn't work out. She DID say she was willing to pay any price I came up with, but saying that before being able to pay up is just bad business. Oh well..." a familiar voice that made Naruto pale said before something made the opposite wall of this place slam into him, making the inch-high, four-year-old boy grunt at the squishing force, "I gotta say, with how Tiny here got a boner from me having my hands on him after he was reduced to his new size, having my own personal shrinkee is a pretty good consolation prize!" The voice laughed.

After a bit more movement, the constant swaying back and forth almost rocking Naruto to sleep, it stopped and he heard a type of scraping sound before the movement resumed.

"Mom? Dad? I'm home! Anyone here?" the familiar voice called out, getting no response. "Good..." the familiar voice said gleefully, and the movement resumed again, only much faster and rougher this time. After a quick pause in movement and a sound like creaking,followed shortly after by one quick forward motion and a loud booming sound.

Naruto, who had been tossed around by the rough ride, pushed himself up and shook his head before he turned to look up when light entered wherever he was, yet when it suddenly darkened again, what Naruto saw horrified and shocked him. The light was being blocked off by a giant hand!

The crushing forces of index finger and thumb constricted around Naruto, wrenching him into the air between their irresistible forces. Naruto soared up to dangle before the face of a unpleasantly familiar-looking sight as Naruto gazed upon who held him.

A giant girl around the age of 8 or 9 looking down at him. She had short, neck-length, spiky light-blonded hair. Two thick strands reached onto her cheeks. She also had rose gold eyes with small brows and a porcelain colored skin tone. She wore a sleeveless kimono over a green top that only has a long green sleeve covering her left arm. Both her arms were bandaged up to her elbows. She also wore black trousers with dark blue shinobi combat sandals that had her toes and heels exposed.

Aki!

And from a look around, he was trapped in her bedroom!

"Well, well, well...look at who's up! Enjoy the ride in my pocket, Shortie?!" Aki cooed in mocking delight at seeing Naruto struggling in her grasp. Aki burst out laughing at the sight, and to Naruto, because of his new height's hearing was enhanced to were Aki's voice and anyone else's voice for that matter sounded like a thunderstorm to his ears, her laughing was now a thunderstorm set to maximum volume. He clamped his hands to his ears as the loud noise left him incapacitated, however briefly.

Smirking at the sight of him so helpless and immobile, Aki set Naruto so he was laying upon the palm of her hand and held up her other hand, her thumb holding her other hand's ring finger in a curled position right in front of her inch-high victim. "Say hello to my friend Flicka, pipsqueak!" she sing-songed, then slid her thumb away from her ring finger.

POW!!!!!!

Aki flicked the reduced blond who, for all intents and purposes, she viewed as little more thana bug and watched as it went flying and plopped down onto her pillow and tumbled down it before laying there, stunned.

The giantess She sat down on the bed, sweeping Naruto aside with the back of her hand to avoid him being crushed beneath her, before Naruto found himself lifted up again and he saw that he was now laying upon the palm of aki's hand as she brought him to her face.

"Bet you're wondering why I took something as helpless and pathetic as you home rather than sell you. Well, the petting zoo idea didn't work out. So I figured why shouldn't I own you, runt?" Aki taunted as she proceeded to play with Naruto as she bounced him around her fingers and hand. "Of course, you'll need to be kept secret from my fokes, but you being stuck only one inch tall for the rest of your life, as long as I always take you with me wherever I go and keep track of you, that'll be easy."

The academy-level kunoichi then closed her fist around the shrunken, four-year-old Naruto with only his shoulders and head sticking out. Smirking, she puckered her lips and brought him to them. Hey, as far as she cared, he was her property now, so she could do whatever she wanted to the pipsqueak.

What she didn't expect was the screaming.

"No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no! No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no! Oh, please, no! Don't eat me!"

Pulling back, she flicked Naruto in the face. "Brain-dead idiot. I'm not gonna eat you--I LIKE having you as my personal shrinkiee to lord over, you die and that's over. What? Afraid you'll get Cooties if I kiss you?"

"What's a kiss?" Naruto asked.

The giantess blinked. "...You're kidding right?" Aki said, amused.

That amusement died as he shook his head.

"Hug?"

Another shake in the negative.

"Cuddle?"

Naruto flinched as if expecting pain.

"Affection in general, at all?"

Naruto looked away, "Myth." he answered.

Aki frowned. That didn't make any sense. Sure the runt was avoided and bullied, but NEVER even knowing affection in general even existed in the first place? That couldn't be right...Could it? In a village like Konoha, with a population totaling in the thousands, if not hundred thousands...nobody had ever taught him affection even existed? Then she shrugged off the thought, figuring he was lying. There was no way a person was hated THAT much, but not have people trying to murder them. And even if it was (which she doubled) it wasn't Aki's concern.

What WAS Aki's concern was what she was going to do with Naruto next!
11232112.title: No Deal! Naruto wakes up in Aki's pocket

1123211221.content:
Naruto kept weeping under the flower pot until the ground started to shake and the overturned flower pot was suddenly removed.

Aki.

"Hungry? I did say I'd get you a shrimp to eat for dinner since you were good earlier. Eat up." she said and set the shrimp down in front of the shrunken four-year-old boy. Naruto didn't touch the food.

"What's it like?" he asked, looking up at her.

Tilting her head to one side, she stared at him. "Huh? What's what like?" she asked, wondering what the shrunken brat her mom warned her about was saying.

"Having a family. Having people that love, support, and care about you...how does that feel like?" Naruto asked.

The eight year old academy student narrowed her eyes at him dangerously, "Is that a threat?"

Naruto shook his head. "No. Just asking because I don't know. Don't have a family...Nobody needs or wants me, everyone hates me, and the worst part is, I don't even know why. I don't get is why the ANBU always stopped me from leaving...after the tries got to one hundred, I didn't see why I should keep trying to go away some place else, either. If I at least knew why everyone hates me so much, it'd still hurt, but at least I would know what I could do to make things better and only have to be treated bad until then and the hate goes away. But how can I make things right when I don't even know what I did wrong in the first place?"

Aki looked at Pipsqueak at that. As yong as she was, she at least knew about right and wrong and being fair. Her parents had taught her that if you do something bad, you had to make up for it and fix things. That was fair.

They had also taught her that Naruto was bad and he DESERVED being treated horribly. But...if he was so bad, why wouldn't anyone say what made him so bad in the first place? Like he said, how could he make up for it and fix things if he didn't even know what he did wrong in the first place? And if he wasn't wanted, why was he kept from leaving?

Aki frowned. That didn't make any sense. Sure the runt was avoided and bullied, but NEVER even knowing affection in general even existed in the first place? That couldn't be right...Could it? In a village like Konoha, with a population totaling in the thousands, if not hundred thousands...nobody had ever taught him love even existed? if you were a kid tossed out on your own, no family, no friends, and cursed, cheated, spat on, and beaten up for reasons you didn't even know, how would you react? What kind of person would you grow up to be?

While she was still just an academy student, and even if Pipsqueak was only half her age (herself being eight while Naruto, or Pipsqueak as Aki had decided to make her personal name for him, was only four) Aki had been taught that ninja were pragmatic.

And that pragmatic mindset was pointing to something being wrong.

But seeing Naruto in a funk over what the shrunken four-year-old boy had just said gave Aki the most wicked idea ever. Looking down so her hair hid her her face and she made a quick handsign, grinning.

She'd figure out what was up all this contradicting stuff that didn't add up or make sense about Naruto later. But for now he was still her inch-high private prisoner and she wanted to have some fun with him!

"C'mere, Pipsqueak!"

Naruto's head snapped up. "Wha-ACK!" the blond gave a strangled squawk as a large hand closed around his body and hoisted him into the air with alarming speed. The next thing he knew, Aki had promptly proceeded to nuzzle him into the side of her face, rubbing her much-larger cheek against his. That soon proved the least of Naruto's worries. He'd never been physically glommed by someone several times his height before and Aki easily exceeded his expectations in that category. It was...well, rather strange, all things considered.

Why was she suddenly being nice to him?

Then she suddenly looked up, exposing she now had arthropod-like mandibles, compound-eyes like an insect and the snout of a warthog.

"BOO!"

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH HHH!"

Naruto screamed as the thing Aki turned into threw its head back and laughed. "Ahahahaha! Got ya good, Pipsqueak! Look on your face! HAH! Surprised you didn't wet yourself!" she said, making a quick handsign and her features returned to normal. "Me, mom and dad are from the Henkō Family...one of the smaller, lesser-known families in the village. That's our family's hiden technique."

Once his heartbeat and breathing returned to normal,Naruto blinked.

Henkō? That word translated to "alteration".

But..."Hiden technique?" he asked.

Aki nodded, not surprised he didn't really know, "Yeah. Hiden techniques are passed down orally from generation to generation in certain regions or clans. The groups who possess these techniques are usually extremely secretive about them in order to ensure that no one other than the members of the group or clan learn them. As such, they are passed down through oral means instead of being written down or recorded. A few hiden techniques require a special ability or lineage and as such are usually the pride and fame of the clan that possesses them. These techniques also cannot be copied through any means of simple observation. But don'tconfuse hiden techniques with kekkei genkai, as technically, hiden techniques can be taught to anyone.
The jutsu of the Henkō family lets us change parts of our own, or other people's bodies sort of like the Akimichi clan. We can only use the general skills of alteration to effect a person's body. Basically, if we made ourselves look like Madara Uchiha or Hashirama Senju, we wouldn't have abilities like the Sharingan or Wood Style, since those are kekkei genkai. We'd just have their appearance. Sure, If I used the Alteration on myself, I could use cat-like or compounded eyes for different visions, and enhance my body to where I possess superhuman durability if I wanted, but I can never able to turn completely into an animal, and I can't become a nonliving thing at all. We alter ourselves or other people, but we can't truly change what we are at our base."

Naruto's eyes widened. " Is that what you did to me?" he asked.

"Yeah. Altered you so your body was an inch high and enhanced your body to give you invulnerability...can still feel pain, though. Body's warning system about danger....without that, it'd be too easy to get reckless and get killed."

"So...you can un-shrink me?" Naruto asked.

"Nope! Set those to be permanent!" Aki said, grinning at seeing the crushing horror on his face. Then she remembered the shrimp she'd gotten for Naruto to eat was still whole and sitting on her nightstand.

That just wouldn't do.

Aki shifted how she held Naruto so that he was resting against her as if she were cradling a baby wth his head supported by the crook of her arm.

Naruto wondered what Aki was doing until hismouth was forced open with Aki using her fingernails to seperate his lips and drop a small piece of broken-off shrimp down his throat. It took Naruto so much by surprise, he started choking somewhat. Eventually he caught his breath and Naruto was back to just coughing. It took him about thirty seconds to catch his breath...but before he knew it, here came another piece of the shrimp.

"Open wide!" Aki said, giggling as she stuffed more of the decapod crustacean into him, leaving Naruto choaking, coughing and gasping again. After a few more force-feeds, Naruto adapted and looked up at Aki with his mouth open.

Laughing in delight, the girl smiled at Naruto in a much softer way than previously, and broke off a smaller bit of shrimp, enjoying feeding him like he was a baby bird. After he'd managed to eat all of it (for a little guy, Aki was amased at his sheer appetite), he yawned and relaxed, his eyes closing and he fell asleep, subconsciously nuzzling into Aki's embrace.

112321122121.content:
Aki smirked at Pipsqueak as he gulped heavily. "Oh, relax...a wedding's got nothing to do with torture." she clarified, not at all surprised at his paranoia. After all, if his life led him to believe love and affection were myths, how could he know what weddings were about? "Mom and dad told me a wedding is a special ceremony where two people become a special kind of partner to each other and after that, they take care of one another." she said.

Naruto stared at that. He thought weddings were a fancy word for torturing and destroying him, not...not that. That actually sounded...nice.

Seeing the four-year-old boy's thoughtful look, the young female Henkō clan member giggled, the more she saw of how cute Pipsqueak actually was, the more she enjoyed he was now her shrunken property for the rest of their lives! She fought down a dreamy sigh at that. Oh...she just wanted to do unspeakable things to him until he was utterly broken and mindlessly obedient to her, he was so adorable!

"Well...from what I heard, two people are asked if they agree to a vow, then seal it with a kiss. And since you said you didn't know what a kiss is before...here, I'll show you."Aki said, then puckered her lips and leaned in towards Naruto, who wincd and shut his eyes, expecting the worst.

What he got, however, was her enormous, thick lips lightly pressing on him gently, feeling like pillows pecking at his being. With a slight poping sound as she pulled away, Aki smirked at Naruto again. "See? That wasn't so bad now, was it?" she said, tone between reassurance and rhetorical.

"Ok Pipsqueak...time to get you ready for our wedding!" she said with gusto, carrying Naruto off to get him prepared.

------------

A short time later, Naruto was wondering how his life had gotten this strange.

Here he was, four years old, an inch high, and about to have a wedding as he sat on the shoulder of a giant, eight-year-old girl that had short, neck-length, spiky light-blonded hair with two thick strands reached onto her cheeks, had rose gold-colored eyes with small brows and a porcelain colored skin tone. She wore an all white dress that seemed way too big for her over normal clothes. A boutique of faux flowers in Aki's hands and her eyes burning with an almost predatory triumph whenever she looked at him.

Naruto himself wore a sackcloth tunic-like shirt fashioned out of a dishcloth that had been dipped in black shoe polish. And covering his legs were a pair of pants his size made of black leather, however the needlework on the sides that held the"front" and "back" leg pieces together resembled sutures more than sewing, and a pair of rather uncomfortable plastic doll shoes. The whole outfit was rather crudely done by highly inexperienced hands, but that didn't really matter to Naruto...he was just glad he wasn't naked any longer.

"Ready, Pipsqueak?!" Aki said, though it was more demand than question. She'd already warned him if he didn't go along with this, she'd Alter him until he was a genetically unstable blob and then would mount his remains like a butterfly while dressing him.

Naruto paled, yet nodded.

"GREAT! Let's have our wedding!" she cheered and started walking towards a clone Aki had made of herself that was dressed like a shrine priestess. Stopping in front of the clone, the real Aki was all smiles as Naruto clung to her shoulder as she wore her mom's wedding dress.

Clearing its/her throat, Aki's clone announced the wedding vow speech.

"Dearly Beloved, we are gathered here today in the presence of these witnesses, to join Pipsqueak and Aki Henkō in matrimony commended to be honorable among all; and therefore is not to be entered into lightly but reverently, passionately, lovingly and solemnly. Into this - these two persons present now come to be joined, to have and to hold, from this day forward, for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, until death do they part. If any person can show just cause why they may not be joined together - let them speak now or forever hold their peace."

Naruto groaned as he woke up. Hearing a loud series of noises and the inch-high, four-year-old boy looked

What surprised him was the three other girls with her looking down at him as he found himself trapped on all sides by a quartet of massive bodies.

Aki leaned her face in close to him with a smile going from ear to ear on her face. Aki nodded, not surprised that he didn't really know, "Yeah. Hiden techniques are passed down orally from generation to generation in certain regions or clans. The groups who possess these techniques are usually extremely secretive about them in order to ensure that no one other than the members of the group or clan learn them. As such, they are passed down through oral means instead of being written down or recorded. A few hiden techniques require a special ability or lineage and as such are usually the pride and fame of the clan that possesses them. These techniques also cannot be copied through any means of simple observation. But don't confuse hiden techniques with kekkei genkai, as technically, hiden techniques can be taught to anyone.
