115221.content:
The villagers were cowering and backing away as a 4 year old blonde boy with a cold hateful look on his face wearing a black shirt with a red swirl on it and black shorts walked by. His blue eyes briefly flashed a bright crimson red and his pupils were slitted as he lets a dark growl showing elongated fang-like teeth at the crowd making them yelp in fear and scatter like headless chickens. This boy was Naruto Uzumaki or really Naruto Uzumaki-Namikaze unbeknownst to the villagers. He was the son of the fourth hokage and the Jinchuriki of the Nine-Tailed Fox who had nearly destroyed the village. The villagers absolutely loathed the poor boy, despite the fact he was only just a baby on that tragic night and was born before the fox even attacked as it had previously been still sealed within his own mother Kushina Uzumaki, making Naruto the third Uzumaki to contain The Nine-Tails. None of the current or previous generation except those who were closest to Naruto's parents knew these facts though. If the rest of the village had known these facts, then maybe the hatred towards Naruto never would've even existed.

Originally a year ago, Naruto was such a warm hearted, kind and loving boy who only wanted to be accepted in the village and become Hokage, anyone who wasn't from Konohagakure would to love to adopt and help the poor hated child, give him the love he was denied, but after an attack by the villagers and some shinobi went too far and nearly killed him, they even had the balls to practically rape him while taunting him. After his recovery, Naruto completely changed becoming cold, emotionless and even deeply hateful right back on and at the village. He met the Nine-Tailed Fox during his brief coma and she told him everything about why she had been sealed within him, who was the true cause of her attack on Konoha, and about his parents, and her true name being Kurami. Kurami even knew her former host Kushina had survived her attack and the loss of her but also foolishly fallen into the pressure hatred of the vilage and had abandoned her own child, just because he was now host to the exact same bijuu that she herself once held. It was so hilariously ironic in Kurami's view that her former host would abandon the child she originally was so happy to have been carrying and birthed before Kurami had been ripped out of her body by that masked Uchiha. Kurami wasn't sure what changed in her former host, but likely she gave in to peer pressure due to the village's quickly festering hatred and her own emotional weakness due to losing her husband, which made Kurami view her former host as a coward. She knew Kushina was now probably deeply regretting her actions and would likely be seeking Naruto out to make amends, she had no naive views how that meeting would go considering she told Naruto about Kushina. Naruto would sooner gut Kushina than ever accept her now.

Naruto now hated the whole village right back hundred-fold and Kurami glad to see her host has already realized the pain and suffering he went through just to fit in wasn't worth nearly dying for and gave him access to her chakra at all times and began teaching him how to utlize it, of course he was a bit too young currently to fully use her tailed cloak states yet and would have to wait a few years before he could use them, but he could actually use her chakra arms which he used to lethal effect to slaughter several villagers and shinobi, he used them to the same skill as his mother could use her chakra chains if not better and he was currently just 4 years old. Just a few days prior, Naruto had massacred an entire gathered mob of villagers and ninja some of which were low jonin in skill and level and even had backup chunin from the Hyuga and Uchiha clans, and Naruto still massacred them only taking a little damage.

Konoha's people were terrified as the hated 'demon' brat now hates them right back and its even worse towards them as he intimidates everyone just with a growl or glare. They tried complaining to the third Hokage but he could do nothing or rather he had also been disgusted by the village demonizing a boy who originally would've been one of the most loved and revered children in Konoha, being the son of their beloved Fourth Hokage even if they didn't know that fact. The very way Naruto looked physically should've tipped many people who knew Minato off immediately considering Minato was the only one to have that particular blonde shade color. Sadly Sarutobi even knew Kushina had survived but had foolishly abandoned her child to the hatred, due to her own emotional pain getting to her and Naruto would likely now prefer to see her dead than ever give her a chance of redemption. Even children Naruto's own age weren't safe from his wrath as when a group of them picked on him last week, Naruto brutally ripped them to pieces with his chakra arms and even killed their parents too.

Naruto walked around the village getting a wide berth by the villagers and bumped into someone, a woman, he growled and created several chakra arms which shot at the woman only to meet a set of orange chains that came from her back, the chakra arms and chains wrapped around each other and cancelled each other out. Naruto's hateful cold blue eyes looked up into a pair of very saddened and regretful tearful violet eyes.

The woman had long fiery red hair that reached her ankles, she had violet eyes, a slender feminine figure, fair colored skin, she wore a high collared beige blouse over a blue house dress, a black clip was in her hair on the left side to keep it out of her face, and she had a wristband on her left wist and on her feet were lavender shinobi sandals. Yes this was Naruto's mother Kushina Uzumaki, she had suffered from emotional pain for the past 3 years which caused her to foolishly briefly view her son as the rest of the village did despite the fact her common sense roared at her that she was being hypocritical considering she was the very previous Jinchuriki of the Nine-Tails, but the pain of losing her beloved Minato and her precious son being forced to become the third Nine-Tails Jinchuriki was too much for her recovering state of mind to take especially with all the hatred the village was showing towards him, so after only 6 months of increasingly reluctantance raising her son, she abandoned him and vowed to never again want him near her, unless Sarutobi wanted him dead. But several months ago, she suffered a horrible nightmare which opened her eyes to the great mistake she had made in leaving Naruto. Both her parents, Mito, and Minato appeared in the nightmare and yelled at her saying that she was a coward who gave into peer pressure that she was no true Uzumaki like Mito and the other Uzumaki and that she was worse than the lowest scum in the world, along with other derogatory names, Minato even saying the woman she was currently was a monster and that he didn't marry a monster. That terrible nightmare completely snapped Kushina out of her emotional pity party and she began to look for her wrongfully abandoned child to make amends and raise him with love like she should've been doing from the very start. Kushina had been informed by one of her old comrades about her son's change of behavior after a brutal attack on him last year. How her baby boy now hates the village right back and would gladly see them all dead at his feet. Kushina was both enraged and saddened. Enraged at not only the village for taking it so far, but also enraged at herself for not keeping her son safe from the hatred like she should've been doing and letting the pain of losing Minato get in the way of her more important maternal instincts. She was deeply saddened that her son now hates everyone right back and would rather kill them than view them as his future comrades and precious people. But the red haired woman knew she only had herself and the village to blame, she would gladly let her son kill her... if he felt it would help him. "Naru-chan…" Kushina whispered to him her eyes tearing more seeing her baby boy's eyes only narrow at her more without any change in emotion.

Naruto narrowed his eyes, he knew who this woman was, Kurami had told him. "Yes Naruto-kun that's her, your so called mother my former host before you Kushina Uzumaki. She abandoned you after only a few months with you, because she couldn't handle the loss of your father the fourth who was the one to seal me inside you. I could feel her reluctance to keep you around even from in here." "Kushina Uzumaki what do you want with me? Another attempt to avenge the Fourth Hokage? I will kill you before you even lift a finger," He formed more chakra arms which swayed behind him similarly to her own chains and Kurami's tails.

It greatly broke Kushina's heart to hear her son actually threaten her life and didn't even call her mom or mother but just by her actual name, she knew she had fucked up letting the peer pressure of the village's hatred get to her. She had to make amends to her baby boy and show how sorry she was for the mistake of leaving him and would never leave him ever again. This wasn't how Kushina imagined her future family life to be while she had been pregnant with Naruto, she imagined herself, Minato, and Naruto living peaceful happy lives in Konohagakure, Naruto growing to become as strong as her and his father, no even stronger and finding love of his own and starting his own family. She never imagined a masked Uchiha would ruin her family's happy future in the way, he would unseal the Nine-Tails from her body and make it attack Konohagakure which made her husband have to use a seal she taught him to split the Nine-Tails sealing half of it within himself and the other half within their son and dying because of it.

Because of the masked Uchiha, Kushina lost trust in the entire Uchiha clan, even becoming distant from her once best friend Mikoto Uchiha much to the latter's sadness.

Kushina tearfully looks at her little boy who looked at her like she was a threat to be put down before she could harm him in any way.

1152212.content:
Naruto sent a barrage of chakra arms at his mother before she could even utlize her chains to defend herself. several arms were in a fist as they struck Kushina full on sending her flying back into a vendor the villagers screamed and ran for the hills getting a safe distance away to still see the fight. Kushina groaned in pain as she stumbled shakily up onto her feet, blood dribbling from her mouth from the harsh hit. She knew her son had every right to hate her and want her dead at his feet, the fact he had the right made her feel even worse for letting the villager peer pressure get to her. She knew she should've been much stronger than she was. She just stood smiling to her baby boy with blood dribbling out of her mouth, her violet eyes full of the maternal love all mothers especially the best example mothers show their children.

Naruto appeared in front of her in a burst of speed, his blue eyes now a ferce red with slit pupils, his teeth and nails eloganted and sharp and his hair more wild with his whisker marks being thicker and darker. Kushina knew from seeing her son's currently feral features that Kurami was letting him use her chakra. Kushina's smile became a bit bitter knowing her former bijuu likely took better care of her own child than she his own biological did.

"Why do you not fight back to defend yourself Kushina Uzumaki? Surely the former host of the Nine-Tails can do better than this?" Naruto asked in a feral like tone while using Kurami's chakra. He was confused on why she wasn't fighting back, especially what Kurami had told him about his mother, she should've been able to easily suppress his and Kurami's chakra, yet she wasn't doing anything and had just stood there as he struck her and was still just standing there.

Kushina smiled sadly and lovingly at him. "Because I have no right to defend myself from your justified actions Naru-chan…If you wish to beat me…Beat me until I almost die….I will take all your hatred of everyone on myself." she held her arms out wide smiling to her son. "Give it all to me Naru-chan, take out your rage on the village on me, then when you had your fill and I have recovered, I will show you all the love that should've been shown to you from the very beginning my precious sochi,"

Kurami growled from her cage, knowing this was exactly how her former host was. The naive thinking she could beat hatred with love, which she learned from her predecessor Jinchuriki Mito Senju nee Uzumaki. The Nine-Tailed Bijuu Queen snorted. 'As stupid and foolish as you always were Kushina. Do you really think Naruto-kun will just stop nearly killing you? The Hokage himself will likely have to intervine to save you. If you think him beating you alone will be enough to satisify him, you are greatly wrong.' She was laying down with her head resting on her crossed forearms as she watched the show from within the seal.

Naruto narrowed his crimson cold eyes and then burst forward delivering a powerful right hook to Kushina's face sending her flying again as he then sent a chakra hand which grabbed Kushina and began to crush her. Naruto then made the arm slam Kushina down onto the ground hard making her cough and spit out blood. Naruto made the arm lift Kushina up and then slammed her down again. "So you think you can take my hatred of the village on yourself Kushina Uzumaki? Very well then! Let's see how much of my hatred you can take!"

The nearby villagers had heard what Kushina called Naruto and were all shocked that their beloved late fourth hokage's wife had called the demon child her sochi. But as they looked at him more, the blonde hair made them all think of the Fourth Hokage, they knew the red eyes were because he was using the demon's power...the original blue color of his eyes made several of the older villagers also think of their fallen leader and they began to realize the horrid truth that had been hidden from them this time. If the fourth's wife called the demon brat her sochi that would make him her son and if he was her son than he was also the son…their beloved fallen Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze. The realization completely stunned the villagers as they watched the boy beat down on Kushina.

Naruto made the arm extend and slam Kushina through several shops and buildings before he brought her back to him as he cocked his fist back and then punched her straight on in the face again sending her hurtling through several shop windows and walls.

Kushina landed hard on her back on the street with a boom, several bruises on her, she felt she couldn't move one of her arms or leg, and bleeding all over as several ANBU now arrived to see the badly wounded widow of the fourth hokage.

"Kushina-sensei! Who did this to you?!" one ANBU woman with a cat mask and long purple hair replied she sensed a foul familair chakra coming fast and she gasped seeing who it was.

Naruto then appeared and pinned the wounded Kushina down to the ground, his chakra arms holding down her limbs.

"Demon! You dare harm Kushina-sensei after you took her child and husband away from her, you dare to cause her even more grief?!" The cat masked ANBU exclaimed drawing her sword.

"Yugao-chan no!" Kushina called out. "Let Naru-chan finish his work…I deserve this beat down he is giving me and more,"

Yugao was confused on why her former sensei called the demon brat with such a familial term, her hand clenched her sword but she froze seeing Naruto's red eye gaze briefly turn on her and one of his chakra arms was swaying at her daring her to attack him, the chakra hand was clenching as if ready to defend its wielder.

"Yugao-chan, the entire village made a terrible mistake hating Naru-chan…It wasn't his fault the Nine-Tails attacked, he was only just born on that night and he was born before the fox even appeared at all in the village," Kushina told her former pupil.

"Kushina-sensei what are you saying...if he was born before the fox even appeared…Then that means…!" Yugao gasped realizing,

"Yes he has nothing to do with the attack, he was just an innocent baby born to two loving parents," Kushina continued. "His parents were so happy to finally be parents after 10 months of waiting, he was so beautiful and innocent. But things turned south when a mysterious intruder had somehow gotten in the barrier, his parents and several important people in Konohagakure had made to help the mother birth her child safely,"

"Why did the mother need a barrier Kushina-sensei?" Yugao asked.

"Because his mother was a Jinchuriki just like he is now in fact she was the very Jinchuriki for the Nine-Tailed Fox before he became its Jinchuriki," Kushina told the shocked ANBU. "Yes believe it or not the Nine-Tails has actually been kept secretly within the village since the time of the First Hokage sealed in a Jinchuriki."

That revelation just shocked the villagers to learn the demon had actually been a member of their village, since before several of the current generation's parents were even born.

"Who…Who were the Jinchuriki Kushina-sensei?" A shaky Yugao asked her sword already having dropped to the ground from the shock of this revelation before her.

"The first Jinchuriki was none other than Hashirama-sama's wife Mito Uzumaki, she was the very first host of the Nine-Tailed Fox," Kushina told them.

"Lord First's wife contained the demon fox?!" A rookie ANBU with a monkey mask exclaimed shocked.

1211222223.content:
Five years had passed since that fateful day in the training field and much had happened. Wars had come and gone, evil organizations had been defeated and through it all Hinata had never wavered in her path. Now she sat here, Hokage with a number of paperwork in front of her that she was slowly processing.

She had become the youngest Hokage in history, taking over from the Godaime in Tsunade in interesting fashion. At fifteen, she had challenged the Hokage for her spot atop Konoha and Tsunade, possibly due to the alcohol she had been drinking, accepted the challenge.

It was a surprise to everyone that Hinata had won. With aggression and precision that nobody had known about, she had effectively overthrown the hierarchy and now sat at it's peak.

From there she had made a name for herself and with the power of the ANBU at her disposal, none had been able to stand against her. At first she had abolished the horrendous procedure of branding in the Hyuga clan. Of course the elders and her father had spoken against it, That was the last they had spoken at all.

That had been the first part in a long and meticulous plan. With the power of the Hyuga clan backing her every move and the citizens seeing that she had defended those who had suffered for so long, she was a godsend. Her actions throughout the battles with the Akatsuki, proving herself victorious made her even more popular.

Then she started adjusting the laws and with the help of her friend in Ino Yamanaka, the minds of the citizens of Konoha had slowly but surely begun to change. The new leader of the Yamanaka clan had been part of her plan all along and as soon as that day in the clearing had passed she had begun meeting with Ino more often, becoming friends with her and in her own may helping manipulate her mind. She had spoken of the joy and wonder of breaking a well known boy and at first Ino had been hesitant, until Hinata mentioned how she could have something similar were she to break the last Uchiha.

It had only begun to spiral from there.

As Hokage and with Ino using her family jutsu, the laws had changed in a peaceful manner and those that spoke against them now thought otherwise.

At first it was little things, things which went under the radar and had minimal effect on day to day activities.

Then legalized slavery came into play. Under the decorum, it was now perfectly legal for a woman in Konoha to own another human.

That had been over a year ago.

As Hinata leant back in her chair, she could feel the chair squirm beneath her. The woman had once been a Kunoichi of Sunagakure. Part of the pact that Hinata had made with the Kazekage after she had saved him from Akatsuki was that every six months a dozen slaves were to be sent to her village. It seemed absurd at first but Gaara had been able to use this as a way to lessen the load on his prison. Precious water once used to keep the prisoners alive was now being used for other things. Similar pacts now existed with Kumo and Kiri. Iwagakure had not yet accepted her deal, mostly due to the Tsuchikage but she had already set up plans with the next in line to the seat. Iwa would see things her way, it was just a matter of time.

The Kunoichi beneath her had once been arrested under suspects of treason and now served as nothing more than the Hokage's chair. Completely bound and sealed with no access to her chakra, Hinata enjoyed the feeling of the naked woman's breasts pressed against her back. From the moan the woman always elicited when Hinata sat on her, she assumed that she did as well.

A majority of the slaves in Konoha were male but every now and again a woman would try and own another woman. Part of the decorum she had filled out, in order to make it official the women had to fight in a sanctioned bout where the winner would become the new owner of the loser. As Hokage, she had never lost a fight.

Men had no such privilege.

"The cleaner will be around again tonight to feed and water you and help you relieve yourself," Hinata said to the furniture beneath her. "If I find out that you didn't eat all your dinner however... well I'll let you think of your punishment."

Hinata said this at the end of every night, more as a form of reassurance than anything else. The first night the chair had refused to eat and instead tried to bite off her own tongue when the gag had been removed. The two missing fingers ensured that she would never do so again.

Running her fingers through her hair, Hinata stood up from the desk. With her work done for the day, she had a bit more time than normal before sundown. Now what could she do with her extra time?

Eyes that soaked up every detail it could find and store it away for later after a second's glance, as well as that of a killer, someone who was familiar with the ugly side of reality.

With little effort, Naruto went inside the box.

Sakura contemplated Ino's offer. On one hand, before running into Ino, she had no plans on actually eating Naruto. She wanted to keep him around forever as her useless tiny little slave. "One month then!" Ino countered. She was determined to watch Naruto get eaten it seemed.

NOW a month was a long time to be free from Ino's interference with Sasuke. Was keeping Naruto around really worth passing the opportunity to have Sasuke all to herself for a month?

123121111121112211.content:
Kurenai stood at the edge of the training grounds absolutely flabbergasted at the events that she had just witnessed. After Ino and Sakura had assured her that they couldn't lose against Hinata, the two girls went and did just that. At the center of the field laid the beaten and moaning forms of Ino and Sakura, while Hinata stood over them breathing heavily but, for the most part unharmed. The young Hyuga bore only a few scrapes and cuts from thrown kunai and shuriken, while her worst injury was just a busted lip who's bleeding was already coming to a stop. The lips being curtesy of the one blow that Sakura had managed to land. In fact it was the only blow the two girls had actually managed to connect throughout the whole match!

Kurenai had spent most of her Chunin career watching over Hinata when she had been younger. During that time she had tried and failed so many times to get the girl to show what she could really do, but it never seemed to be enough to draw out that potential that Kurenai had been sure was in her. After a time she had truthfully started to lose hope in the young girl. Even starting to think that she would be better off as a simple housewife or slave for some girl or even herself in the future. This however, proved beyond a shadow of a doubt that she had been right about Hinata all those years ago. This sweet and deceptively shy girl could be down right terrifying if she wanted to be. It was a shame it only came out for the sake of some rapist scum turned slave.

Turning her still disbelieving eyes towards her beaten students, Kurenai assessed their injuries and winced. Ino lay on the ground, gasping for breath. It wasn't from being out of shape either. No, Ino was having such a hard time breathing because of the chakra strike Hinata had delivered to her chest, right over her diaphragm. Outside of the breathing issues, Ino was also sporting what looked like red pinpricks over her right arm and left leg; a clear indication that Hinata had managed to close some chakra points with her strikes. If Kurenai wasn't mistaken, Ino's left arm was either broken or heavily fractured from stupidly trying to block a chakra powered kick. Of the two Ino was sadly the best off.

As soon as the fight had started, Sakura ran in and tried to pummel her opponent to submission; a very stupid move when fighting a Hyuga. Quickly losing both of her arms within minutes of begining, only managing to get one clean blow due to Ino distracting the girl with kunai and shuriken, Sakura then made to order her slave to do something. What that something was would remain unanswered as Hinata immediately struck Sakura's throat with a chakra strike. Sakuras vocal cords were either temporarily paralyzed or, Hinata had heavily damaged them, meaning the pinkette would require medical attention if she ever hoped to get her voice back.

Kurenai mentally sighed at her students stupidity for trying to command her slave when her opponent was lest then a foot away and she had already lost the use of her arms. If that wasn't enough, Sakura was also sporting cuts, scraps, a bruised and busted lip as well as a new blackeye. The worst possible injury having been the one that took her down. Hinata had unleashed a full powered chakra thrust into the girls lower stomach area. The only thing that could have been her target was the pinkettes uterus. Kurenai cringed at the thought. Depending on the intent Hinata had laced her chakra with would determine the extent of the injury. Sakura might just suffer major pain and cramps, or Hinata may very well have made her teammate barren and unable to carry child. Only time, and a good medic, would tell.

"I... Win!... Naruto-kun now belongs... to me." Kurenai saw her newest and most disappointing/surprising student look at her expectantly. Cursing under her breath Kurenai considered her options. She could declare the match void thus ending in a draw and no one winning. Doing this however, meant that Hinata was still fully able to use her clans political power to cause enough of a problem for Kurenai that she just might find herself knocked back down to Chunin. Despite her status as sensei she didn't have the authority to declare this as a loss for Hinata when it clearly wasn't. This truthfully left her with only one real option.

Holding back the scowl that threatened to breakout across her face, Kurenai pulled out a scroll and quickly began making a few changes to what had been writen on it. She had written this up as soon as Ino made her idea known to her. On it was a written contract that would, once signed by Hinata and verified by the Hokage, send Hinata into servitude. Kurenai may love the young girl like a little sister, but she was not willing to let even her ruin the punishment of the little would be rapist scum once called Naruto. And yet, here she was making changes to the contract to honor Hinata's winning. Kurenai maybe proud of the girl for showing she had the hidden ferocity of a true kunoichi, but she was also greatly disappointed in her for releasing this scum from his rightful place. She could only hope that the temptation would eventually get to the girl and make her properly abuse the male only to find she liked it. If that happened then all would be well.

Finishing the changes to the document and making sure that Ino, Sakura's and her own signatures were still in place, Kurenai rolled up the scroll and tossed it to the sweet hearted girl. Kurenai couldn't help but, approve as she saw Hinata check over the scroll once, twice, thrice before using the blood from her lip to sign her name in the last spot. The girl clearly wasn't going to take any chances of the scroll being rigged to trick her into signing herself into slavery. Sadly, Kurenai hadn't had the proper time to make such a trap, thus everything on it was the real thing. The older woman let herself scowl openly at seeing Hinata roll up and pocket the scroll before taking her new slaves hand and guiding him out of the training grounds. As far as Kurenai was concerned she felt Hinata should be ordering her new slave to carry her to the Hokage's tower so he can stamp the document and officially rename Hinata as his new owner.

Shaking her head, she promised herself that she'd get Hinata to treat her slave as he was meant to be used and enjoy it if it was the last thing she did. For now, she had to deal with two sorry excuses of kuniochi, who just so happened to be her beaten students. 'Oh joy.' She thought.

When they arrived she led Naruto to her room.

"So... Naruto-kun h-how a-a-are you feeling?"

"Uh well I'm really grateful you got me away from Sakura and Ino. They were horrible! I'm still sad about being a slave though. Hey is there anyway you can free me?"

Hinata shook her head, "I wish I could but once you are a slave you'll always be a slave. But that doesn't mean I can't treat you just like a normal person!"

And as my slave you can come with me to training so you can certainly watch as I get instructed too. I can take you on missions as well and no one would say anything about a slave protecting his Mistress."

She exhaled and then took a deep breath.

"Or if you prefer we can leave this village. We can run away and join another village. Your slavery contract is only good in Hi no Kuni (Land of Fire). We can leave and never look back and you can become a shinobi."

Naruto looked up with hope.

"But what if we are caught?"

Hinata shivered, "They could execute me and make you a slave for someone else. Or... w-well they might make us b-both s-slaves." Hinata was clearly nervous about this but she owed it to Naruto to be honest.

"And... you want me to choose? But I'm just your slave."

"Naruto-kun I want you to be happy! I... I... love you."

Naruto was floored by the implications. More emotional whiplash left him in stunned silence. Eventually he had to answer though. Would he decide to leave the village with Hinata and risk disaster but have the chance to be a ninja, or would he play it safe and stay in the village and be the slave of the woman who just confessed her love.

Time Skip

Ino began tearing the woman's night gown apart and fiddled with Naruto's stupid jump suit. The woman kept screaming so Ino backhanded her hard. She cursed at navigating the unfamiliar material, she couldn't get his stupid man part out! The screams had alerted a ninja patrol and Ino had to laugh. While she couldn't actually finish in time she had screwed Naruto royally and ended her jutsu.

Ino woke up in Naruto's apartment and quickly took out a half bottle of Sake and left it on the counter. They would think the boy got drunk, then fueled by lust broke into a woman's home and tried to rape her. Since Kurenai was responsible for Naruto as his sensei she would have to be the one to punish him. With the way everyone hated the little prankster no one would gainsay any punishment Kurenai enacted. Ino really hoped they would seal the baka's chakra and let him be used as their own personal jutsu dummy and all around peon.
1231222221211.title: She takes the body and breaks into a civilian h...

12312222212111.content:
Kurenai was called to the Hokage's office in the morning. There she found her student in chakra suppressing manacles with two ANBU next to him. The third Hokage was angrily puffing on his pipe.

Kurenai bowed before the leader of the village. Hiruzen said, "Kurenai you are here today to decide what will happen with Naruto. Last night he got drunk and and broke into a citizen's home. He injured one of the occupants and attempted to rape one of the civilians. As his sensei it is your decision what will be done with him." The old man's eyes were bitter and angry but the young jonin could sense there was some sympathy in them as well.

"It is your decision and I will not overrule it but I do ask you to remember the boy's childhood. He has not had an easy one and... well he may be driven to certain impulses by his guest."

Kurenai nodded and looked at her depressed student. His vacant expression and sorrow was etched on his face.

The punishments she could mete out were anything from imprisonment, lashings, having his chakra sealed up to and including death. Kurenai had a special hatred for rapists and to have him attempt it on a civilian after being punished for harassing his teammate made it clear that the boy wouldn't learn his lesson. Kurenai's gaze hardened and she looked at the Hokage. "I've decided his punishment."
12312222212111.title: The plan works... Kurenai's decision.

123122222121111.content:
"He dies. I refuse to allow a ninja rapist to live."

The Hokage sighed, he closed his eyes and when he opened them it revealed unimaginable sorrow. But Kurenai was firm. This was her decision and it would be carried out.

Naruto gave a pitiful sob.

The Hokage said, "How will it be done?"
123122222121111.title: Death

1231222221211111.content:
Upon hearing the question from her superior, Kurenai took a few moments to think on how she wanted this done. A kunai to his head would be quick and less bloody. However, the problem was that it was quick. If there was one thing Kurenai hated it was rapists. As far as she was concerned any rapists or attempted rapist had to die in as painful a way as possible. With that an idea came to mind. It involved a certain jutsu that would ensure that this 'scum' suffered a slow and excruciatingly painful death. The fact that it would serve to help strengthen the jutsu user was just a bonus in this case.

"Hokage-sama, I'd like to ask for a specific newly minted genin kunoichi to join us here. She will be the one to preform a certain jutsu I have in mind and rid our village of such 'scum' as this." Requested the woman while making sure to gesture at the defeated looking blond.

The Hokage eyed Kurenai for a moment, wondering just who she'd ask for and what jutsu she had in mind. "And might I ask just which jutsu is it you plan for this young genin to use on Naruto-kun?" He did not like the look of barely suppressed glee and cruelty in his Jūnins crimson eyes. "The jutsu is one that will ensure he suffers properly before meeting death, Hokage-sama. It is one of those few that only Kunoichi can use and will benefit the girl in question."

Color soon drained from the old leaders face as he realized what jutsu Kurenai planed to have used on Naruto. "You don't mean you plan to use that sort of jutsu, do you?" Hurizen did not wish for the boy to suffer needlessly but, if Kurenai planed to use the jutsu he thought she did, the suffering needlessly was exactly what was going to happen to the poor boy. "Yes I do Hokage-sama. Scum like this are nothing but, shit stains on the world. Only right that they look like the shit they are."

Knowing there was truly nothing he could do, Hurizen gave the boy a sad look before leaning back in his chair. 'Might as well get it over with.' He thought. "And just who is it you plan to have execute the boy in such a fashion?" He needed to know if he was going to call them to his office after all. "I would like...."
1231222221211111.title: Who will kill Naruto?

12312222212111111.content:
"Kurenai, are you sure? You want Hinata to do this? You do know her feelings towards the boy don't you?" Questioned the old man. He saw the smallest hint of curiosity enter Naruto's seemingly dead eyes for just a moment. Then it was gone again. "I am well aware of her feelings for this filth. That's exactly why I want her to do it." Replied the woman. Seeing her leader about to question her again moved her to continue speaking. "Hinata-chan is a clan heiress and she sadly already has enough problems with her clan without them learning that she has romantic feelings for a would be rapist like this." Hurizen was the only one to see the look of intense shock on the boys face as he learned that someone had actually wanted his attention and affection. Only now it was far to late to do anything about it. "Hinata-chan needs to move on from her crush and if she isn't here for the execution then I fear she will simply cling to her feelings rather then move on. This could also allow her to have some peace of mind by punishing the fool for ignoring her the whole time they've known each other. On top of that if she uses this jutsu then she'll be all the stronger for it later." Finished the Jūnin.

Hurizen did not like this but, he really didn't have a choice. If he could have found a way to extend the boys time before he met his end then he would have. Sadly, he had nothing he could use. Normally he'd have ordered Naruto to be looked over by Inoichi Yanamaka but, with Naruto being a jinchūriki there were sadly too many risks to let him do a mind dive. So with a heavy heart Hurizen motioned to one of his ANBU to bring the Hyuga heiress to his office.

"Kurenai just tell me, is the jutsu truly the one I think it is?" He felt like he had aged another ten years as he silently pleaded to Kami-sama that the jutsu wasn't truly the one he thought it was. "If your thinking about the ______ no jutsu, then yes it is."

What jutsu is it?
12312222212111111.title: Death by jutsu

choices: Hinata eats Naruto only to breakdown crying after.
Hinata eats Naruto and seems oddly excited to digest him.
123122222121111111.content:
Naruto was confused. He'd never heard of a 'Vore no jutsu' before. He wondered what it did. All he had to go on was that the shy, timid and dark girl from his old academy class; who also seemed to be crushing on him like Sakura did for Sasuke; was the one who would be killing him with it. As well that it would apparently cause a great deal of pain for him. He was just about to try his luck and ask what it was when the old man spoke again.

"You truly plan to have Hinata eat Naruto-kun alive? You know how kind hearted that girl is. She'd never willingly do something that would hurt her loved ones." The old man and Kurenai continued to speak to each other but, Naruto didn't hear any of it. He was too shocked at learning how he was going to die. 'I'm going to be eaten alive?' He thought in shock and horror. While Naruto knew he wasn't the smartest of people even he knew what happened to delicious ramen once it was eaten. He imagined himself as a ramen ingredient in a nice big bowl of Ichiraku ramen. Then Hinata appeared in his thoughts and happily gulped down the ramen. Being killed was one thing, being turned into food for a girl you hardly know was quite another.
-----------

About five minutes passed in the Hokage's office with them waiting for Hinata's arrival. Five minutes of which Naruto used to finally have a panic attack that had been building from the moment he was arrested. It had taken a bit to restrain Naruto as he screamed and fought with the strength and speed of a hysterical young boy who had lost everything he worked for and would soon lose his life. He finally calmed down, well maybe that wasn't the right way to put it but, they had managed to restrain him again after Kurenai kicked the poor boy in his family jewels, hard! It was at this time Naruto's chakra suppressing manacles were traded out for a seal on both wrists that would prevent Naruto from actively using his chakra. This however, did nothing to stop passive use of chakra, such as accelerated healing.

Soon a knock at his doors caught everyone's attention, except Naruto as he was still on the ground clutching his damaged goods. Oddly, Kurenai preformed a genjutsu to hide Naruto's presence in the room before Hinata hesitantly walked in.

Soon enough Hurizen found himself unable to anything but, sit and listen as Kurenai told Hinata the situation without telling her exactly who the criminal was. He watched as Kurenai quickly taught the young heiress the needed hand signs for the jutsu she'd be preforming, as well as listening to how the older woman would be placing a genjutsu on the girl that would make her devour the first thing she saw. He could only wonder how the girl would react once she was released from the genjutsu and packed Naruto into her stomach for a long agonizing digestion.

Finally the time came. Kurenai positioned the girl so that the first thing she'd see once the genjutsu was applied would be Naruto. The poor girl was so determined to be of use to her village and prove herself to her loved ones that she didn't even think to ask who her victim would be. Hurizen could only watch in morbid fascination as Hinata closed her eyes and preformed the hand signs for the Vore jutsu while Kurenai applied her genjutsu to Hinata at the same time she dispelled the one hiding the just recovered blond boy.

Hinata then opened her eyes and only had enough time to let out a gasp in shock of seeing Naruto before Kurenai's genjutsu kicked in.

What is Hinata's reaction to eating Naruto?
123122222121111111.title: Death by Digestion!

choices: Breaks down in tears as Kurenai praises her.
Got up and left for home. (She's in shock.)
1231222221211111111.content:
The moment the genjutsu on Hinata took effect was the moment it was over for Naruto. Something even Naruto himself realized. Still that doesn't mean he'd simply go down without a fight but, when your chakra is being suppressed from being actively used and your still shaking off the pain of getting a hard kick to the nuts, it doesn't leave you with a lot that you can do. That was the truth that Naruto had to except when Hinata's mouth was suddenly enveloping the top of his head. The feeling of his head being submerged into a hot and moist environment and his sight being cut off predictably sent Naruto into another panic. He screamed bloody murder while trying to push the ravenous genjutsu effected shy girl off of him to no avail. With his chakra being suppressed as it was he stood no chance in over powering the young girl who was to be both his executioner and tomb. He cried and screamed, begged and pleaded but, no one would help save him from his fate. A fact that was only solidified when Hinata gave a hard gulp and pulled the rest of his head into her maw, while a wet and slick thing that could only be her tongue, trailed across his face.
----------

While Naruto was panicking at sight of a dark, wet, humid cavern that was a young girls mouth, Hinata had a very different view of what was happening. Despite being effected by the genjutsu Hinata could still see, feel, taste everything that was happening. She felt how she opened her mouth and worked her jaws apart, before gently sliding her lips over Narutoâs head. The moment her tongue touched his skin Hinata was assaulted by a wonderful assortment of flavors that left her a little lightheaded and feeling all warm and tingly inside. She couldn't stop herself from moaning in delight as she pulled the rest of his head into her mouth, while her tongue continued to trail over his flavorful skin.
-----------

While most of Hinata's mind was horrified at the pleasure she was experiencing from consuming her beloved blond, another part couldn't help but, revel in the wondrous sensations and flavors that sent her taste buds into a frenzy. That darker part of Hinata wished she had known how good Naruto tasted earlier on so she could have done this sooner.

The other two in the room did nothing but, observe the progress of Naruto's execution as the shy heiress of the Hyuga clan shoved his head into her mouth. It seemed that she was starting to enjoy the process of consuming the blond boy, then again that could have just been the effects of Kurenai's genjutsu mixing with the Vore jutsu.

They watched as Hinata worked her lips down Narutoâs neck and how a humongous bulge had formed in her throat from Narutoâs head entering her gullet. He did not like sitting back and watching as the boy he'd come to think of as a second grandson was eaten alive by a former classmate of his. As he watched Hinata give the boys shoulders a few Jyūken strikes, he couldn't help but feel shame at having failed to protect yet another precious person of his. He would not look away however, fully intending to bare this memory so as to remind him of yet another life that was cut down before it's time.
----------

Hinata held no knowledge of the Thirds thoughts and feelings of watching her consume Naruto, not that she really cared to when she was currently busy eating.for now, Hinata was solely focused on working down the rest of Naruto. Her conscious mind felt how she worked her lips down Narutoâs neck before feeling his head enter her gullet. Then came the next challenge, his shoulders.

Realizing she couldn't swallow his arms while they're flailing, she delivered a few Jyuuken strikes to the shoulders causing them to go limp. Without his arms and already neck deep inside the shy heiress, Naruto stood little to no hope of getting free. This was only proven further as Hinata gave a hard gulp, bringing the shoulders of the struggling boy into her now widely stretched mouth. It was at this time she started to taste his clothes more then the boy himself. Though they tasted poor in comparison to his skin, they thankfully still managed to hold enough of his flavor to keep her from gagging at the taste and feel of fabric in her mouth.

Satisfied, she began working his chest into herself. This caused the humongous bulge that had grown in her throat from Narutoâs head entering it, to now start disappearing under her jacket as his head would soon enter her chest cavity. His muffled pleas could just barely be heard as he begged her to stop, knowing that he was powerless to stop her himself now.

With another hard gulp she easily slid her lips down his body, claiming most of his chest. She made it a point to taste as much of him as she could while letting his jacket, and in turn chest, soak in her saliva to make him easier to swallow. A small gulp brought enough of Naruto into herself to leave her lips encircling his stomach.

She could now feel Narutoâs head press against her stomachs sphincter and cooed to herself in pleasure. Despite a part of her was still trying to reject the idea that she was enjoying this, she couldn't help but, be taken in by the pleasurable feelings that only swallowing someone alive could bring. Though, whether she would still feel this joyful once she was finished was yet to be seen.

Using her new found leverage, Hinata straitened herself out a bit, raising Narutoâs feet off the ground by a few inches and causing him to swing his legs around wildly. Not wishing to be kicked while she finished her meal, the genjutsu addled girl grabbed his kicking legs and forced them to still. Then she lifted them up into the air while tilting her head back so that he'd be falling into her at a slight incline, before releasing her hold on his legs and instead moving her hands to grip his wiggling thighs.

With that done she gave another small swallow, bringing him in a few more inches and ushering him headfirst into her stomach. No longer feeling satisfied with her slow pace, Hinata began loudly gulping as she downed Naruto's waist and happily cramming his rump into her maw. With just his swinging legs left, Hinata tilted her head back more and allowed gravity to help in sliding them into her mouth. Her belly had of course, expanded accordingly for every inch of Naruto that entered it's previously empty confines.

As she gobbled up his waist she could feel Narutoâs shoulders and chest slide into her stomach. Hinata hummed in pleasure as her stomach widened more and more as her beloved was emptied into it. Her belly already reached such a size that one could easily mistake her to be eight months pregnant, and she still had plenty more to go.

Encouraged by the feeling of him curling up inside of her, she gave hard forceful gulps. She soon felt his arms and stomach enter her belly as she continued to slurp down his calves and shins till only his twitching sandaled feet remained outside of her.

Not wanting to taste his sandals, Hinata quickly removed them and all but, tossed them to the side. Tilting her head back, she widened her mouth a bit, letting the bare feet completely vanish into her mouth. With her mouth closing the moment his toes passed her lips, she tilted her head back again and accompanied it with an audible gulp, the bulge that was the last of Naruto vanishing behind her coat covered chest.

Hinata sighed explosively as Naruto was fully loaded into her stomach, which moved and swayed faintly as the tightly packed boy tried to wriggle against the cramped and slimy confines she had firmly placed him inside of.

âB-bur~p!â she exhaled, licking her lips while smiling widely at how filling and heavy her meal was. She felt Naruto wiggle around as he tried to get into a more comfortable position; this however only caused Hinata to give another belch. âBbbuuuuuurrrrrrppppp!â She muttered a week âexcuse meâ before letting her hands gently caress her now dome-shaped midsection that rested in its fullness against her young but, firm and strong thighs. Her covered bosom pushing hard against her jacket as she panted in the wake of this most delectable dinner.

It was at that moment the genjutsu over Hinata faded, allowing her mind to reassert itself as the one controlling her body. She just sat there for a few moments as her mind tried to catch up with what had just happened. Her attention was quickly brought downwards towards her belly. She went wide eyed at the sight of her large misshapen gut. Naruto's squirming seemed to increase at that moment causing her stomach to jiggle and shift slightly to the sides, while this happened Hinata could also hear muffled noises coming from the organic prison. Likely, Naruto, pleading her to let him out or crying for help.

"Mphhhhh!! Mrrrrrghlllâmph! Arrgghhmmpph!!!" Were the only sounds that could be made out as Naruto tried to move, and contours of his body could be seen under the stretched skin of her uncovered belly as he pushed outward to little use. Hinata couldn't bring herself to do anything more then stare at the creamy-white mass that sat upon her lap while shifting and contorting about oddly due to Naruto's movements. Placing her hands against the great gut she could feel his movements and struggles all the more clearly.

Her mind tried to process this for a few moments before she...
1231222221211111111.title: Hinata eats Naruto!

choices: Look at the vore no jutsu scroll for a way to release it
Try to make herself spit Naruto out
12312222212111111112.content:
Hinata got up and slowly walked out of the office completely oblivious to Kurenai's praising her. The shock of what had just occurred was very overwhelming to the poor shy and kind Hyuga. Hinata walked towards her home, her mind still trying to process what she had just done while under the genjutsu of Kurenai's. She kept her eyes forward, her hands still feeling her bloated gut as if wondering if Naruto was really inside her or if it was just a product of the genjutsu.

She was completely out of it when she walked through the village towards the Hyuga Manor. The civilians had already been told of Naruto's fate and were praising her for finally ridding the village of the 'demon'. Hinata paid them no mind as she continued her trek towards home. Surprisingly and luckily her bastard father Hiashi was at a clan head meeting so he wasn't around to praise her. Hinata got home and entered her room. She finally looked down at her gut activating her Byakugan. The Hyuga heiress could clearly see her crush inside her gut recognizing the red chakra centered around his own gut. She was now getting really terrified of what she had done and if there was a way to free Naruto before her stomach digests him. Despite the crime of attempted rape he had apparently done, Hinata didn't believe someone like Naruto would do such a thing of his own free will or even at all.

Hinata looked determined to get Naruto out of her stomach, no matter what she had to do to get him free. She spoke hoping to comfort him. "Don't worry Naruto-kun…I'll free you somehow…" Hinata was amazed that she managed to speak to Naruto without stuttering, especially with Naruto literally inside her body. She began to think of how to get Naruto out of her…Her mind trying to come up with different ways.
12312222212111111112.title: Got up and left for home. (She's in shock.)

choices: Hinata thinks the Hokage is her best bet.
What better hiding spot then the one that seems obvious. Library.
Ino and Sakura find and drag her to the on going festival.
123122222121111111121.content:
Hinata quickly realized the problem she faced with her line of thought. She was trying to think of a way to free Naruto from her stomach before it could digest him, but she didn't know the first thing about the 'Vore no jutsu' outside of its end result. A result that Naruto and herself we're currently experiencing. If she wanted any hope of freeing Naruto then she needed to find information about the jutsu, preferably the scroll containing details on it.

Now having some idea of what to do Hinata quickly made her way back out of the Hyuga clan compound. Once she stepped outside however, she immediately found another problem. Where was she suppose to look for the information?

Hinata's first thought was the Shinobi Library. The library had a great deal of information, however, she'd only have access to the Genin section, which would only have the most basic of information. This was done so that if a Genin was ever captured by an enemy, or if said genin ever went missing-nin, the village wouldn't lose much of its secrets as most Genin-level knowledge was already equivalent to public knowledge to ninja.

Hinata knew there were other, more advanced sections of the library but she had no idea where the, likely hidden, entrances were or how to access them. Finding them wasn't likely outside the realm of possibility, but it would take time, time that Hinata wasn't so sure they had. As if to agree with such thinking her stomach gave an audible rumble indicating the beginning of what she was sure would be a long and painful digestion for her Naruto-kun.

Panic start to encroach upon her thoughts as she both heard and felt her belly begin digestion. Naruto, who had been amazingly quite and still after she left the Hokages Tower, started squirming again. The concept that her body thought of him as nothing but food likely fully sinking in now. She continued to rub her stomach in hopes it would help calm Naruto and remind him that she was working to try and free him. He just needed to bear with it for a time; at least she hoped so.

Suddenly a thought came to her. Kurenai-sensei had asked permission to have this jutsu used. If that was true then wouldn't that make the 'Vore no jutsu' a kinjutsu, or forbidden jutsu? It was a powerful and very dangerous jutsu; one that almost guaranteed a painful death for the victim but still put the user in a possibly fatal position. Would such a jutsu really be kept at the Shinobi library, even if in secret? Although she highly doubted it there was still that possibility. However, she could also try speaking to the Third Hokage about the jutsu. He clearly knew about it, so why wouldn't he have a scroll she could borrow in hopes of finding a way to free Naruto. Still, the Hokage was the one who cleared the use of the jutsu and for Naruto-kuns execution. Would the Hokage really allow her to find a way to free someone he had given the order to execute?

Her stomach groaned loudly, reminding Hinata that she was on a timer of unknown length. As strong as Naruto was, Hinata doubted he could survive for a prolonged time inside such a hostile environment. She had to make a choice and hope it was the right one as the Library and Kage's Tower were in opposite directions from here. She was going to take a chance and guess that Naruto could survive inside her stomach for a least a few hours. Hopefully she'd have what she'd need to free him by then.
123122222121111111121.title: To Free Naruto?

choices: No! Hinata refuses to give up as long as Naruto still lives.
Her doubts get the better of her. She reluctantly leaves to finish digesting.
1231222221211111111211.content:
Looking back and forth between her possible destinations for a moment, Hinata bit her lower lip in thought and made a decision. Turning towards the Hokages tower the large bellied girl started roof-hopping to her destination. It wasn't too long however before she was forced back down to the ground as so much jumping left her feeling rather queasy. Now where this could have possibly sounded ideal, as if she got sick enough maybe she hurl Naruto back up, her stomach seemed to taking its condition out on Naruto, which she did not want.

With a sigh, she resigned herself to running through the streets as fast as she could towards her destination.
--------

'That, should never have taken so long,' thought Hinata as she leaned against the side of her destination, her breaths coming in small gasps as she tried to recover from had to be one of the most strenuous runs of her life. Turns out the village was throwing a celebration over Hinata having eaten 'the demon child.' On her way to the tower she was constantly blocked off by Konoha citizens who wanted to congratulate her, call her a hero, feel her belly as she digested Naruto, or outright insult and torment the boy in her belly. She had even been dragged off course more then a few times by people and wasted precious time trying to find ways of escaping. What should have been no more then a half hour jog at most for her had nearly taken two whole hours!

Glancing down at her belly Hinata noted that it was very active, though she honestly couldn't tell if that was from her digesting or Naruto thrashing around. Sufficed to say she hoped it was the latter even as a small dark part of her mind whispered words of enjoyment into her thoughts. She shook her head and banished those evil thoughts from her mind.

Feeling that she had wasted more then enough time catching her breath, Hinata quickly made her way inside, shooting through the floors and flying right pass the surprised receptionist. Normally she'd apologize but time was limited and she still likely had work to do before she could get Naruto out, so she felt she could be forgiven for breaking so many protocols by rushing into the Hokages office.

Seeing the elderly Kage sitting behind his desk working in paperwork, Hinata called for his attention before the wooden double doors behind her even finished closing.

"Hokage-sama, I...," she was stopped by her village leader raising a hand, motioning for silence, before finishing up what he was writing. Only once done did he put done his pen and look to her. "Hello Hinata-chan. To what do I owe this visit," questioned the leader in a kindly fashion. Still, even Hinata could tell he was anything but at a hundred percent. The Hokages eyes seemed bloodshot like he had just finished crying a short while ago. His voice, though seemingly normal at first, had a sort of tiredness to it that she had never heard in her leader before. She even managed to notice how his eyes glanced sadly at her stomach, which by now from all her physical activity, was gurgling and sloshing its contents around noisily; a sign that digestion was well underway.

"H-Hokage-sama, I-I." Hinata stopped an took a deep breath. Nothing good would come of her breaking down now, or being to worked up to speak properly. Feeling a little more calm she tried again. "Hokage-sama, I'd like access to any information on the 'Vore no jutsu' in hopes I can find a way to free Naruto-kun before he's digested."

The old leader simply looked back at her with a rather deadpanned expression. "Forgive me for saying this my dear, but Naruto-kun seems well on his way to becoming part of you," he said while gesturing at her stomach which contorted oddly as Naruto tried to fight against the powerful organ that was currently attempting to drown him in acids. "Few ever survive as long as Naruto-kun already has. Even fewer last longer. Why should I give you free access to what is possible one of the most dangerous and inhuman jutsu in recorded history?"

Hinata felt her confidence shake under her Kage's scrutiny. A part of her wondered if she really even should continue trying? It would be so easy to just forget about this and enjoy what time she still had in digestion before Naruto-kun became a permanent part of her.
1231222221211111111211.title: To the Hokage!

choices: Return to the Hyuga compound. Her clan won't bother her, right?
Use an empty room in the nearby Ninja Academy. (Reserved)
12312222212111111112111.content:
It would indeed be so easy to just let Naruto digest. To let him fully become part of her body so they'd always be together. But that didn't make it right.

"B-because I still think I could save him. I don't believe Naruto-kun did any of what he's been accused of, at least not willingly," proclaimed the young Hyuga, her voice gaining strength as she continued on. "I think Naruto-kun was framed somehow and if he really is innocent then he should never have been sentenced to my stomach in the first place. Please Hokage-sama, let me try and save Naruto-kun from this unjust death-sentence."

For the next few minutes the Hokage simply sat in his chair and stared at the increasingly worried young Hyuga. She had finally made it known how she felt, practically saying the Hokage had been wrong to authorize Naruto's execution without outright saying it. A small prickle of fear formed in her chest as she worried that she had just angered the most powerful ninja in the village with her words. That fear vanished however when she saw a small, pleased smile surface from that impassive look he had been giving her.

"Such strong words of conviction from one so young. Very well. If you truly believe there is a chance to save Naruto-kun from this terrible fate then I will trust and believe as well," spoke the old man, his heart alight with hope. He knew the chances of Hinata actually finding a way of freeing Naruto before he was to far gone were slim to nonexistent. Still he could hope. "Well, um... Thank you for that display Hinata-chan." Muttered the flustered Kurenai as she pushed away the blush on her face. "Though, you may want to be careful about who you go showing that too, as well as how often. Your teammates may just kidnap you for themselves otherwise.", joked the older woman, though judging from Ino and Sakura's reactions there might just be some truth to that last part. Hearing their sensei's words Sakura turned away from Hinata as her blush deepened further, while Ino just continued to drool and stare at her large bellied teammate with lust filled eyes.

Hinata simply gave a small innocent smile as a light blush dusted her cheeks. "Hai (Yes Sir/Salute), Sensei."

Not willing to risk her self control crumbling and stealing the girl away herself, Kurenai quickly turned her attention more towards her other two students. "Well, now that I have some idea of your physical abilities how about something chakra related.", she asked without really asking. "I want the three of you to climb these trees without using your hands. Before you ask, you will be channeling some chakra to your feet to help you stick. Too much chakra and you'll damage the tree while catapulting yourself off. Too little however, and you'll fail to stick."

She was just about to continue giving her explanation but, stopped when she saw Hinata walk right past them, heading strait for one of the trees. The team watched in a mix of confusion, fascination and in Ino's case lust as the young girl moved closer to the old tree. Hinata could feel the gazes of her team on her, especially Ino's as the blond was staring at her ass while she walked. Deciding to tease her team a little more, as she was finding it to be quite fun, Hinata gave a little extra sway to her hips. This action not only made Ino's gaze seemingly grow stronger, it also quickly drew the attention of her other teammate and Sensei. The fact that it made Naruto sway and rock about inside of her in such a wonderfully delightful manner only helped to push Hinata into continuing her exaggerated walk.

The team watched Hinata in fascination and arousal as the formerly shy girl lifted a leg and placed it on her chosen tree before gathering chakra. The effect was nearly instant as the tree bark gave out with a loud cracking noise and Hinata stumbled back a few steps. Ino nearly ran over to 'catch' her like a good teammate but, was restrained by their sensei's hand on her shoulder.

For the next five minutes Hinata continued to work on finding that correct level of chakra needed for this exercise. Being a Hyuga this was something she had already learned but, her chakra was oddly much stronger then before. Hinata figured it had to do with her digesting Naruto and that he was somehow strengthening her, both in body and chakra. She was really starting to wish she had been able to do this the day he rescued her from those bullies just before starting the academy for the first time. Her belly rubbled in agreement as it happily squeezed tighter at the wiggling boy, her stomach acids hard at work trying to melt him down into a gooey-patsy soup her body could drink up. She could still feel him screaming inside of her.

As Hinata slowly started to feel the benefits of eating and painfully digesting the one person her heart longed for most, Kurenai was looking at her newest student in awe. Even if Naruto was a demon container there was no way Hinata should be this much stronger then before. Not so early on at least. The only explanation she could think of was that Naruto and Hinata were two halves of the same whole. Soulmates for lack of a better word. Two people who were everything the other wasn't, while still holding enough similarities for them to perfectly coexist.

Kurenai soon had the most wicked and evil grin to ever cross her face. Hinata was taking everything she needed from Naruto. On the day that she fully digested Naruto, Hinata would be as perfect a human could be. No! Hinata was likely to ascend past the limits of being human and become the closet thing the world had seen to a god since the ancient legends of the Sage of Six Paths. There where even older legends of a female God, a goddess who was greater then even the Sage. Supposedly the only reason said woman lost her battle against the Sage was due to the man having the aid of his equally powerful brother. But Hinata could one day change that. All it would take was the time needed for her to fully digest that stupid blond baka of a male.

Kurenai was drawn from her thoughts of Hinata becoming the rightful supreme ruler of the whole world and wiping out the unnecessary male species by the sound of her other two students calling her. "Hmm, yes you two?"

"Sensei I've been wondering, could you maybe teach me and Sakura that jutsu Hinata-chan used on Naruto-baka?", questioned Ino as the two girl looked at her hopefully. Kurenai felt elated at hearing that! She wanted nothing more then to sit down and teach the girls what had to be one of her two favorite jutsu's. Sadly, there were some problems with that. "I would love to teach you two the 'Vore no jutsu' however, unless given approval by the Hokage no Jūnin is allowed to teach the jutsu. Even then it is normally only to be taught to high Chunin level kunoichi. These Chunin are normally forbidden to teach the jutsu as to disobey is to condemn themselves to death by said jutsu. So I'm sad to say it, but neither I nor any other Jūnin and Chunin may teach it to you without the Hokage's approval."

Seeing the dejected looks on her students faces upon hearing she couldn't teach the jutsu made Kurenai seethe in anger at the injustice of such a ruling. She did not think it right that some laws were made just to protect the clearly inferior male half of humanity, especially when it was preventing these two from reaching their full potential as 'true' kunoichi. It was only the fact that she had already thought up a way around said law that allowed her to keep her anger in check.

"It truly is a shame that no Jūnin and Chunin can teach you.", began the older woman in a tone that caught the girls attention. "If only another genin knew the jutsu. As long as it's kept quiet and no catches them, they could easily teach it to every genin and academy ranked kunoichi." Kurenai couldn't help but, smirk at seeing the realization flash through their eyes. She had no doubt that they would have figured it out on their own soon enough, but as their Sensei it was her duty to help speed that growth along.

"Last question Sensei.", this coming again from her blond student. "Are there any jutsu to help speed along or just strengthen digestion?" That and the twinkle in the eyes of the mind-walker both surprised and intrigued Kurenai. "No Ino, I'm sad to say there aren't any jutsu's like that yet. There are however, methods one can use to help things along." This time it was her pink haired student who spoke. "Like what Sensei?" Kurenai tapped her finger to her chin as if she was thinking on the answer. "Well, physical activities tend to help." "You mean like training?" Kurenai nearly chuckled at that one. "No girls. While that type of activity may help somewhat there is truly only one method that gives the results I think you two are looking for, and it just so happens to be quite pleasant."

"Well what is it Sensei?" Both girls were leaning forward in a clear sign of eager anticipation. "The answer is sex." "Sex?!?", asked both girls at the same time. They were loud enough to draw Hinata's attention towards them for a moment in a mix of confusion and curiosity. Thankfully, the lavender eyed girl quickly went back to making sure she didn't plummet down from the top of her tree in a bellyflop; her stomach wouldn't appreciate it after all.

"Yes. Sex. Sexual intercourse is quite tiring and as such makes the body work harder in order to keep up. The stomach is included in this. By having sex a Kunoichi can make her body release stronger acids then they normally do, as well as producing more of it at a time. Kunoichi have plenty of sex related jutsu but, actually fucking produces the best results. It doesn't matter however if you use your normal girl parts, or use the increasingly popular 'Futanari no jutsu' to grow a temporary dick and screw then senseless. Either way it helps facilitate digestion, especially the more alive and wiggling variety of food. The 'Futanari no jutsu' does make it easier to get around the bellies though. " She paused for a moment. "Would you girls like to learn it?"

Will Ino and Sakura try to learn the "Futanari no jutsu" from Kurenai? Or should they try their luck at getting Hinata to teach them the "Vore no jutsu" first?

She personally felt that just an amazing jutsu should be taught to kunoichi while they are in the academy. After all, just look at how much good it had done for her. The girls watched in barely contained excitement as the old buzzard search through a pile of scrolls. "We have an escort mission to Wave country, a bandit extermination, and one to deliver important documents to the Daimyō of Demon Country and her young daughter.

Which mission should they take?

Ino wanted the Demon Country mission as she had not only finished learning the 'Vore no Jutsu' but, had already started learning the 'Futanari no Jutsu' and felt that using it to fuck a Daimyō and said Daimyō's daughter was the best way to celebrate learning the jutsu. That is, if she could actually finish the jutsu. Turns out it took a good bit of chakra and a high level of control to create a fully functional dick; who knew. Of the three girls, Hinata wanted the Wave mission. Yes it apparently involved protecting some old male bridge builder but, it meant getting to see places away from Konoha. And places she could see about secretly teaching some females how to use the 'Vore no Jutsu' to better the world by eating the males.

Kurenai took all the whispered reasons each of her students gave into consideration till at last she came to a decision. "We'll take the Wave Escort mission Hokage-sama." The old man gave a nod before tossing Kurenai the appropriate scroll and motioned for a nearby Chunin to call their client in. The moment said client entered however, left the girls either gagging on the heavy stench of alcohol or scowling in disgust at the oder coming from the old man.

"What the... I swear paid for ninjas, not little girls and their babysitter." Complained the old drunk, earning a scowl from the four mentioned girls. The old man took another look at the younger girls and blinked stupidly at what appeared to be a young girl with a large, moving stomach. He looked to the bottle of sake in his hand and back at the younger girls stomach before shrugging and knocking back more alcohol. He'd seen plenty of weird things when hammered, why should this be any different? "Well either way, I am Tazuna, the Master Bridge Builder of Wave. I've paid for escort and protection, so I expect you to get me back to Wave safely and protect me as I finish building my bridge, even if it cost you lot your lives. Understand?"

The girls simply glared at their client not even acknowledging his words. They would do their jobs, that didn't mean they had to like the client to do so. Their attention was quickly brought back to their village leader whom was clearing his throat. "Team 8, this mission is estimated to last anywhere from two weeks to a month, so pack accordingly. 1231222221211111112121222222.content:
Team 8 looked upon their defeated attackers with gazes of contempt, annoyance and disappointment. Less than a day's walk outside the village and they got ambushed. It might have been an exciting or even scary experience if not for the fact that their 'ambushers' had been stupid enough to hide as puddles of water on the roadside. Had it rained anytime recently, this wouldn't have been such a bad cover. Unfortunately for these two, it hadn't rained in nearly a month, making their disguises rather obvious. Even Sakura and Ino, who had been paying almost no attention to their surroundings in favor of asking Tazuna some questions about Wave, had managed to spot the puddles and realize something was wrong.

The advance warning had been more than enough for the team of Kunoichis to launch an overwhelming counter-offensive on the surprised fools. Hinata had complained about not doing anything as the element of surprise had allowed Sakura and Ino to deal with their would-be attackers all on their own. Said girls were quick to comfort and attempt to subtly seduce the displeased Hyūga, all ignoring how the lavender-eyed girl's gut groaned audibly as it continued to digest its Uzumaki victim.

Kurenai looked upon her charges as they mingled like any true kunoichis would after beating down some fools, ambush or not. Turning her attention back to their would-be attackers, Kurenai sneered at the two defeated males. Gōzu and Meizu, the Oni Kyōdai aka The Demon Brothers. These two were both missing Nin from Kirigakure, the Village Hidden in the Mist, having defected after failing to assassinate the Mizukage. They needed to be dealt with.

"So girls. As Kunoichi, what should we do with our captives?" Kurenai felt this could be a good moment teach them something about life as a ninja. As Kurenai had half-expected, Ino immediately put forward her idea.

"Oh, Sensei, can Sakura and I eat them? We didn't really get to eat a big breakfast and personally I think it's unfair that Hinata gets to have a male contently churning away inside of her belly, but we can't." Kurenai nearly rolled her eyes as a small smile pulled at her lips. She was glad to see her girls were getting along well. The four girls also completely ignored how Tazuna paled at hearing Ino's suggestion, while scooting away from the young Hyūga.

"Normally Ino, I'd agree with you. However, these two are Chunin from Kiri and are well known for their use of poisons. Now if you had a strong immunity or resistance to poisons, I'd let you gobble them down. However, you do not and seeing as how I will not risk you girls being exposed to something they may have flowing through their bodies like that, they are essentially off the menu. While eating them is out of the question, we can use this opportunity for you to learn some interesting interrogation techniques Anko once showed me."

12312222212111111121212222222.content:

After setting landfall in the Land of Waves, Team 8 had found themselves attacked by the deadly assassin Zabuza Momochi, the Demon of the Hidden Mist and one of its Seven Swordsman. The bastard had wielded a massive broadsword shaped like a giant butcher knife called Kubikiribōchō (Decapitating Carving Knife). Sadly, during the fight Hinata had fallen victim to the massive blade, ending with her being bisected. Her teammates had naturally been horrified and futilely tried to put her back together while Kurenai-sensei held off Zabuza. Oddly enough, despite it being a fatal blow, Hinata had managed to survive being cut in half, though she would admit it wasn't something she wanted to experience again anytime soon.

Idly, Hinata ran a hand along her body where she had been cut; below her breasts and right above her Naruto-filled stomach. Unblemished skin was the only thing to greet her fingers. Once that was done, a shroud of reddish chakra started to ooze out all over her lower half. Next thing Hinata knew, she could feel her legs again. The red chakra had somehow rapidly healed her, making her good as new. In fact, outside of the trauma and lingering phantom pains she still had, Hinata felt better than ever!
