Anyhow, after seeing her rise back up, Zabuza freaked out, calling her a jinchūriki or something before running like a bat out of hell. That led to the current point in time where Team 8 was now making the rest of its way towards Tazuna's place. Kurenai appeared to be the worst off with some simple cuts and scrapes as well as mild exhaustion. Hinata had been the only other one to be hit during Zabuza's attack and outside of her shirt and jacket stopping just under her breasts, leaving her entire midsection exposed, she appeared no worse for wear.

Upon arrival, they were immediately greeted by Tazuna's daughter, Tsunami, with the older woman instantly catching Hinata's eye. Tsunami was a comely woman in Hinata's opinion. She didn't own the most exotic clothes, she didn't wear any jewelry, and she clearly hadn't put any makeup on for quite some time. Given her upbringing, it was unlikely she could even afford such things. But she still radiated a natural beauty that would make most of Hinata's peers in Konoha jealous, particularly since she probably didn't even spend a lot of time maintaining her appearance.

Her face was elegant, her features kindly, and her expression seemed like it was permanently frozen into a soft sad smile, as if she was trying to look happier than she really felt. Compared to most people in the Land of Waves, Tsunami's skin was fair and it contrasted strongly against the dark hair that spilled down the sides of her head and back like water. Her gait and the way she carried herself was not particularly graceful as one would expect from the noblest of ladies or deadliest of kunoichi, but it was casual and it made her far more approachable. And while Tsunami was a mother, she didn't look as though she ever carried a child in her life. If Hinata didn't know better, she would have thought the woman was only a few years older than herself. At least, that's how the young ninja saw her.

Hinata had to wonder just what Tazuna and his late wife were thinking when they decided to name such a gentle-looking woman after one of nature's most destructive forces. Hinata focused intently on the young beauty, ignoring all else around her in favor of drinking in the appearance of their client's daughter, burning her image to memory. Idly she noticed how Tsunami's eyes locked on to her as well, only for the woman to don an almost awed look as a light blush soon colored her cheeks. Hinata smirked at that. Even without Byakugan, Hinata could clearly see the hint of attraction enter her interest's eyes. Deciding to make the first move, Hinata gave Tsunami a wink before making a small kissing motion to her. Like Hinata had hoped, Tsunami's blush grew darker before turning away, clearly embarrassed with herself.

Hinata's teasing of what she hoped would be the first in her small harem was cut short as a new voice made itself known. "Why do you even bother? Your're all going to die. Gato's too strong." Turning to look at the source of the voice, Hinata found what appeared to be a young ten year old boy with black spiky hair wearing a green jumpsuit over a yellow shirt and a simple pair of sandals. His dark-coloured eyes looked out from under the brim of his blue and white striped hat. Hinata instantly felt a small twinge of dislike for the boy upon seeing how he clearly had to be Tsunami's child, more for how his being around would make taking Tsunami for herself all the more difficult.

"Inari! Come here and welcome your grandpa home." Cried out the old drunk in a jovial tone, clearly happy to see his grandson once more. The now named Inari did as asked, moving across the room to hug his grandfather. "Welcome back Grandpa." Hinata couldn't help but note that the boy's tone seemed rather dead. "Inari these ladies are the brave ninja who kept your grandpa safe on his way home. Be sure to thank them for their hard work." While team 8 may have a low opinion of males, even more so with this drunken lout, it still felt good to be acknowledged for their work.

"You're all going to die. You should just go home." 'And there goes the warm fuzzy feeling' Hinata inwardly snarked. Standing in the kitchen, Tsunami was preparing a dinner for her family and the ninja her father had hired. As she went about preparing the food, her mind continued to return to her earlier thoughts. When her father returned, she had been so relieved and happy to know that he was okay. She felt a tingling burst of excitement at the thought. She'd never tell anyone, but ever since she was little and had seen a snake swallow down something much larger then itself, she had always wondered what it would be like if she could do that to people. It was her sick twisted secret. One she hoped never came to light.

"Tsunami-chan." Letting out a small yelp in shock, Tsunami quickly turned around to see the smirking face of the very girl she had just been thinking about. "H-Hinata-chan! Hello," sputtered the woman as she tried to calm her nerves. Hinata's hot, smoldering gaze full of what looked like barely suppressed lust was making the task of calming herself nearly impossible. "C-can I help you, Hinata-chan?" 'Like out of those clothes and into my bed?' she thought only to immediately smack herself mentally for such thoughts.

He didn't want to accept the fact that he was going to die here. He wouldn't go out in some great blaze of glory against impossible odds as Konoha's Hokage. No, he was going to die as if he was nothing but, a piece of food for what had to be the shyest girl his age in the whole village. No great battlecries and flinging unstoppable jutsu for him. All he'd get was his screams of agony as Hinata's stomach churned and sloshed around him, rubbing still weak but stinging acids into his skin and muscles until there was nothing left but, bones. Not an easy thing to do as he felt like he had been trapped here for hours already, his clothes having dissolved sometime ago only helping to reenforce this idea. "Hello Imouto." Greeted the heiress as she placed a small kiss on the cheek of the little girl now squirming in her arms. The little girl immediately stopped wiggling and threw her arms around Hinata's neck and pulled herself closer, hugging Hinata. "Have been a good girl Hanabi-chan?", Hinata asked, ignoring how Hanabi's weight was pressing down on top of her Naruto-filled stomach.

Hanabi nodded with a "Uh-Huh" and a small smile to indicate that she had been good. While the rest of Hinata's family may think poorly of the young heiress, Hanabi thought the world of her big sister and would be practically anything for Hinata; one might even think the little girls feelings were a little too strong to be simply sisterly love.

"Hey, Née-chan? Why's your tummy feel so funny?", asked the little girl with a confused expression on her face. Hanabi had been referring to Naruto-kun as Whiskers ever since she had been shown a picture of the boy. "Yes Hanabi-chan, Whiskers." Hinata was surprised to see Hanabi's expression go from confused and curious to barely contained annoyance, "What about him?" Thinking on it Hinata had an idea as to why Hanabi was acting like this. Hanabi, like most younger siblings, didn't like having to share their older siblings attention, in this case Hinata's. Hanabi likely felt like she was competing with Naruto for Hinata's attention, so she figured explaining how she got her belly would leave Hanabi very happy.

"Well, the reason my tummy feels so funny is because I ate him!" Hanabi just stared at her née-chan's smiling face with wide confused lilac-tinted eyes as her mind slowly played back what Hinata had just told her, trying to find the hidden mean behind her words. It only took her a few moments to realize that she meant it exactly as she said, causing Hanabi's eyes to widen so much in shock that Hinata was afraid they'd pop out of her head. The little girl looked down at the great cream colored gut that she had been half-sitting, half-laying on this whole time in a mix of shock, awe and slight envy. Hinata giggled at that, bringing Hanabi's attention back to her sisters face, a question already forming. "How?"

"How about this Hanabi-chan? We can go to the dinning room and I can tell you and father all about it at the same time as we eat. After that if you want, you stay the night with me and ask any other questions you have then. Okay?" Hanabi seemed ready to agree right then and there but, hesitated for a moment before asking, "Will you let me rub your tummy, Nee-chan?" Hinata could even believe her sister felt the need to ask. "Of course you can! Your Nee-chan would really appreciate a tummy rub from her wonderful imouto.", said the heiress as she opened the door to the dining area their father was no doubt waiting in.

Upon seeing what was awaiting them inside left Hinata so surprised that she could only stand there for a moment in shock. It was a feast! From what she says and what I see before me, you have done an excellent job of ridding us of such filth. As such, I felt a celebration was an order and word is that you are still quite hungry despite your previous meal." "Sakura? Is that you?" Ino said in fear.

Ino followed Kurenai into a small house and hides behind a counter. Sakura was outside of the house to see where they are. Ino was shaking in fear of her life while Kurenai makes sure that the coast is clear. Sakura couldn't find them and she let out a roar before leaving the house.

(Warning a couple of bloody and gory chapters coming up)

Unbeknownst to Sakura, the Eight Trigrams seal on Naruto's own belly was breaking down due to her own stomach acid and would be freeing the strongest bijuu the Kyuubi No Yoko or Kurama as he was actually named to exact his revenge upon the village that kept him confined for several decades within three Jinchuriki each of the same clan.

Naruto was screaming and pleading his teammate to release him and felt a pain in his gut that wasn't coming from the surrounding acid. The seal on his stomach was glowing a dangerous red causing the acid nearest his belly to steam and evaporate, the seal and was pulsing as if something was being released and trying to get out. His blue eyes turned a deadly red with slit pupils, his nails and teeth elongated into claws and fangs, an orange aura of chakra was faintly seen around him as it became more visible vastly healing the acid damage and pushing it back, the chakra seal was straining to hold back the red chakra which was easily overloading it. The Chakra seal then vanished form Naruto's body.

In Naruto's mindscape


Naruto had retreated to his mind to escape the horrid reality of being digested by the girl he cares for and was now in front of a massive cage with a paper seal that was slowly dissolving and sees a giant pair of red eyes looking down at him with evil intentions. He shivered ar the sight as the monster came into view, it was a massive orange-red kitsune with red eyes and long ears, a black mask surrounded its eyes from its ears and it possed a humanoid upper body with opposable thumbs on its hand like paws. nine tails twice the length of it's own body swayed in the air behind it.

Naruto looked terrified at this monster. "You... you're...the Kyuubi No Yoko!"


"That's right little boy, and thanks to your stupidity and crush on this banshee, I will soon be free to exact my revenge on this worthless village!" the Kyuubi said with a cruel grin showing his wicked sharp fangs which could or would crush Sakura when he gets outside.

"You mean you were...?!" Naruto was shocked.


"Sealed within your puny body brat yes, by your own parents no less," Kyuubi grinned at Naruto's shocked expression.


"M-My parents?! But the fourth was the one to defeat you!" Naruto exclaimed.

"Yes Boy who do you think i meant and your mother Kushina Uzumaki helped him seal me within you, she was my prior Jinchuriki to you," the Kyuubi was loving spoiling things for Naruto to break him in order to fully possess his body and exact his revenge. He even took care of the remnants of Minato and Kushina that they put in the seal, he ate their remnants and they were most delicious...revenge never before had tasted so good for the bijuu.

Naruto was horrified at the news. "N-No...!" He was broken by the revelations the fox told him.


"Yes and your parents thought they were smart to leave a part of themselves in the seal but I took care of them!" The giant fox demon licked his lips.

That shattered Naruto fully and he robotically came up to the gate. Everything the horrid treatment, the way Sakura never even cared about him even now, the revealing of his heritage that the old man never told him. He no longer had a reason to try and hold this monster back anymore. He watched without emotions as the paper on the gate fully dissolved.


Kyuubi threw open the gates without effort with one arm and grinned evilly at the boy. "To honor you boy, I will end you painlessly." he charged a Bijuudama and fired it as a projectile at Naruto who did nothing to avoid it as the purple ball struck and caused a great explosion. When it cleared Naruto was completely gone, having been obliterated by the Bijuudama.

Kyuubi then opened his eyes seeing he was now fully controlling Naruto's body with his mind destroyed and channelled his deadly Chakra around him forming a cloak like a fox with a single tail more than enough power to deal with the pathetic kunoichi around here. He grinned evilly and stabbed his clawed hand into the stomach tissue and pushed all the way to the outside.

Sakura had been wondering why Naruto had suddenly gone silent so soon when an extremely sharp pain hits her in her stomach. She gasped and held her stomach which was glowing a dangerous red much to her shock and the shock of Ino and Kurenai.

Ino asked. "Sakura you ok?"


"Y-Yeah it might be just indigestion." Sakura said trying to play it off but the pain kept growing and growing until she fell to the ground screaming in agony as bulges appeared on her stomach even more forceful than earlier.


Kurenai was concerned about that greatly as that wasn't the usual symptoms of indigestion and Naruto shouldn't be able to escape from the Vore No Jutsu unless the Chakra seal had broken which was most likely as Kurenai was not a seal master at all.

In a sickening display of gore a bloody tanned clawed hand burst from Sakura's stomach, it had a strange and terrifying red aura resembling a claw around it.

Kurenai gasped in shock. "N-No...!"

'Naruto' pulled himself out of a shocked and horrified Sakura with a glowing red aura around his body resembling that of a fox. His orange jumpsuit was torn apart by the acid treatment yet his skin was perfectly fine and any acid damage quickly healed up. He looked st them with red slit eyes and a wicked fanged grin that didn't belong on his face. "Foolish little kunoichi, did you honestly think your weak little mortal bodies and jutsu could get rid of me?! Me the Kyuubi No Yoko, a being made of pure Chakra? Finally after many decades of being trapped inside you humans I can at last exact my revenge!"

Ino screamed but Kyuubi quickly struck impaling his clawed hand through her back and out her chest ending her life in an instant.


Kurenai tries to move to get away but Kyuubi froze her with his powerful KI. Kyuubi smirked at the newly made Jonin and then blurred by her and held something in his hand, her own head which forever had a look of shock and horror. Her body fell backwards and spewed blood on the floor like a fountain.

Kyuubi turns his attention to the dying Sakura who was so terrified she couldn't move at all. He shot a giant Chakra claw at her and grabbed her making sure the palm of the claw muffled her voice. He squeezed her with a smile that was evil incarnate, until Sakura literally exploded into gory entrails all over the room.

Kyuubi laughed like a madman happy to be free at last and there was still much revenge to have.

"What a shame, Father would be most disgusted to see what has become of his Ninshu teachings," He then turned and took off into the air leaving behind a completely wrecked village that once prided itself in being the first and strongest shinobi village. But it had fallen after Kurama's previous attack, they let their own foolish hatred and pain blind them to the truth and paid the ultimate price for it in the end.

It reached her ankles (waist in the anime) with should-length strands that framed both sides of her face and a black clip that parts her hair to the left. Generally, she wore a high-collared, sleeveless blouse under a long, loose-fitting dress with a wristband on her left wrist and standard shinobi sandals. While her style of clothing normally consisted of this, she has been seen wearing it in varying colors. She stood near an unconscious Naruto protectively.

Kushina smiled which had malicious intent in towards Kurenai, before she shot golden/orange colored chains at the Jonin easily catching her and restricting her movement. Kurenai would be just the first of many suffers of her wrath. Then Sakura was next.

Kurenai struggled to free herself, but the chains sapped her chakra tiring her out quickly. Kurenai was not one of the best ninja when it came to stamina unfortunately, the worst possible thing when facing an Uzumaki who were known for their literal near godly levels of stamina and endurance.

A gift from the Nine-Tails that she retained even after the fox was ripped out of her and now was sealed within her only son. After Kushina ate Kurenai, the pink haired weakling bitch was next and then she would go after the Yamanaka bitch and torture her until she reveals the truth behind the 'rape' that Naruto had 'done'.

Kurenai only had time to scream once before her head was quickly engulfed by the red haired former jinhcuriki and was slowly gulped further down inside her. Kurenai was disappearing slowly inside the belly of the mother of the boy she had tried to have executed. She felt the chains disappear from her since she was inside Kushina already.

Kushina gulped the genjutsu mistress slowly getting her head in her stomach and her dress began to extend out with her growing belly. She swallows down Kurenai's chest and shoulders and starts on her midsection. Her belly slowly grew bit by bit as Kurenai was swallowed. Soon Kushina slowly gulps Kurenai down getting her arms down and soon only her kicking legs remained out of her mouth. Kushina smiled around the legs and put a hand on the feet. She gulps slowly pushing them in until Kurenai was fully inside her.

Kurenai was slowly being forced into a curled up ball within Kushina's growing stomach.

Kushina gave a final gulp sending Kurenai down to her final resting place inside her stomach. Kushina being a tomboy in here youth gave out a loud belch.

*BURRRRRRRRRP!*

Kushina simply patted her bloated belly in content as it begins to digest her squirming meal. She sees a dazed Sakura trying to recover nearby. Kushina chuckles with a tic mark at the nerve the little bitch had to demand things of her. "Who am I? I have several names the Red Hot Blooded Habanero, Tomato, the Red Death…But only one name matters to me truly…Kushina Uzumaki!"

She could hardly wait to see his face once she gave him his options. "Your choices are as followed; Being dragged around the village and shown off for all to see and know what you have done before being executed in the village square. Your executioner will be one of your graduating classmates as your death will at least allow us to give students who have some actual worth one more lesson." Kurenai had to hold back a grin as she saw the hope in the boy dwindle. If that was the first option, then clearly the next one could only be worse. And in some ways, it just might be.

"Your second and final option, is to willingly admit to your wrong doings and offer up your freedom in exchange for your wretched life. You will then have a seal of servitude grafted into your very chakra coils. The seal will prevent you from ever attacking a member of the Leaf village unless specifically ordered to by your new master and said order is approved by the Hokage. The seal will forever bound you to the will and commands of the one chosen as your master, who may do absolutely anything to you without fear, as long as the order isn't harmful to the village. You will never again be your own person and only be alive because your master allows you to be. You will retain access to your chakra so as to better serve your master and protect them should it become necessary to do so. You will of course need to follow the orders of your master and should your master be incompassitated for any reason you will follow the orders of the highest ranked Nin with you, unless they are not of Konoha. Lastly, as this crime was against a young woman your new master shall be one of the three girls who graduated from your class." Kurenai leveled her gaze at the clearly broken boy once more. He wore a tracksuit that consisted of dark red pants and a dark red shirt that had black near the shoulders and was dark grey at the neck. He had some bandages on his thigh and a carrying case for kunai. He also wore a small pouch on his belt, and black sandals that left his toes and heels exposed.

The new Naruto's skin tone was pale, almost stark white, and everything about him was narrow and stark, as if he had been locked away somewhere and had been starved of nourishment. Dark eyes fluttered open, exposing brooding red irises against pitch-black sclera.

Turned out she wasn't.

"Yea right, Hanabi's paying me more money than you can imagine to look after you and I'll be damned if I turn that down for someone like you."

"Someone like me?" repeated Naruto.

"I mean look at you, I never knew you were into such things but considering how much of a brat you were back in the academy it makes sense," said Ino.

"You think I want to be like this?" asked Naruto in shock that Ino would even think that he would enjoy this.

"Ah, ah, ah, remember now that as a dutiful babysitter I have to report everything back to your 'mother.' You wouldn't want me telling her that you've been a bad boy now would you?"

Biting at his tongue, Naruto knew he didn't really have much of a choice in the matter as he went silent. Opting to rather just ignore the woman who was meant to be looking after him, he crawled over to where a bunch of building blocks were located. At least if he pretended that he was enjoying this he could use the time to try and figure out an escape plan.

Ino was meanwhile looking at the back of Naruto as an evil thought crossed her mind. While she could leave him to his own devices and his mind stuck the way it was, she was a member of the famed Yamanaka clan after all. Messing with his mind would be easy as childplay, especially since he was wide open.

What to do however? Were she to simply leave him be he would be stuck in this humiliating position and forced to do whatever Hanabi had planned for him. Alternatively, she could reduce his mind to that of a young child, one who would be more 'cooperative' with what she and Hanabi could suggest. If you choose to resist, well I'll just let you know that on the inside of that collar are seals known only to the Hyuga family, I'll let your imagination figure out what they'll do."

Naruto meanwhile struggled to comprehend everything that was going on. While he wanted to shout out that this was wrong, there was no way that he was going to simply sit here and listen to what Hanabi was saying! But did he even have a choice?

13313111.content:
"Yes, yes! I'm going to have a puppy," squealed Hanabi causing Naruto to ponder for a moment just how long the Hyuga girl had wanted such a thing. Whether this was merely a phaze that the young girl was going through or whether it was something more sinister it was hard to tell. The joy she was showing however was genuine, that much was clear. It almost felt wrong of him to rob this moment of her, he merely hoped this moment wouldn't last a life time.

"I'm going to need to buy lots of gear, I'll need a food and water bowl as well as some kibbles."

"Um Hanabi, as fun as kibbles sound my stomach is still human," said Naruto but his words fell on deaf ears as the young girl continued to list off the items she required.

"We're going to need a ball so that we can play fetch, a leash so that we can go for walks."

"Walks?" said Naruto in a highly exaggerated tone so that Hanabi would actually listen to him.

"Of course we're going to go for walks," said Hanabi. "As if I wouldn't take my puppy for a walk."

"But then people will see me," said Naruto wondering if it would be possible to die from the humiliation such an event would bring.

"If you're a good puppy I'll take you out at night time so that people can't see you," said Hanabi. "We will go for walks though whether you like it or not."

"But..."

"Speaking of walks, I've never seen a dog that walks only on it's hind legs before," said Hanabi as she closed the gap between her and her toy. "The problem is if I use Juken strikes you won't be able to use your back legs at all."

"That is a problem," said Naruto silently praying that Hanabi would now lose all interest in the idea.

"The other thing I need to get is a muzzle, you talk too much for a dog," said Hanabi quickly turning cold in her tone of voice causing Naruto to momentarily shiver. "Before I do that I need to ask you if you know a way I can restrain your legs so that you are forced to walk on all fours?"

Naruto rubbed at the back of his head as he tried to come up with an answer. Tape seemed like the simplest solution but for now if he didn't tell her anything then chances were that he would stay on two legs and merely pretend to be restrained while entertaining the young girl. The main problem then would be if Hanabi found something a little more sadistic in order to keep his legs in place. Making his choice, Naruto told her...
13313111.title: I'll be a puppy

Naruto chose to remain silent at Hanabi's insult knowing that anything he said would probably be used against him at this point in time.

"Alright well I'm going to go to the shops and pick up everything that I need," said Hanabi. "Can I trust you to stay out of trouble while I'm gone?"

"Don't see why not," said Naruto with a shrug of the shoulders as Hanabi gathered her belongings.

"Well you can't escape, the doors are locked and only the chakra of members of the Hyuga family can open them," said Hanabi, Naruto not doubting for a moment that what the young girl said was true. "Just spend the time to familiarize yourself with your new home."

"Sure," said Naruto haphazardly as Hanabi left the room and him to his own devices. Seconds ticked by before Naruto released a breath that he didn't know he had been holding. Guessing that Hanabi intended on keeping up this game for a while, Naruto figured that this would be a good a time as any to play the part. As a bratty little puppy, I'm sure Hanabi wouldn't be surprised to find that Naruto had decided to 'mark his territory.' While this seemed like a good idea he knew that Hanabi was likely to make do on her promise to humiliate him if he did something out of line.

Was it worth it?

Naruto wasn't sure much time had passed to be honest when Hanabi returned but considering the number of bags she was carrying it had definitely been a while. Some of the bags were instantly recognizable as being from pet shops but there were a couple of black bags which didn't have anything depicting them from being somewhere family friendly. Of course Hanabi was quick to pick up on Naruto's curiosity.

"You're wondering what's in these bags aren't you," she stated, lifting them up. "Well since you didn't know what to use in order to keep you on all fours I asked around and found someone who did."

Naruto resisted the urge to rub at his eyes on the belief that Hanabi had probably been mentally scarring people on the street.

"Under the guise on a henge, Anko and I..."

"Wait, you asked Anko for help?" asked Naruto.

"Of course, she seemed more than eager," said Hanabi. "Don't worry, you're name wasn't mentioned at all."

Naruto couldn't help but grumble a bit before Hanabi pulled out her most expensive purpose of the day. "The hell is that?" asked Naruto.

"That my puppy, is what you're going to wake up in," said Hanabi before putting her fingers into a seal, triggering the collar around Naruto's neck and instantly putting the boy to sleep.

Naruto woke up much later, his vision mildly fuzzy as he tried to remember what had happened. He tried to push himself to his hands but found himself unable to do so. Panicking, Naruto tried to stretch out his legs but they too were somewhat immobile. Looking at himself Naruto found several things of note, firstly he was encased in what could only be described as a full blown dogsuit, a dalmatian one at that. The reason he couldn't move his arms or legs was that the suit was pressing his forearms against his shoulders and his ankles against his ass. The tight suit didn't just fit across there however, his entire body was covered by the suit other than his face and one other part that was sticking out, showing that Hanabi had removed his underwear before putting the suit on him.

"Like it?" asked Hanabi, causing Naruto to look up at his 'owner.' He tried to speak out but realised that Hanabi had stuck to what she had said earlier and put a muzzle on him, one which he assumed had not come from the pet store as on the inside of the muzzle there was something sticking into his mouth making it impossible to talk. "Can you walk?"

Growling out, Naruto did his best to push himself onto his elbows and knees, fumbling around a bit before managing to get his balance.

"Yay!" said Hanabi as she clapped her hands together. "Now come here."

Focusing on his movements, Naruto walked (if it could even be called that) towards Hanabi, arguably quite slowly as he got used to the movements but got there in the end, where he was rewarded with a scratch behind the ear. "Who's a good boy," cooed Hanabi. "Now as your reward, do you know what time it is?"

Naruto's curiosity never even got going as he saw that lead in Hanabi's hand, the young girl clearly thinking that now was a good time as any to go for a walk.

"Considering you've been such a good boy, I'mma let you choose where we go for a walk," said Hanabi as she attached the lead to Naruto's collar. "Bang the ground once if you want to go to the park, or twice if you want to go down the streets."

While there was the temptation to leave her down the kennels Hanabi said that she's got more than enough room for you and this bitch."

At the word bitch, Naruto realized that Anko was holding onto a leash very similar to the one Hanabi had in her hand. Following the leather material down he found that he wasn't the only one who had been taken for a walk tonight. "Just as a warning Hanabi, this bitch may be in heat so don't be surprised if she tries to take your hound."

Naruto meanwhile was still reeling from shock that attached to Anko's collar was someone who he doubted had willingly signed up for all of this, though he couldn't be certain by the look on her face. Looking straight at him with her tongue hanging out was...

"Not a pig, huh?" mused Hanabi, well...not that she could really blame him. Pigs were slaughtered, and being made into food like bacon would render Hanabi's making him her pet pointless.

Hanabi snapped her fingers at a sudden idea "I know! How about I make you a mouse, then?! Tiny, cute, furry, AND locked up tight in a cage so you'll be mine forever—it's perfect!" she then went over and pulled a tiny cage with a U-shaped handle on top and had bars as wide as matchsticks and were close together off a shelf. Hanabi studied the cage a moment, "Hmm... needs an exercise wheel, but this's do." Then she pulled out a grey, one-piece jumpsuit and held it up against Naruto's chest as if measuring him. Naruto's eyes widened seeing it was a mouse costume!

The grey jumpsuit had a back zipper for easy on and off—not that Naruto would ever get out of the suit, Hanabiwould make sure of that. The mock turtle neck style would keep Naruto warm and cozy. The attached mouse mitts covered the hands, so no jutsu were usable. The attached tail was bendable and the included shoe covers had elastic ankles and under foot coveres for a secure fit. And as no mouse was a mouse without their cute little ears, the jumpsuit's hood had some adorable ones attached to each side along with a velcro fastener under the chin for a comfortable fit. And the hood would still leave Naruto's whisker marks exposed.

"Uhh...Hanabi? Err...don't you think I'm a bit...big...to be your pet mouse?" Naruto asked nervously.

At that, Hanabi stopped and hummed, looking Naruto over, "Good point..." then she shrugged, unconcerned, "well, nothing a shrinking jutsu can't fix if I do make you into a pet mouse for me."

suddenly, his whole body was on fire. The pain was so intense, he couldn't even open his mouth to scream. All he could make was this strange, choking noise and clench his teeth, trying to drive away the pain but failing miserably. It spread through his veins like poison, and he could almost feel his bones melting in the heat of the pain.

Sweat trickled from his forehead, and tears of pain were squeezed out from the corners of his tightly closed eyes. Other than the pain, he couldn't feel anything. When he opened his eyes a crack, through the haze of black and red, he could see Hanabi standing over him, her expression too blurry for him to see, but it was clear she was smug before he blacked out.

***

Naruto wasn't sure how much time had passed when he opened his eyes with a groan, and for a long moment, he couldn't remember where he was. Naruto slowly opened his eyes and boy did he have the craziest dream where Hanabi wanted him to her pet mouse and she paralyzed him and put him into a mouse costume and shrunk him to the size of a mouse.

But one look at his surroundings and he knew that this was no dream as he ran to the bars and his eyes widened at the sight of Hanabi's room but only everything was gigantic compared to him!

Then he heard thunderous booming and he turned to see the door open, reveling Hanabi but she was a actual giant to him as she approached his cage.

"Awww...mommy's wittle mousey wowsey! You miss me?" Hanabi cooed as Naruto gawked up at Hanabi. Her hair cut short, framing her face in an asymmetrical bob style with the front bangs reaching below her chin. She wore a modified sleeveless, v-neck shirt with mesh armour underneath; blue shorts and had a tan vest jacket with white wristbands on both hands. She wore shinobi sandals with white bands underneath around her ankles, and for a bit of color and personality, a pink flower hair clip attached to her hair on the left side.

"...Why...?" he asked, unable to fully grasp the situation.

Hanabi giggled. "I told you: I'm allergic to animal fur so I've never been able to touch a cat or a dog. Seeing those whisker marks on you however made me think and if I couldn't have a pet I would make a pet." she leaned her face close to the bars of the cage, a smile on her face.

"You're mine, mousey! And the rooms and walls of the Hyuga compound have anti-byakugan seals...bad joke about being perverts with 360-degree, X-ray vision...you understand."

"Wha...Hanabi..." Naruto sputtered, but she wagged a finger at him disapprovingly.

"Mice don't speak, they squeak." Hanabi said. "Now...time to break in my new pet mouse!" she told him, opening the door to his cage.

Naruto bolted to the far side of his "new room" as Hanabi eagerly reached into the cage to grab him. He whipped around and his eyes widened as the sight of Hanabi's hand drawing closer.

"Now what shall I do with you...Tag? Hide and Seek? Tickle torture? Cuddling?" Hanabi cooed at him before her hand closed around him and he was pulled out of his cage and up to his new owner's face.

133131122221211111.content:
As Naruto woke up from his nightmare, he was slowly looking around at his environment.

'Everything seems to be normal so far, still in Hanabi's room? check, out of that doll house maze? check, still in the same mouse costume? "sigh" check. Naruto thought to himself and then he heard the door open and when he saw that it was Hanabi, did Naruto's eyes widen in horror as Hanabi was the genie from his nightmare!

Hanabi wore red silken outfit that consisted of a ballooning pair of bedlah pants that hugged her girlish figure tightly, a golden, silk sash around her waist, and – something that made her and Naruto blush bright red, and forced the boy to force his eyes away - a bra covered only by a thin silk shroud. Her outfit exposed her naval, showed off her barely developing cleavage, and exposed a great deal of her arms and back. As well as golden cuff wristbands on her arms and gold-colored, curved-toe shoes.

Having seen Naruto was now awake Hanabi smiled, "Well, I see you're finally awake my mousey slave."

"Huh? Slave!? Now wait just a ramen eating minute here, you're a genie! You should be the one calling me Master!" Naruto said, clearly not realizing that while he was asleep, Hanabi heard him sleep talk and he mentioned something about her as a genie and other such things.

So Hanabi had found a genie costume and did some research on genies, so she'd really be able to sell the role before Naruto had woken up. She was going to enjoy this!

The Hyuga girl threw back her head and laughed. "Oh, sweet mousey...how little you understand. You see, there are certain rules that genies must follow and are incapable of breaking. For example," she said, looming over Naruto with a smirk on her face and held up a finger, "genies are unable to travel far from whatever vessels that contain them."

Naruto nodded. He understood that.

Hanabi raised a second finger, "We genies also cannot kill under our own power and cannot grant the wish to kill, though we can bestow weapons or powers upon our masters that can allow them to kill. Also, while unable to kill, genies are certainly still capable of attacking others and inflicting pain."

Naruto gulped at that. So this genie couldn't kill, but she could still hurt him.

"Rule three: Genies are also unable to tamper with free will. For example, a genie will not be able to force someone to fall in love with anyone else. That's why we need our masters to wish us free."

Naruto nodded again. That made sense. Kinda sad they were prisoners though.

"Fourth rule is we genies are incapable of necromancy and have no power over the dead. So we cannot return someone to life in any way, shape or form."

Hanabi held out another finger, "Another rule is that the wishes are limited to three only, so there's no wishing for more wishes."

Ok. That was understandable as far as Naruto saw things. Too much power, otherwise.

"However, what you need to focuse on most is a little-known fact: a curious little rule that says that if the genie's master should be sucked into the genie's containment object, then the master/servant roles will be reversed." Hanabi smirked.

Naruto paled and started to back away. As he did, Hanabi advanced, reaching out for Naruto as she did so until he bumped into a wall and was caught between it and the feet of the female "genie" he was the pet mouse of.

"So since I pulled you into my bottle while you were sleeping, and you're trapped with a giant mistress that has phenominal cosmic power inside her ity bity living space..." Hanabi said happily as she grabbed the shrunken, mouse-costumed Uzuzmaki, all but his head enveloped in her fist as she brought his up to her face, a devious grin adorning it.

"MY wish is YOUR command, mousey wowsey!"

One was a pair of obsidian gates, chained shut and adorned with the images of mounds of carved humans: hundreds and hundreds of naked bodies of men, women, and children alike, all wearing expressions of sheer agony, despair and fear, twisted and pressed together, as well as the bandaged head and torso of a giant, horned skeleton on each door. As Naruto looked at this gate he felt at peace, he felt absolute joy and happiness, completely the exact opposite of what he felt looking at the obsidian gates.

The two blasts met with Naruto caught directly in the nexus. He screamed as the two opposing forces battled with him in between them. Naruto felt like he was in a game of tug-a-war and he felt that he was about to be ripped in two. The two beams struggled against one another as they tried pulling Naruto through their respective gates, sometimes going closer to the gold ones, at others, it seemed the obsidian gates had the advantage.

Each thuderous stomp came closer and closer, until a gigantic shadow covered Naruto's entire form and Naruto timidly turned to face the gigantic demon behind him...

The gigantic demon was a female and she had blood-red skin and black markings similar to tattoos along her skin except for her head, she has sharp obsidian claws at the tips of her fingers, pointed ears framing her face, sharp fangs replacing her teeth, four large, white eyes that lacked a iris or pupils with a hint of lilac in them, and she had a devil tail coming out from her bottom that ended in a spaded tip.

Her clothes were anything but modest, consisting of a tight leather bra matching her gloves and boots, a miniskirt just barely long enough to cover the subject, and a collar with a few links of chain. She also wore a crown of black vines with thorns curving around her head, forming into a demonic tiara of some sort resting in her dark-brownish black hair which was cut short, framing her face in an asymmetrical bob style with the front bangs reaching below her chin.

That was when Naruto definitely knew that he was still dreaming, as the gigantic demon before him was a Devil-Hanabi!

The gigantic Hyuga demoness looked down at him and gave him a cruel and malicious grin as if she just found herself a brand new toy... to destroy.

Naruto not liking the grin for even a nano-second, quickly got on his feet and was about to run, until he felt something attach itself to both of his feet, two balls of solid onyx the size of the Hokage mountain and chains connecting himself to them.

In other words, Naruto's not going anywhere.

Welcome to you're eternal Suffering!!!" As Devil-Hanabi then let out a thunderous laugh filled malicious and evil intent.

As Naruto struggles swimming away from the ingredients being added, Naruto the sees a giant ladle as it dips into the boiling blood and begins to stir everything at a rapid spin until Naruto was now caught in it, and as he was spinning he looked up to see the sadistic grinning face of Devil-Hanabi as she continues to stir her Hellish stew. Hanabi then loosens her grip and has a look of shock on her face and then looks at Naruto and she said, "I'm sorry, it's just that sometimes, I have moments like that by seeing small and cute animals from time to time."

Naruto didn't even know what to say about that, not as though he could, cause Hanabi banned him from ever speaking again.

Hanabi then had an idea and looked down at Naruto and said, "I bet all that exercise made you tired and sweaty my little mousey?"

Hanabi then pulled Naruto close to her face (precisely under her nose.) And took a sniff and made a face of disgust and said, "Oh, yes you do need a bath." As she carried Naruto to the bathroom making sure that he isn't seen.

Hanabi said in a whisper as she then opened the bathroom door and proceeds towards the tub and placed Naruto in it, when she did Naruto quickly tried to climb out but the walls were to smooth for him to grab on to.

PLUNK!

Bubbles start to instantly form and multiply in their rose-&-peach-smelling foam while the Hyuga girl kept her eyes locked on Naruto. Her hand entered the hot water and stirred it, speeding the spread of all the bubbles, smiling at how she was going to enjoy cleaning her mouse.

Then when the painful brushing was done Hanabi then took some of the bubbly foam and scrub it all over his body and wash it off him with the bath water.

After a eternity (To him anyway.) Naruto was gasping in pain after Hanabi finally finished brushing and scrubbing his body, he was surprised to know that the mouse costume was still in tact. Though he offically looked like a drowned rat.

"Now my little mousey looks 'Squeaky Clean' and smells so fresh." Hanabi happily said looking at the now soak and wet Naruto.

1331311222212121.content:
Hanabi stroked Naruto absently and wondered what to do. Upon thinking things over, the young female Hyuga found herself craving bananas and milk, her favourite foods.

Smiling at a sudden idea Hanabi stood, then picked up Naruto by the tail of his mouse costume and smiled at him. "Mousey...it's snack time! My treat. I even know just the place to go! You just stay put and relax, ok?" she said before lowering her pet into her pocket and a quick pat of the hand once the hand was withdrawn caused the opposite wall of fabric slam into Naruto, causing him to grunt at the squishing force before he felt his self-proclaimed owner start to walk off. Where was she taking him?

Her pet mousey secure in her pocket, Hanabi cheerfully skipped along through the streets of Konoha, a destination set in her mind: the ice cream palor. She was in the mood for a banana split.

As soon as Hanabi entered the Ice cream palor, Naruto caught the scent of the frozen treat from Hanabi's pocket and thought he could take a peek and he saw some of his friends.

Choji, Kiba, Rock Lee, and even Shino were there; as were Hinata, Ino, Sakura, Tenten, Anko, Kurenai and Shizune.

Naruto brightened at the sight of them all and thought to himself, 'Maybe I can ask them for help.' As that hope blossomed in him, he felt Hanabi's hand push him back in her pocket.

When Hanabi made it to the counter and she was telling the owner what she wanted, Naruto took this as his chance to see how things were run here and then see if he could get help. Silly as it sounded, Naruto had never been allowed in the ice cream palor before. 13531.content:
*Warning: The Arc I'm going to display is after The Forth World War. So there are many spoilers!
Like I said, I'm an otaku, addicted to the Uchiha. So SasuSaku will have a great role here! As always, if you have thing to ask about or especially requests, things you would like to be involved etc, just mail me. I'm a request writer after all, and hell, I'm a woman of my word!*

Finally… Finally everything was over. The forth shinobi's world war met it's end at the hands of a legendary trio. People were used to call ''Sannin'' certain shinobies who managed to achieve great things on the battlefield. Earning that name meant that they really proved themselves, to the point that was very impossible to avoid some sort of acknowledgement to them. Originally they were just Genins trained by the Third Hokage, Hiruzen Sarutobi. But then they took an higher path and embraced greatness when they fought face to face with Hanzo, yes, that Hanzo. Hanzo of The Salamander, known as the leader of Amegakure. He was one of the most ferocious and tyrannical monsters ever appeared in history. Most of his battle skills were related to his poisons and venomous powers. It was very difficult to stand a fight against him and of course, a double blade. Not hitting meant being poisoned by him. Hitting Hanzo meant generating a venomous spot, cause his whole body was builded on that ability. He was a toxic walking carcass of a human being. Thats why he had to even wear a mask in order to dodge his own power's backlashes. But that time those three guys succeeded.

They managed to survive. As a matter of fact they were the only survivors from that massacre. Hanzo was genuinely surprise by their stubborn attitude and abilities. That's why he spared their life and named them ''Konoha no Sannin''. It was the story of the Team Hiruzen, formed by the aforementioned Third Hokage and three brats. Jiraya, Tsunade Senju and Orochimaru. Konoha honored and remembered their amazing actions in every era they lived in. But now… Now there was another group worthy of that name. From now on, when people will hear the word ''Sannin'', they will think of another team. Of course, Team 7.

It was Kakashi Hatake's own formation. He was their leader and Sensei, and raised them to become what they are now. Uzumaki Naruto, Haruno Sakura and… Uchiha Sasuke. Here they are, the new ''Konoha no Sannin''. They've passed through many difficulties and bad times, but it was a great, unique ride. When Sasuke betrayed everybody and left the Village to join Orochimaru and have his revenge on his brother, many thought that it was the end of Team Seven. But the war, a living paradox who parts and unites many people, reassembled their team too. Temporary alliance or not, that happened. And thanks to their reunion, Madara Uchiha found its way back to the after life. Not even the starters of the Shinobi's history, Kaguya and her third ''son'', could stand a fight against them. In the end, every enemy was crushed to the oblivion. It wasn't about taking a fruit from a tree and show chakra to the world. It was about rewriting history.

Jumping to present time, Konoha was still suffering the repercussion of the world war. Many buildings, places and rocks were now turned to mush. People and Ninja lost their houses and were now forced to sleep into sleeping bags. It was like a desperate land in desert. Even the Hokage's own building was destroyed. There was a new temporary office between the arranged awnings. Fortunately the leaders of the other lands around the Village decided to send their men to help in Konoha's reconstruction. However, Hashirama Senju's granddaughter came up very quickly to a strong decision. She decided to resign from her position and walk on a different path. After the forth world war Tsunade realized that she wanted something else, and that she couldn't give 100% anymore to the village. This Sannin was very depressed due to the big amount of people she lost. Her lover, her best friend, her brother. She had to go back to her earlier life. Going around and have good times.

So it was the born of the Sixth Hokage of Konoha. His election was the ultimate thing for the village's reconstruction. This time it was a male's turn. He was Yondaime Minato Namikaze's student and Team 7's Sensei, a very amazing and skillfully jonin, once known as Sharingan Kakashi, the Copy Ninja. Yes, his name was Kakashi Hatake. He accepted his new role and Konoha's people gave him their approval. The first thing he worked on was Sasuke's fate. Fortunately, he was able to avoid his execution and cleaned up his criminal records, thanks to the contribute Sasuke gave during the forth world war.

Anyway the young Uchiha decided to walk away, once again, from Konoha. He didn't feel so good about what happened and had a very strong feeling of discomfort. He felt like a stranger in a land of dreams and friends. So he HAD to go away from that. And honestly, he was very sick about that too! Not even Naruto or Sakura could stop him or take him back from his decision. But he also promised that he would have returned sooner or later. This event lead to months of misunderstandings and quarrels between Sakura and Naruto. The pink haired girl accused his friend to be the reason behind Sasuke's farewell and literally outpoured on him. On the other side, Naruto was very sad about the whole thing. War made him a mature person, but once again he felt a failure, cause he wasn't able to stop his best friend from leaving again and was now blamed by the girl he loved the most.

One night, before falling asleep, Sakura saw a weird animal from the window of her house. It was a black crow with… with red eyes! She was damn sure that it was a Sharingan! So she dressed herself up very quickly and followed the crow by jumping on rooftops, rocks and trees. It conducted her to the Death Forest's. She knew that place very well, enough to understand that danger has always its eyes upon you. So she concentrated her chakra in her feet, in order to sense every vibration coming from the ground. She became a very very strong Kunoichi, probably the best around. So if someone would like to mess with her…Well, you know the rest. However, her concentrations and abilities fade away when she felt the cold sensation of a blade grazing her beautiful neck. She completely stopped and only rolled her eyes down to gaze at the dangerous sword which was a threat to her life. Thanks to the mirroring inside that blade, she was able to look at herself and to a shadow of a man behind her. So the pink haired Kunoichi quickly lowered down and hit with a revolving kick. However Sakura blow was dodged easily by her enemy, who hit back with a middle kick that forced her to the ground. At this point the mysterious man removed the laces from his face and reveled itself. He was Sasuke Uchiha!

As she was walking, Tenten couldn't help but feel bothered by the thought that she forgot something or someone very important, and before she knew it, Tenten was already home.

The weapon mistress blinked. Sheesh...just how focused was she on what she'd forgotten? She needed something else to think about. Thankfully, she had just the thing in one of her scrolls.

Tenten went straight to her room, giving her parents a quick "I'm home!"

When she was in her room, Tenten took out the scroll that Naruto and his clothes where inside of, and she opened the scroll on the floor, did some hand seals and suddenly the clothes from the Hokage's tower reappered.

Tenten was just about to begin examining the clothes until she saw something seem to move in the clothes, her eyes widened as she saw the sight of a one-inch "bug" seemingly struggle to get out of the clothes and just as it jumped out of the clothes, Tenten grabbed the bug and looked at it for a moment or two and wondered what to do with it.

Naruto didn't know what was worse, the fact that everyone in the entire leaf village seemed ro forget all about him. Or the former with him being the size of Issunboshi and five-years old, also having little to no acess to his chakra and was naked for the whole world to see.

As he jumped out of his clothing prison, Naruto just said to himself, "Well, it can't get any worse than this."

It seemed the universe just loves it when someone says that trigger phrase, because before he knew it, Tenten's titan sized hand caught him and brought him up to her face and all Naruto had to say was, "I was wrong, it's worse...."

"Oho, what have we here? And just what are YOU, little bug?" Tenten said as she frowned at the bug. She wasn't all that surprised there was at least one in something that had been left sitting outside for who knew how long. Bugs tended to do that, after all. As the bug just sat there in her hand, she wondered why that was. Not that she would complain that the bug wasn't going to bite or sting her, but it wasn't even trying to get out of her grasp. Why was that?

Naruto stared at Tenten as she looked at him before a hand went to her head, as if to ward off a headache.

As Tenten held the bug, her head began to hurt as she feels the feeling that she's forgotten something or someone had intensified as she was now feeling her memories and whatever is keeping them back fighting eachother for dominance. As the feeling persisted, Tenten placed the bug on the ground and figured that whatever it was about the tiny thing, she'd figure it out later. As she decided that, her headach vanished. Looking down and noticing the bug running, the weapon mistress grinned.

Well now...seemed the bug wanted to play. In that case...

After Tenten placed Naruto on the ground, Naruto quickly runs as fast as his legs can go. Until he quickly stops when a colossal sized Kunai (to him anyway) stab into the ground right in front him and he slowly turns to see Tenten smile while holding a Kunai.

Naruto ran as a rain Kunai kept attacking him until he made it into a house and Naruto slammed the door shut and tried to catch his breath.

When Naruto got his breathing under control, he saw that this looked like his apartment, but how can that be?

"So...hiding in my model of Konoha I built in my free time, huh, little bug? Ok...guess we'll be doing a giantess-style game of hide-and-seek, then!" Tenten's voice boomed.

Naruto paled. A model of Konoha Tenten had made?! Oh crap! If Tenten found him there was no telling what she would do!

Then Naruto felt the ground quake as he guessed that Tenten must've gotten on her hands and knees and began crawling around the model of the village and was looking inside each house, carefully and thoroughly, so that she didn't miss the bug (a.k.a him)!

As Tenten crawled on the floor and peeked inside each building, she squeezed her fingers inside, trying to feel for the bug in each one.

As Naruto look around for a place to hide, he could feel and hear Tenten's colossal sized hands slapping the ground and dragging her knees as he knew she was looking for him.

He also heard her (to him) thunderous voice saying, "You know, it's only a matter of time before I find you, bug, so you might as well give up. If you do, then maybe I'll just put you outside where you belong for your cooperation."

As Tenten moved her fingers around inside the room, she knew the bug had to be inside as this was the only model left.

When Tenten squeezed her fingers through the window of the model of Naruto's apartment, Naruto saw her fingers enter like serpents and Naruto quickly put his back against the wall of his bedroom, just out of the reach of Tenten's fingertip. Spying a closet, Naruto rushed over to it and closed himself inside.

After a moment, Naruto didn't hear anything from the outside of the closet, so as he was just about to open the door, suddenly the roof started to sound like it was being pulled off and Naruto then looked up and saw Tenten's face looking down at him and all she said to him as she reached for him was, "Peek-a-boo, I found you."

Just before her hand grabbed him, Naruto quickly ran as fast as his legs could go and he just barely escaped from Tenten's grasp as her hand hit the floor causing for Naruto to feel an earthquake, but before he could keep going, Tenten's other hand quickly snatched Naruto up and brought him to her face.

"Gottcha!" The brunette said, grinning toothly at the little bug.

Tenten began to pet Naruto's head but to Naruto, it was like her slapping him repeatedly and he felt pain, and everytime Tenten raised her hand up, Naruto tried to say something, but Tenten slammed her hand back down on top of him.

Continuing to pet the bug, the kunoichi spoke to it, "You know...I actually enjoyed this with you, believe it or not, little bug. It's been rough since Neji died...I need someone sane around. It's exhausting to the point of utterly morbid having to deal with Guy-sensei and Lee's excentrics by myself. Needed something to take my mind off things, so I picked up on a LOT of hobbies. Guess trying to find you in a miniture Konoha did the trick. Now..how about a hug?" she cooed before her hands interlaced around the bug and started to gradually tighten her grip.

As Tenten began to squeeze the bug in between her hands, Naruto was now in agony as he felt his entire body being squeezed from Tenten applying pressure on him, as this continued, Naruto tried not to scream in pain but being a four year old child again didn't do him any favors. Sure he was invunerable, but the strain and pressure itself was hurt him. Naruto screamed when he couldn't take it anymore.

As Tenten was playfully squeezing the bug, she heard something she never expected to hear from a bug of all things, the bug was screaming and if she heard right, it was screaming in pain from her squeezing it's body. Loosening her grip, Tenten spoke to the bug again.

"You know, little fella. You remind me of a long lost friend or something. Dunno why, but I'll find out. But you know how I said I picked up on a lot of hobbies? I know JUST the one for you! I'll...

Tenten placed Naruto on a long piece of styrofoam and taped his arms and legs down on it, Naruto didn't like were this was going and as he looked up at Tenten she looked down at him and said, "I never really did this with a live insect before or at all, but I promise you that if you just hold still, that I'll make this as quick and painless as possible."

Naruto panicked when she said as she turned her back to him and heard a drawer open and she picked up some tweezers and some pins, and placed them all down near the foam that Naruto laid upon and the one-inch Uzumaki began to sweat at the sight of the tools as Tenten lifted a pin needle and aimed it at Naruto's stomach as she then slowly lowered the sharp end to stab him through.

Horrified at what was going to happen to him, Naruto attempted to struggle to break free but the tape was too strong as his arms and legs couldn't budge, and as the needle was about to pierce through his stomach, Naruto screamed desperately, "TENTEN!!!! PLEASE STOP!!!!"

But his scream fell on deaf ears as his desperate scream was far too small to reach her ears and the sharp tip of the needle touched his skin....

Only to bounce off it. Tenten looked surprised by this and apparently so did Naruto, figuring that she must've missed she attempted to push the needle through the bug again but this time with a little more force, but it was the same result as before, then she just kept trying to stab the bug but nothing happened.

Tenten couldn't believe what she was seeing, this bug couldn't be pierced by the needle!

Naruto looked at Tenten's surprised face, only to remember that he was still under the effects of the invulnerability jutsu, but even so he still was in trouble as Tenten then thought of something else to do with this seemingly indestructible bug, so she grabbed Naruto and proceeded to...

1452112221212211221.content:
As Tenten was heading home to deal with the sleeping clothes that she and Lee found at the Hokage's tower, for some weird reason, she couldn't help but feel like she was being watched, yet at the same time, she can't help but feel the observer's gaze was not on her but still on her somehow. She didn't like it, she didn't like it at all...

--- Unkown location ---

Unkown to Tenten, she was indeed and infact being watched. The one doing so was a short humanoid with pale blue skin and white hair which she wore as a single braided side pigtail and her hair combed in the 80/20 ratio. Her attire consisted of purple robes, a black cuirass, and a pink sash.

In her hand was a dark pink staff that had a gold-tipped top and bottom and a floating black sphere floating above the top with a light blue ring floating vertically around it. Currently, the sphere was glowing and showing a live-feed image of Konoha's weapons exepert.

"You're in trouble, my little deity-to-be..." she said, the image projected zooming in on the scroll Naruto was sealed in.

After her original universe was destroyed, she had felt sad knowing that her universe, her friends and her masters was fully destroyed, she had no other choice but to leave and try to find a new universe for her to call home; it was either that, or drift aimlessly through the void where her universe had been.

She gripped where her heart was, those bad emotions welling up in her again. Mortals called it loss, sorrow, loneliness; as well as pain and hurt. She didn't like these feelings. How her siblings could just...casually disregard them, it wasn't right.

Focusing on the scroll Naruto was sealed in again, she smiled, recalling how she'd arrived here. As she floated through space, she looked at several different universes and each one just didn't catch her interest and switched to another universe, and just as she was about to give up, that was when she Naruto's universe, and she saw Naruto fighting against a God that brought destruction.

It had excited her thinking she'd found a new God to serve...up until she learned how the so-called "god" was just a delusional gravity manipulating mortal whose body was so broken he had to use someone else's corpse as an avatar.

It had been a spirit-breaker, but, having seen the fight, the blond had proven he could fit her needs, and when she'd backtracked his life using her staff's function to project images from the past and present AFTER she saw how he had clashed for the final time with his estranged friend and rival, Sasuke Uchiha and cost the two their dominant arms.

After seeing his history, start to finish, she was surprised when, by tracing his energy signiture through time using her staff to watch his life start to the current time, she learned he was latest transmigrant of this "Asura Ōtsutsuki" person. Seeing how the others in the reincarnation line were like, she was highly impressed, but Naruto was by far her favorite one. Admitably, she may have fallen for him. But that was besides the point.

The point was, Naruto was certainly strong enough to be appointed the God she'd be bound to. He'd always had so much power that he always had to stay unblooded by making sure not to kill anyone, and he KNEW it. Strong enough to be her new God, but moral enough to keep from just running rampant with his power...for an angel attendent to a God of Destruction, the fact that Naruto was aware of that was actually a very good thing.

Angels such as herself were the attendants to the Gods of Destruction. Their role is to guide and teach Gods of Destruction to master their destructive capabilities as well as also serving them as their personal attendants. If the God of Destruction they attend to died, the Angel ceases to function until another Destroyer is appointed to them. However, if a God of Destruction and/or Supreme Kai are erased, such as by Zen-Oh, the Angel will continue to exist and be active as if nothing had ever happened.

So, that in mind, she'd devised this (pardon the pun) "little" test for Naruto, and if he passed, she'd train HIM to be capable of harnesing devine energy so she could have him AS her new God to serve besides.

So here she was in an ancent Ōtsutsuki village from when they had settled on the moon had even created a vast environment on the moon's interior surface, complete with warped oceans, mountains, forests, and various animal species, however the environment was been far smaller than the full size of the moon itself. Several villages were built across the landscape, all of which were now abandoned.

The whole place was a mountain town with block houses in an artificial world inside the moon, complete with an artifical sun. The village had been abandoned long ago, but it looked like it survived through a war. There were also catacombs and deep underground, there was a crypt. Not to mention a feudal-era castle inside of the artificial sun, along with floating islands that had temples. The islands and castle all orbited the "sun's core", which was a floating cavern in the shape of an eight-pointed sun ray symbol, along with a crescent moon and a sun.

The artificial sun at the center of the moon had actually been a barrier, within which were housed various important sites, all of which had been guarded by an army of puppets, controllable without chakra threads because of an alter that consisted of two separated parts, its case and the main content. The case had had a spherical-shaped structure made from gold with an eight-pointed star-like symbol carved, which had been chained and mounted inside of a shrine.

The main content was a sun-like, eye-like orb structure with a double-layered yellow hexagon-shaped pupil (one fixed and the other rotated counterclockwise) surrounded by an orange-yellow flower-like iris, which had been stored inside the core of the artificial sun and protected with some huge pieces of metal bars.

This place was her current home, and she was content with that.

Sighing dreamily, the lone survivor from universe 10 looked at where Naruto was using her staff's orb again.

"Come on, Naruto. Find me. I know you can, my darling..." she whispered.

--- Earth, Konoha ---

Within Tenten's scroll, Naruto paused. Why did he feel like someone was tatching him? Whatever that feeling was vanished as his surroundings shook before stopping abruptly.

Tenten must have set the scroll down. Hopefully he'd be getting out of here soon. He just hoped when he did, Tenten wouldn't capture and keep him...

Tenten finally made it home, and after she took off her high heeled sandals, she still couldn't help but think about what could be bothering her like she forgot something or someone, and for some reason those clothes she sealed in her scroll were a part if it. So after having some dinner and seeing that her parents were out, she just went to her room and laid the sealing scroll on the floor and made the hand seals and said, "Release!"

Naruto had no idea what happened, but now he was out of that limbo and dizzy, until he felt his world shake and then he saw a pair of colossal-sized, five-headed snakes come in his night shirt then he realized those where Tenten's hands and fingers and she seemed to be looking for something.

Not wanting to be in Tenten's grasp, Naruto ran away from her searching hands and out of his shirt.

As Tenten searched the shirt for anything about the owner, her eyes widened at the sight of a very small bug scurrying out of the night shirt. Tenten then thought she could have some fun with the bug as she was alone in her house and this bug must've been stuck in the sleeping clothes she sealed in her scroll, and this could be a good chance for her to target practice on a foe who was very far away from above.

Naruto was attempting to escape from Tenten's house when suddenly, before he knew it, a giant sized senbon needle flew right above him and landed right in front of him, and Naruto slowly turned around to look at Tenten who looked like she had glowing diamond shaped eyes and a very scary smile on her face while holding senbon needles and said, "Now where do you think you're going.... my teeny-weenie target?"

Then Tenten began to rapidly throw senbon needles at him. She kept throwing them but purposley missed her target, but the way it moved she couldn't help but notice that the bug seemed to evade her weapons while on the move.

But Tenten had a plan, as she then began to use her chakra while pulling out a giant scroll and jumped in the air and as she did two dragons made out of smoke rose along with her and yelled, "Ninja art: Twin Rising Dragons Jutsu!!!" And fired only senbon needles at the bug.

Naruto yelped and dashed; bobbing, weaving, jumping, sprinting...anything to stay clear of Tenten's barrage of senbon needles. Invulnerability or not, he REALLY didn't want to risk having a giant senbon needle pierce through his body.

But what he didn't know was that Tenten was herding Naruto towards a freshly laid mouse paper trap close to her dresser and before he knew it, Naruto suddenly felt like his feet were stuck.

Looking at his feet to see why, he paled. Oh no...No! He was trapped! It would be all too easy for him to be skewered!

Ending her jutsu, Tenten dropped to the ground, smirking. "That was actually kinda fun." she admitted, then walked over to the bug. "Now...let's get a better look at you, my little bullseye." she said as she knelt down close to it and brought her eye up to see the tiny creature and then...

145211222121221122112.content:
After Tenten looked at the bug in her fingers, she really couldn't see anything special about this bug, just that it had tanned skin and blonde fur on it's head.

So she just walked to the window and opened it and said, "Well, as much fun as we had, I don't think I can keep you without accidentally killing you so, out you go." While literally but gently throwing Naruto out of her house and he landed on the ground.

As he got up to stand he looked up, only to have his eyes widen as he saw a civilian's sandaled foot about to step on him and he quickly dodged it. After Naruto avoided becoming flat as a pancake, Naruto saw something: a letter smaller than himself and began to read it.

Dear Naruto,

If you are reading this, then you can keep the outfit, also know that you are now getting closer to me, I'm counting every step you make. I can't wait to hold you in my hand...and to do that, I'll be sending you another gift, so brace yourself!


Anoymous.

"Ok...that's kinda disturbing. I'm being watched while I'm being forced to go streaking butt naked through his hometown...And outfit? What outfit? Naruto yelped as an outfit suddenly materialized on him out of thin air.

The first thing he was immediately aware of was something on his face.

What the...what was he wearing? Reaching up, he removed whatever it was and looked down at himself and at what he'd removed.

He was clad in an outfit that consisted of a white kitsune noh mask with three ringed eyes that were colored red, a dark blue-grey robe with grey lining and a fur collar, and a tattered grey-blue cape emblazoned with the emblem of a mandala comprised of nine reddish-brown circles of varying sizes atop a larger green-grey circle. Along with that was a fighter's gi that consisted of a sleeveless dark grey uwagi that had a large symbol of a light green circle, surrounding another circle but it was a slightly darker green, and on top of the darker green circle, were three lines that looked like stretched out "Ms" above each other on the back and on the front-left was a smaller version of the same symbol; a long-sleeved black undershirt with a turtleneck-hoodie, a red sash, black pants, fingerless opera-length black gloves wrapped in studded red-brown leather straps, and red-brown boots that had dark red toe caps.

"Whoa..." Naruto muttered before putting the mask back on. Ok...what now? As glad as he was about the one that masterminded his current situation cutting him some slack and making it so he was no longer in the nude, where was he suppossed to go now?

Suddenly, a jolt of something seemed to pass through Naruto's brain and his head started throbbing, so much so that it actually felt that his skull was on fire. The pain was so intense, he couldn't even open his mouth to scream. All he could make was this strange, choking noise and clench his teeth, trying to drive away the pain but failing miserably. It spread through his mind like poison.

Sweat trickled from his forehead, and tears of pain were squeezed out from the corners of his tightly closed eyes. Other than the pain, he couldn't feel anything. When he opened his eyes a crack, a shard of something that felt like a memory―no, there were hundreds of them!―slammed into him without warning, sending him stumbling into a wall. He no longer saw it as images flashed behind his eyes.

Naruto began to scream as his mind was literally overloaded with memories of the Ōtsutsuki clan that he felt like his head was going to explode from the pain.

As the blonde Uzumaki held his head in pain, he just couldn't handle the memory overload and suddenly passed out.

--- Meanwhile ---
Using her staff, Cus saw the whole thing and was worried about if she had went too far by having overload Naruto's mind with memories of the Ōtsutsuki clan, even if it was to help him find his way to hrt, and saw that Naruto was not getting up.

She was about to go down and get him herself when something happened.

14521122212122112211221111.content:
---Moon---

After seeing Naruto pass out, Cus was worried that perhaps she went too far with the memories of the Otsutsuki clan, and prepaired to go get Naruto herself, until she heard the voice of Konohamaru say, "Hey what's that?"

Looking at her staff, Cus saw Konohamaru standing above Naruto's body and bent down to pick him up and took a good look at him, as Konohamaru looked at the shrunken, clothed five-year old Uzumaki and had a smile spread on his face as he had an idea for a prank, and he soon clenched his hand around Naruto's body and ran.

---Earth, Konoha---

A moment later, Konohamaru finally made to one of the fanciest restaurants in the entire village and had snuck inside the building, then using the henge jutsu he took the form of a chef he went inside.

Now...whose food should I pick to add this bug into for this prank? Good thing Konohamaru's aunt Kurenai had taught him how to cook.

"Hey! You!" one of the actual chefs snapped at Konohamaru, "Get over here and hurry and help make this Seafood Paella! We gotta serve it to both Lady Tsunade and Lady Mei!"

"Uh...right!" Konohamaru called, then grabbed a seafood cookbook, found the dish, and went over to a station to prepare the meal for the Fire and Water Kages. Meanwhile, he was grinning on the inside at this. Feeding the Kages a bug...oh! That couldn't get any more perfect!

"Ok...time to get cooking..." he muttered.

Seafood Paella
Active Time: 45 MIN
Total Time: 1 HR 15 MIN
Yeild: Serves 6 to 8

Ingredients
4 cups chicken stock or low-sodium broth 
2 cups fish stock or  clam broth 
1/4 teaspoon saffron threads, crumbled 
1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil 
1/2 cup finely chopped onion 
3 garlic cloves, minced 
1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika 
2 1/4 cups Bomba or arborio rice 
One 12-ounce package cooked chorizo,  sausages halved lengthwise and crosswise  8 large head-on shrimp  
1 pound littleneck clams and cockles, scrubbed 
1/2 pound mussels, scrubbed 
1/4 cup thawed frozen peas 
Chopped parsley,  for garnish 

How to Make It
Step 1
In a medium saucepan, combine the chicken stock with  the fish stock and crumbled saffron and bring to a simmer. 

Step 2
Meanwhile, in a 15-inch paella pan or large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the olive oil. Add the onion and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and paprika and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the rice and cook,  stirring, until it is evenly coated in the oil, 1 minute. Add the  hot broth and stir the rice once to evenly spread it in the pan. Cook over moderate heat, without stirring but rotating the  pan for even cooking, until half of the liquid is absorbed, about 15 minutes. Reduce the heat  to low. Nestle the chorizo and shrimp into the rice. Add  the clams, cockles and mussels hinge side down and cook, turning the shrimp halfway through, until the shrimp and shellfish are cooked through and all of the liquid is absorbed, about  20 minutes. Scatter the peas on top and let stand for 5 minutes. Garnish with parsley and serve.

Following the directions in the cookbook, Konohamaru nodded to himself as he made the food. Now he just needed an opertunity to add his own "secret ingredient" to it!

After awhile of cooking, the food was finished and now Konohamaru was ready to add his "secret ingredient" into the dish, so he picked up the unconscious Naruto and put him into the food and placed the silver lid on top of it, and just in time as the waiter had just entered and took the plate and left to give it to the VIP section of the restaurant where both Tsunade and Mei were waitng.

When the waiter made it to the Kages, he set the plate on their table and simply said, "Dinner is served, enjoy you're meal ladies."

"Thank you." Both Tsunade and Mei said.

After the waiter left, the female Kages continued to talk to eachother as they're taking their fair share of the food, completely unaware that a one-inch five-year old unconscious Naruto Uzumaki was laying in their food and soon enough, Naruto was then scooped up with the food and placed into...
