We will have to wait a couple of years before we can do the fun stuff. For now, though just relax and let your alpha do all the work." She then starts to wiggle and grind her toes together, forcing Naruto to suffer through torture he could hardly imagine. He was about to pass out when he felt a wet thumb push him against the toe and pick him up again. "Good job. I gotta tell Hana how good you are when it comes to this. She will love it. Too bad for you, though. She is on her feet all the time. I swear, one time she made one of our dogs leave the room to get away from them. Oh look, here she is."

True to Tsume's word, Hana walked into the room where they found Naruto. "Hey mom. Why are you on the floor?" Hana asked. "Just getting our mate marked by my smell so he doesn't escape. He also feels really great down there to. You should try it." Tsume replied. Hana was unsure of this. He was only about five from the looks of it and was having problems with his memories. But the thought of asserting her dominance over him and a good massage was just too much to pass up. "Is it okay if I join you?" Hana asked. "Of course you van, sweetheart. He is your mate too, and you need to show him his place as our beta and mrk him so that he doesn't escape." Hana sits down in front of Tsume and moves her feet towards her. Tsume then licks her thumb, giving Naruto a fresh layer of her beef smelling spit. Tsume repeats the process she did to her feet on to her daughter, but it was much worse this time for Naruto. Tsume was right when she said that Hana had worse feet. It was like being next to a giant pile of old socks to him. He held his vomit in, but would soon lose control if it didn't stop soon. "Be careful with my nails. They are pretty sharp." he heard Hana say. He was soon finished after two hours of smelling and massaging both Inuzuka women's feet.

"Good job, beta." Tsume said. "Yes, very good." Hana agreed. They both took their big toes and started to lightly pat Naruto's body, covering him in even more of their foot stink. Hana then grabbed him and brought him up to her nose. Taking a big sniff, she told Tsume, "Well, that worked. Besides our mate scent, all I can smell are our feet." Hana said. "Great, now where will we put him? We can share a room, but it might be dangerous to him." Tsume said. "Hold on. I have an idea." She quickly left the room and came back a minute later carrying a box. She then took her mother's sandals and layer them in first, as if it was a floor. Then taking her own sandals, she placed them on the walls of the box. "There. Now he can be surrounded by our smelly sandals and feel safe knowing that we will be able to find him." Hana said. Tsume placed Naruto onto her big toe imprint that was on her sandal and quickly closed the box, forcing the smell to just grow in it, but nwith a gap that would let their mate breath. The two Inuzuka women placed the box on a nightstand in Tsume's room as she and Hana quickly went to sleep.

What happens next?
1452112221212222111122211121.title: ..rub her feet.

14521122212122221111222111212.content:
As the two giant Inuzuka women fell asleep, Naruto couldn't help but grimace with his current situation. He was basically trapped in a box, shrunken, surrounded by foot stink, and finally forced to be with the owners of said foot stink. "How did my life end up like this?" Naruto said to himself. Naruto looked around at his jail and quickly saw the small gap made in the box. Deciding that was the best chance to escape, he quickly hurried over to the sandal wall and tried to climb it. As he tried to get a grin on it, the sandal started to seep out an odd liquid after being pushed on. "Oh gross!" Naruto said, quickly realizing that the liquid was foot sweat the sandal had absorbed. "Just ignore it, Naruto." he said to himself. He quickly started to climb his way up to freedom, but before he even made it half way, the sweat coating his hands finally made him lose his grip on the sandal and plummet back down to the sandal floor. When he landed, sweat from the sandal rose up and coated his entire body. Naruto continued to try to escape, but all his attempts ended in failure. Eventually, he decided to go to sleep and try again later. Finding the big toe imprint, he curled his body and fell asleep.

When Tsume and Hana woke up, they quickly remembered the events of last night involving their new mate. Smiles grew on their faces from finding the one they were meant to be with. They both quickly got up and hurried to the box and looked inside to see their mate. To them, they saw their mate curled up, sleeping peacefully, in Tsume's big toe imprint. "Oh, our mate is so cute. Look at him all curled up. I think he embraced being our bete." Hana said, looking down at Naruto with a smile. "I couldn't agree more." Tsume said, happy that this was her real mate, and he wouldn't leave. "When are we going to tell Kiba? Doesn't he deserve to know about this?" Hana asked. "We'll tell the runt when the need arises. For now, let's just let our mate sleep while we get ready and dressed for our day." Tsume replied. "Okay, but who will take care of him for today?" Hana asked. "I will today, then you tomorrow, and both of us the next day." Tsume replied. Hana quickly agreed and left the room, prompting Tsume to do the same, making a mental note to bring their mate something to eat. He was still a growing boy after all, just not much.

After having breakfast, the duo quickly returned to find their mate still sleeping. "I'm sorry mom, can you wake him up soon? I have to hurry to the vet." Hana said, not wanting to make people wait. "Sure, I know just what to do." Tsume said. As Hana left the room, Tsume started collecting a small amount of spit in her mouth. After thinking she had enough, she quickly leaned over the box and opened her mouth. As the saliva started to ooze out, Tsume made sure to aim it right. The spit became to much and fell until it landed on the sleeping Uzumaki, waking him up from his sleep. "Bullseye." Tsume thought. "Wakey wakey little mate. Time to start the day, and what better way than a shower." Tsume said down to him with a grin on her face. What could she say? She enjoyed seeing her mate be dominated like this. "Guess what? Hana and I decided that you will get to spend the day with me today. Don't worry, you get to be with her tomorrow. Now, here's some food. You need your strength up for today." Tsume said before dropping a piece of jerky into the box, small enough for Naruto to eat. Naruto, realizing how hungry he was, quickly rushed over and devoured the meat.

"Good. Now as I said, you will be with me today. It will be pretty boring, but hopefully you will relieve that." Tsume said after he finished eating. Taume quickly grabbed him from the box and brought him up to her face. She then brought out a stand of string and with her other hand, tied his hands together then feet together using opposite ends. By the time Tsume was done, he was almost like a ring. "Perfect." Tsume said, admiring her handy work. She then grabbed the Uzumaki ring and brought it over to her left ring finger and slid him onto it, making his face look at hers from above. He then had to deal with her walking to her office for clan affairs. It was similar to the pendulum amusement parks rides that went back and forth for our hero. He was sure we was swinging her arms farther just to make it worse for him. Finally entering her office, Taume sat down and started on the paperwork for her clan. All the while, Naruto was stuck being whirled and moved around as Tsume continued writing.

It wasn't until Tsume was taking a break before she removed Naruto from her finger. She then untied him and placed him down on her desk. "I think it's time for a game little guy. You have to run around and dodge my thumb from squishing you. Think of this as a way to bond with each other. You ready? I hope so." Tsume said. Naruto quickly saw a shadow overtake him. Looking up, all he saw was the thumb of Tsume headed straight for him. He quickly jumped back away from the thumb, barely missing the sharp nail attached to it. It was then brought back up and brought back down on him, this time being dodged by him rolling to the left. "Oh this is so much fun." Tsume said. She continued this game for awhile until Naruto could barely move. Before he could do anything, the thumb came down on him, trapping him under it. "Nice try little man, but it looks like I'm top dog. You did relieve my boredom, so that gets you a prize." Tsume said. Picking him up, she brought him to her lips and gave him a kiss that covered his whole body with her top lip alone. She then tied him back, but instead of her finger, it was her big toe.

Finally the day ended for the shrunken ninja, and he couldn't be happier. He felt Tsume rise up from her chair and returned back to her room, Naruto having to deal with Tsume's foot odor again. Eventually, Taume removed her sandals, placed them back in Naruto's box, and removed him from her toe before placing him back in the box. "That was a good first day, little beta. I'll make sure to tell Hana about it. For now, go and rest. You will need it for tomorrow." Tsume said above him. All Naruto could do was find the last place he slept and curl back up, enveloped in the fresh stench on Tsume's feet. He never noticed Hana come back in and talk with her mother. He also didn't notice Hana place her sandals back in, this time placing them at an angle to make a tent for him. "Goodnight, mate." Hana said down to him before falling asleep.

What happens next?
14521122212122221111222111212.title: Tsume takes Naruto with her through the day.

choices: Time for a mother daughter chapter.
145211222121222211112221112121.content:
When the morning came, Hana couldn't wait to start the day. Why? Because today was her day to spend with her mate. "Oh, I can't wait to play with him, and love him, and kiss him." Hana thought to herself. Just last night, she had a dream where he was older and was worshipping her body. He was only slightly bigger than what he currently is, and neither of them seemed to mind. If anything, they were even happier. Then it became steamier as her mother started to join in, leading to other adult stuff. Just the thought of what had happened made her whole body light up red. She quickly got ready for the day, ate some breakfast, saving a piece of cereal for her mate, and headed off to get her mate. Already, she knew just what to do. "Then again, it might be fun if he disobeys me today. That just means that I get to discipline him tomorrow with my mother. She probably has some good ideas for showing him his place, if what she did yesterday meant anything." Hana thought, finally reaching the box where they where currently keeping their tiny mate. "Oh, he is sooo cute!" she squealed internally before waking him up.

Naruto's dreams that night were a little less pleasant compared to Hana's. It started out fine at first. He was in the village, walking around and enjoying his day. Oddly enough, nobody was around, but he wasn't going to complain. Less glares from people that way. He had just reached the village center when the ground started to rumble. "Huh? What's going on?" he asked. Looking at the Hokage Monument, he noticed two somethings rising from behind it. When the two masses stopped, it was revealed to be a giant sized Hana and Tsume. "Where is our mate? I know he is here." Hana boomed. "There he is. Time to return to us, beta." a giant Tsume said, pointing to where Naruto was. Naruto quickly started running, but was all in vain. After stepping over the monument, it only took a few steps for them to surround the boy. "Naughty mate, trying to run from your alphas. I think you need a lesson." Tsume said, reaching to pick him up. "It's time for you to wake up." Hana said.

"Wake up. Wake up. Come on little guy, you have to get up." Hana said, slightly nudging her mate. Naruto quickly shot up, looking around and finally remembering what was happening. "Oh yeah." he thought with a grumble. "Here. You need to eat. You're going with me today." Hana said, dropping the cereal in front of him. All Naruto does is eat the cereal in quiet. As soon as he is done, Hana picks him up and takes her sandals out of the box. She then puts them on and produces some string from behind her back. "Okay little guy. Hold still." Hana said before tying him up similar to what Tsume did yesterday, except slightly bigger. Instead of bringing him to her hand, like Naruto figured he would, she instead brought him lower. "Oh no." Naruto thought before he was placed on Hana's big toe. "There. Perfect fit. Time to go." Hana said, before leaving to her job at the vet. All the while, Naruto suffered through her horrid foot stink. "Oh Kami, why?" he thought, trying not to throw up.

Hana finally reaches the office assigned to her and sits down. Each of the people that worked there had a day they had to do the paperwork, and today was Hana's day. "Okay, time to get started. But first" Hana said before reaching down and taking off her sandals. She then takes Naruto off her toe and unties him. Naruto is grateful to be away from the foot stink, but before he knows it, one end of the string is tied around his waist, like a leash. "Can't let you run away from me. It would be a pain to find you. We would find you in the end, though." he heard Hana say, enforcing the futility of escape. She then ties the other end to her big toe, essentially making Naruto deal with her foot stink. She finally drops her feet, and Naruto down on the cold linoleum floor. "Be good, and don't try to escape." Naruto heard Hana say from above. She then starts to get to work, doing the paperwork for today, leaving Naruto under her desk.

"Dang, this floor is cold." Naruto said, the linoleum floor freezing cold to his body. He then starts to move around for awhile trying to keep warm when the other end of the string is yanked. "Hey, I don't know what you are doing, but quit it. Otherwise, I'm gonna think you are trying to leave." Hana said. When she yanked the string, it also yanked Naruto back, until he landed right next to her toe. "Huh? Dang this is actually pretty warm." he says, feeling the titanic toe's heat. "So nice." he said, before he started nuzzling the toe for more warmth. "Huh?" Hana said. Looking down, she saw her mate was nuzzling her toe like his life depended on it. Hana didn't comment on this, thinking it was cute, before getting an idea. Before Naruto could do anything, the toe rose up and came back down. Naruto quickly saw that he was trapped by toes on both sides of him. He quickly figured out that Hana had placed him between her toes. Ignoring the smell, Naruto just Nuzzled closer, with the toes clenching around him, making even warmer for him. Hana just let him do that for the rest of the day, happy about what her mate was doing.

It was finally time for her shift to end, and Hana couldn't be happier. Looking down, she saw her mate was quietly sleeping in the crevice between her toes, a small smile on his face. Hana decided to just let him sleep there before putting her sandals on and returning home, careful not to wake him up. "How was he?" Tsume asked after seeing her daughter return. "He was nice, except for one part, but I think he was just trying to stay warm." Hana replied to her mother. After all, she Sheree her mate with her. "Oh? Well, either way. I think we will show him his place tomorrow. He may not be at the bottom, but that is only because of us." Tsume said. "Alright, but can he sleep with me tonight? He just looks so cute." Hana asked. Tsume thinks it over, but decides to change it. "Okay, but you will have to share a bed with me. It wouldn't do for him to have more of you on him than me." Tsume replied. Hana thought it over, and agrees. The wild Inuzuka women quickly get in bed together and fall asleep, leaving Naruto to happily snuggle with their feet, and excellent source of warmth and oddly enough, comfort.

What next?
145211222121222211112221112121.title: Hana's day.

1452112221212222111122211121211.content:
As Naruto slept, Hana and Tsume's feet were busy. All throughout the night, the pairs of feet would continue to rub against the small being that was with them. It started when Hana's foot felt Naruto rub up against it and decided to investigate. It used it's big toe to poke and prod the shrunken Uzumaki into the sole of the other foot. It must have felt amazing for Hana, because her other foot started playing with him, mashing him against it, but not waking him up. Eventually, Hana's toe flicked Naruto too far, right into Tsume's foot. It automatically slammed down on him, trapping him underneath it and leaving his face between her big and second toe. They then started scrunching his face to see what it was until Hana's foot decided it wanted its toy back. It shoved Tsume's foot off and covered Naruto with itself. Tsume's foot didn't appreciate this as soon after, it shoved back, making sure not to hurt Naruto. This went on until finally, the feet came to an agreement. The two feet sandwiched him under them, leaving his face between their big toes. This is where he finds himself when he wakes up.

"Huh? Why can't I move?" Naruto asked sleepily. He tried to get up, but found that his entire body from the neck down was weighed down with something. He tried to move his head to see, but all he saw was two walls of tan covering him. It wasn't until he smelt the air around him that he realized where he was. "Ack! Oh Kami, this stinks. How the hell did I fall asleep here?" he asked himself. As he tried to move, his hair started to rub against the toes framing his face. This irritated them, so the did the only thing they could. They slammed against each other, leaving Naruto to breath in their stink. They rubbed against each other until finally separated, happy they stopped the irritant. Naruto quickly decided to just let the two giants wake up on their own, leaving him to deal with their foot stink. He waited for thirty minutes until one of the feet moved of him, signalling it's owner was awake.

"Haahh!" Tsume yawned as she got up. She quickly got up and moved to where Hana and she kept their mate. It wasn't until not seeing him there did she remember where he was. "Oh yeah. I forgot about that. Guess that explains the foot massage dream I had last night. I guess I'll check on him before letting Hana wake up." Tsume said before going to the foot of the bed and reaching under, until feeling a lump near Hana's foot. She quickly pulled her hand out and bringing the lump to her face. Naruto was happy to the the giant hand grabbing him until he was brought up to Tsume's face. "Good morning, little one." her voice boomed. It also gave him a taste of her morning breath. It must have been bad, too, because it left Naruto coughing on his knees. "Oops. Guess I'd better brush my teeth." Tsume said with a chuckle. She then closed her fist and walked to the bathroom to freshen up. She quickly gets done with everything and carries Naruto to their kitchen before placing him onto the table. "Now don't run away. I'm gonna fix breakfast, so if you run, there's no guarantee that you won't be stepped on. If you don't run, I promise this day will be easy." Tsume said before leaving Naruto on the table.

"Now's my chance to get away." Naruto said after Tsume turned away. He slowly and quietly reached the edge of the table before dropping down. He then maneuvered himself so that he was close to a table leg. He then jumped and grabbed it before skidding his way down to the floor. "Whoa! That was kinda fun. Now to find someone that can get me to Tsunade." Naruto said before walking away. It was slow, but he eventually made it to the doorway leading outside the kitchen. He was just about to escape before a shadow loomed over him. Looking up, all he saw was a wall of tan coming down on him. "Oh crud." he said before being mashed into the foot. "Good morning mom." Hana said as she walked into the kitchen. "Hey Hana. Did you enjoy having our mate at our feet last night?" Tsume asked with a smirk. It was wonderful. By the way, where is he?" Hana asked. "He should be on the table. If not, you might have stepped on him." Tsume said, not worried about where their mate was. It would be easy to find him now. Hana looked at the table, but was unable to find him. It wasn't until she felt something wiggle under her foot did she know where he was. "You were were right mom. I guess I stepped on him." Hana said. "Oh well. Just leave him down their for now. He needs to learn not to run from us." Tsume said before continuing with breakfast. It wasn't until she was done did Hana peel Naruto from her foot.

"You see? I told you you shouldn't run. I think we will have to punish you later." Tsume said as she sat at the table, eating a bite of scrambled eggs. Hana also ate eggs and bacon, but giving a tiny piece of each to Naruto. "Yeah Naruto. If it was my brother that stepped on you, you might have been badly hurt. Thankfully he lives in his own apartment for now." Hana said. They ate in silence after that, while the two women kept an eye on him to make sure he doesn't run. Is wasn't until after the dishes where done did Tsume talk. "Now that we all ate. I think its time to tell you how our day will be. First thing is getting you our clan marking. You're small, though, so you'll have to get it on your back. Next, we would have relaxed with you at our feet and watched a movie. Sadly, you tried to run, so while Hana and I watch the movie, you will be massaging our feet. Next is lunch before doing the dominate ceremony. After this, we'll have dinner and go to bed. Sound good Hana?" Tsume asked. "Perfect." Hana smiled while patting Naruto on the head. She was excited about the ceremony. It was very important to decide who wore the pants in the relationship for Inuzukas and this ceremony decided it. The people involved would basically try to get the other to submit in some way, either in a fight or just domination. Afterwards, the people mate, with the dominate cementing their role. Thankfully, they can use a jutsu to age their beta's body up to semi match theirs. Thankfully, it was very chakra extensive, otherwise its use on a battlefield would be horrifying. The trio then get up and start their day.

What next?
1452112221212222111122211121211.title: Time for a mother daughter chapter.

145211222121222211112221121.content:
As Kiba was making his way to his destination, Kiba told Akamaru to stop and as his canine companion came to a stop, Kiba got off the horse sized dog and went to check his sandal, meanwhile Naruto had to hang on to Kiba's toes as he didn't want to fall off. Then Naruto felt Kiba's foot shift and Naruto clung to Kiba's ring toe for life as he then felt the sandal come off and then Naruto saw the gigantic face of KIba glaring down upon him as the Inuzuka heir said, "So this is what was bothering my foot, a flea!" Kiba then plucked Naruto off of his toe and began to think what to do with the flea until he saw a giant anteater feasting on a nearby anthill and Kiba had an idea and said to Naruto, "I got something "Special" planned just for you..." as Kiba carefully approached the anteater and then said to the "Flea" in his hand, let's see of anteaters can eat fleas!"

Then before Naruto knew it, Kiba flicked Naruto in the direction on the anteater and just as he landed near the anthill that the anteater was eating from, Naruto then heard Kiba say, "As much as I want to see if the anteater eats ya, I have someone to see in Sora-Ku, So I'll just leave you to the anteater, Come on Akamaru we gotta go!" as Akamaru gave a loud bark in agreement and Naruto heard the colossal sized dog with his owner on his back leave him to his fate.

Then as if thing couldn't get any worse for him, Naruto then saw the giant anteater stare right at him and then it attempted to snatch him with it's tongue and Naruto just barely jumped to evade the anteater's tongue and he began to run for his life as the anteater suddenly began to chase after him and attempt to catch him with it's tongue.

Naruto ran as fast as his five year old legs could go but he knew that the anteater was getting closer if him having to jump to avoid the tongue was of any indication, until Naruto saw what looked like a bush and throwing caution into the wind, Naruto made it underneath the bush and when he stopped when he thought was deep enough, Naruto saw that he was now inside of a thorn bush but then he saw the anteater approaching and then attempted to snatch Naruto with it's tongue and he saw that it was getting closer until he saw the tongue get caught by some of the thorns and he heard the anteater yelp in pain as he saw the tongue retract into the safety of it's mouth and saw the anteater begin to leave the thorn bush and back into the forest.

After seeing the anteater leave in pain from trying to eat Naruto through the thorn bush, Naruto knew that he couldn't stay inside the thorn bush forever and he knew that he had to get back to the village, so Naruto then carefully left the safety of the thorn bush and he began to try and find a way out of the forest, but because since both Kiba and Akamaru left him there to be eaten by the anteater, and due to his size, Naruto had no idea how to get back to the village, so without any other choice, Naruto began to try and find his way back to Konoha.

After a while of walking Naruto began to notice that it was beginning to get dark as a sudden cold wind brushed against his naked body, Naruto then tried to hug himself to stay warm but as he was now walking on top of a nearby tree root, Naruto had his eyes closed until he bumped into the rear of an insect and the impact knocked Naruto onto his butt, then after shaking off the dizziness, Naruto then saw a certain insect that he never thought of seeing again, as the insect was mostly grayish black in color and it had a long nose like an elephant and it had big blue eyes... to Naruto's amazement as he knew that this was a female Bikōchū beetle! Naruto couldn't help but feel a sense of nostalgia as he hadn't seen one of these since when he was normal sized and was thirteen years old and when he along with Shino, Hinata and Kiba went on a mission together to get this beetle.

Then suddenly Naruto had an idea, he could use this beetle for a ride to fly to the village and with that idea in mind and seeing that the beetle didn't notice him, Naruto quietly and carefully crept up from behind the female beetle and then without warning, he jumped onto it's back, thus frighting the beetle and causing it to fly into the air, while Naruto held on tight to it so he wouldn't fall off, Naruto was trying to control the beetle but before he knew it, he and the beetle were then suddenly captured in someone's hands.

Then Naruto and the female Bikōchū beetle were then placed into an insect carrier and through the plastic box Naruto then looked at his captor and to Naruto's shock as he saw that his captor was none other than...

As Kiba was moving fast as he and Akamaru were making there way to Sora-ku, at some point Naruto had to cling onto Kiba's ring toe for dear life so that he was not thrown off and he held on, he wondered to himself, 'Why is Kiba in such a hurry to get to Sora-ku for!?' it wasn't until they had arrived at Sora-ku that Kiba had FINALLY slowed down to walking speed and as Kiba walked to Nekobaa's shop, he and Naruto could hear Akamaru growling obviously because the abandoned city was crawling with cats and Kiba had to tell Akamaru to calm down, until they made to the shop and Kiba told Akamaru to wait outside and to stay out of sight as Kiba and Naruto entered Nekobaa's shop.

After Naruto recovered, He saw where he had landed and then he stood up and began to walk around on the cat's skin, but his bare feet was causing the cat's skin to become itchy and then suddenly Naruto felt like the cat waking up and it raised it's left hind leg with it's claws out and soon Naruto saw that a colossal shadow soon covered him and when he looked up, his eyes widened in fear as he saw a colossal cat's paw begin to descend upon him, jumping out of the way at the last second, Naruto barely dodged the claw and began to run as the clawed cat's paw chased after Naruto until he was cornered until he had no other choice but he had to jump so he did know that he'd survive the fall thanks to the invulnerability just on his body.

choices: Naruto takes his chances through the fire
Naruto gets sucked into Nekobaa's mouth
1452112221212222111122211221.content:
After Naruto had abandoned cat, he fell on to the floor and began to run as fast as his legs could go, but even in her old age, Nekobaa saw something small in her store and saw what she believed was a flea.

"From that Inuzuka boy no doubt." Nekobaa said to herself as she stood up and grabbed the flea and held him in her index finger and thumb and began to wonder what to do with him until she suddenly had an idea as she looked at her pipe and then grabbed it and then shot Naruto a look, "I know what to do with you now..."

Before Naruto could do or say anything, he was then stuffed inside her pipe and packed down, nearly being buried under the tobacco.

As he struggled to get out, something large blocked out the light of the pipe's opening and he looked up to see the old woman's eye gazing down at him.

"What the hell is happening?" Naruto shouted. Up above, Tsunade must have felt something on her foot and decided whatever it was needed to go away. Unconsciously, she maneuvered her foot to make it easier to get to and quickly got started. She prodded at whatever was causing the strange feeling with her sock covered toe before ramming it into the spot. She then started to scratch vigorously, not stopping until she thought she stopped the feeling. This worked for a minute before she felt it again. This time around, she slammed both feet together and rubbed hard. After a few minutes off this, the feeling seemed to go away for awhile, and she finally quit. "Oh thank Kami." Naruto thought. "I wasn't sure how much more of that I could take." Naruto quickly fell back asleep, hoping that he would wake up in the morning.

It was three hours after that that he felt movement from Tsunade. "Huh? What now?" He thought. He felt a feeling of weightlessness before feeling something slam onto him back and front, only to have the same feeling repeat again and again before stopping for a short while, leaving him being crushed into Tsunade's foot. From above, he heard the sound of water running before it stopped. He then heard gulps coming from what he assumed was Tsunade. "Haahh!" she sighed after finishing her glass of water. She then traveled back to her room, being careful not to wake anyone up. She quickly got back in bed, but not before feeling something off with her foot. "Huh?" she thought sleepily. She quickly reached down and removed her socks and, after finding the spot, started to scratch again, making sure to focus on the one area. "Ow? Ow! Ow! Ow!" Naruto said as he felt Tsunade's fingernails run across his back. It was an excruciating experience for the small Uzumaki that lasted a few minutes before with one final scratch, she retreated her hand away and covered back up, leaving Naruto in pain from the scratch marks on his back. He eventually fell asleep until morning.

"Huuhh!" Tsunade yawned. "That was a wonderful night of sleep." she said as she got up, only to feel something under her foot. "What the hell is under my foot? Something has been there all night." Tsunade said before bringing her foot up to see, only to remember what happened yesterday. "Oh yeah. I forgot about you. Guess I'll have to get used to having you under there." Tsunade said as she looked at the tiny form tied to her foot. Barely even caring about it, she just put her foot down and quickly got dresses, leaving only her feet barefoot. As she did, Naruto was in pain from what she was doing to him. "Almost done. Now for my favorite pair of sandals. Good luck with them. I've had them for years." Tsunade said from above him. He could only watch as one of the well worn sandals came at him until finally leaving him trapped. Stomping down to make sure it was on Tsunade quickly left and headed for her office.

As she got there, she made sure to pick up something she could use to hear her new toy. With every step she took, she made sure to slightly twist her foot and make Naruto suffer more. "This feeling is amazing." Tsunade thought to herself as she got closer to her office. Sadly, what she neglected to do was check what was keeping Naruto tied to her foot. As she had scratched at him that night, she didn't realize that she was also weakening what was keeping him with her foot, and the grinding finished the job as she twisted. One step was all it took to send Naruto flying away from her. He quickly hit the floor and could only watch as she walked away from him. "Thank Kami. Now maybe I can find someone who would actually help me. I better hurry before she realizes I'm gone."Naruto said as he watched for someone who could help him. Soon, he saw someone familiar coming up on him. "Hey! It's Shizune. Maybe she could help me. I better time this right, otherwise I'll just be stuck under her sandal." Naruto said as he for ready to jump. The only question now was if he jumped in time before Tsunade found him.

What next?
14521122212122222112.title: Tied to her foot.

145211222121222221121.content:
"Oh my. Look what decided to stay put. How smart of you." was all Naruto heard before a shadow overtook him. He could only look up and see a hand come down before gripping him and lifting him high into the air. He was quickly brought up to the owner of the hand's face and realized who it was. "That is perfect. You may be able to learn respect for me after all." Tsunade said. Without even looking at him, She just walked off to her office like nothing else happened, all while Naruto watched as giants continued their day as if nothing happened.

Quickly returning to her office, Tsunade immediately sat down, brought her hand up to her desk, and dropped the cargo that it carried unto her workstation. As Naruto tumbled, he could only hope that Tsunade really did think he was waiting for her. He quickly brought himself to a halt and looked up at his captor, only to see her giant face looming at him. "Now then, I'm not sure what you were doing, but I'm giving you the benefit of the doubt and assume you weren't trying to escape, but waiting for me to come back and find you." Tsunade's voice boomed above.

Tsunade just stared at Naruto after that, thoughts running through her head. She was being serious about giving him the benefit, but it also wouldn't do to have him not believe that she wouldn't punish him. She then drifted her eyes down to her feet. "Well, I could make him massage them, then play with him using my toes, but that seems a little over done. Then again, it also feels amazing when he squirms." Tsunade thought. Her eyes then drifted to a seal hidden beneath her desk where she stores some sake for when she needs to take the edge off and relax a bit. "Or I could dip him in sake and use him like a sucker. I'm not sure what he tastes like, so he could either ruin the flavor or enhance it. Either way would be fun. Tough choices." Tsunade finished.

As she thought this, Naruto could only sit and think about how to escape. "OK. If she puts me at her feet, I could probably run and hide from her. She wouldn't be able to find me, and I could think of how to escape here. Or she finds me and I get stuck with a horrible punishment like cleaning her mouth or being her deodorant. I just have to make sure she doesn't see me." He finished to himself.

"Okay. I think I know what to do now." Tsunade's voice boomed, knocking him out of his concentration. "To make sure you know what to expect, I'm gonna play a little game called punishment. This is what will happen when you disobey me. For now, I'm just gonna do something easy." Tsunade said before reaching and grabbing him. He could only watch in fear and curiosity as she brought him beneath her desk and to her…
145211222121222221121.title: Too late. Tsunade found him.

choices: A regular class (both boys and girls)
1452112221212222212.content:
"Ugh, it's just another bug... seriously this building is getting more bugs than the Aburame compound!" Tsunade said to her as she looked at Naruto and was thinking of what to do with it.

Naruto was praying to kami that she would just flick him away from her so he can get out of here but apparently Tsunade had other plains, "I got it! I'll send you to the village's preschool as a toy! Sure you're a bit small, but it's a bunch of little kids! They'll play with you anyways!"

At that, Naruto paled until his skin matched Orochimaru's and he began to struggle to escape from Tsunade's grip. But to no avail. All his efforts did was serve to amuse the woman.

"Heh...from the way you're struggling, it's almost like you can understand me. Guess you're eager to get to your new home and be enjoyed. Well...who am I to stop you?"

Tsunade then placed Naruto into a glass jar and sealed it with a top that had breathing holes and then she placed it upright into a package and gave it to a mail ninja she summoned and he took the package and ran to a nearby preschool. All the while, Naruto was panicking as he was now being sent to a bunch of snot nosed kids to be "played with"...just his luck.

"I gotta get out of here!" the shrunken boy cried. Panicked, Naruto slammed into the glass in front of him, a tiny *ping* sounded as he bodychecked it, only to be flung backwards by his own action, the clear wall before him utterly undamaged and unyelding.

Terrified of the destination, Naruto kept at it. The results did not change. All the while, he knew every step of the mail ninja was bringing him closer to his doom to be played with by little kids for the rest of his life. And knowing how rowdy little kids could be, that may not be very long!

Naruto felt the blood in his veins freeze as he felt the mail ninja stop and heard muffled voices as he figured he made it to his destination. Then he heard the box being opened and he soon saw a woman with black hair, glasses and was wearing some lipstick as she removed Naruto's jar and looked at him and then she opened the lid and went to a case where the class pet would be held in and then she dropped Naruto into it and closed the lid of the case.

"Oh, it was so kind of to donate this. I'm sure the children will love it. What an interesting little bug. It looks so cute and innocent. All the better to have some fun with." The woman said, tapping on the case. "And if not...I could take it home to keep."

Naruto paled. No, no, no, no, no, no! He ran around the case, looking for a way out, but there wasn't one! While he wasn't sure which kids would enjoyed playing with bugs, what really scared him was that he didn't know whether they were dangerous games or not.

Oh, what was he kidding?! At Naruto's current size, they'd ALL be dangerous!

"Well, you certainly are a feisty little thing, aren't you?" The woman snickered, "Don't worry...you'll be introduced to your new playmates soon enough. You're gonna love it here."

At that, Naruto moaned in despair. Sitting down, he hugged himself as he eyed the clock, each tick was something to dread as it passed.

Finally, the bell rang, signaling the terror of the inevitable, and the kids entered; allowing Naruto to see he was goint to be the plaything of...
1452112221212222212.title: Preschool Panic!

choices: Naruto is going to be taken home by one of the girls
Naruto is going to be taken home by the teacher.
14521122212122222121.content:
Naruto went pale as, to his horror, the room filled up with nothing but preschool girls! This was bad! Girls thought bugs were icky! They'd squash him! He didn't want to die!

As the last of the girls entered, the teacher clapped her hands to get their attention, "Class, I have a special surprise for you, we have a new class pet from lady Hokage herself; so please take good care of it."

At that, the girls all went up to the case and in moments, Naruto was overwhelmed. No matter which direction he looked, he was met with a swarm of giant faces as the preschool girls all tried seeing just what the "new class pet" was.

"Ewww! A bug! Gross! Why would the Hokage send us a icky yucky bug!? Send it back!!!" They cried upon seeing what was in it.

"It's more scared of all of you than you are of it. Think of how big and scary we look to it." The teacher said with a slight frown. It looked like the girls would need to learn that for themselves. With that in mind, she opened the top of the case and Naruto saw the silhouette of what looked like a giant misshapen spider enter the insect case, heading for him.

It was her hand!

NO! NO! NOOO!

As the teacher reached inside Naruto's case, the four-year-old naked Uzumaki began to run attempting to escape her hand's grasp.

But in such a small case, Naruto had very little room to run and as Naruto ran, he hit one of the woman's fingers and he was quickly ensnared within her hand and was moved from one warm, fleshy surface to another. The back of the teacher's hand. The woman's face got closer, but not too close. She smiled at him, then looked up and over him.

"See? Nothing to be afraid of. It's perfectly all right, girls. You try, and you'll see. Have it crawl along your hands, then pass it along to the next person."

She was talking to the preschoolers, reassuring them. Naruto unsteadily stood up, and looked around at the rough terrain of the back of a teacher's hand. The hillocks of the knuckles signal the beginnings of the finger peninsulas, which lead off to a void of nothingness below.

The land moved, and one the girls' faces become bigger. Oh no, it looked like he was being offered to her. Naruto was terrified she'd blow him off, or crush him, or something. It's all over!

"Go on."

The girl's eyes widen, but her hand slowly rose up alongside the one Naruto was standing on.
Once more, he exchanged one warm, skin-covered platform for another. He could feel the blood pumping through the veins beneath him, and every tiny motion of the hand caused the Uzumaki to need to re-correct his balance.

Naruto looked up into the face of the not-so-little girl. The look of revulsion has been replaced with one of curiosity. A half-smile crept its way onto her lips.

"See?" comes the voice of the teacher.

Encouraged by the non-violent reaction of his captress, Naruto begin to walk towards her wrist.

"That tickles." booms the girl's voice, all the more deafening for being closer, catching the other students' attention.

As he approached her wrist, Naruto suddenly had his path blocked by a wall of flesh. Looking up, he saw that the girl's other hand had been laid there for him to climb onto. He reached out to touch it, running his hand along the creases folded into the underside.

"C'mon bug, get up." she coaxed.

Sighing, Naruto climb onto his third hand in as many minutes, once more luxuriating in its warmth and smoothness.

Then he fell over as the right hand of one of her classmates was suddenly lying next to him, palm down. It nudged him gently, making Naruto stumble back a pace.

"Go on, move!" laughed the new preschooler's voice. And having no choice, he obeyed.

The process repeated endlessly, going from girl to girl, their previous disgust melting away with each pass to them and they saw what their teacher meant.

As he was returned to the teacher by the last girl, the black-haired woman deposited him in the class pet case again. The preschoolers surrounded the case again, only this time, the girls were all smiling at him.

The teacher then clapped her hands to get their attention again, "Alright class let's leave our new bug friend alone, as we have work to do." All of the girls groaned but did as they were told and went to do their school work but they also took occasional glances at Naruto when they thought their teacher wasn't looking and to Naruto displeasure the teacher was also taking occasional glances at him too...

Before he knew it, it was the end of the day and just before all of the girls were preparing to leave while some looked at Naruto, suddenly their teacher then said, "Alright class, before we all go home I thought that maybe we can ALL get to know our new pet bug better so I came up with a very special assignment that until we all got to know our bug friend better, we will draw our names from this hat and the one chosen will get to take our pet bug home and I want a full report on how our pet bug does in your home. and to make it fair those who already had their turn with the bug will not be added into the hat, understand?

after hearing a loud, "HAI!" all of the girls wrote down their names and placed them into the hat and even the teacher did this too and soon the hat was filled with all of their names and she shuffled the ht around and, "and the first on to take out new bug friend home is..."

As this was going on Naruto was panicking to who was going to be taking him home as he was afraid of what the preschool girl was going to do to him and then he heard that.
14521122212122222121.title: An all-girl class!

choices: The following day in the girls preschool classroom
145211222121222221212.content:
"Oh... I guess I'll be the first one who takes our new bug friend home." The teacher said as she held the piece of paper that had "Suzume" on it. All of the girl let out a loud "Aww.." as they didn't get to play with the bug, then one girl asked, "Hey does this mean that you have to write a report?"

The teacher laughed, "I guess it does." she said as her students all giggled at the thought of their teacher getting homework. "Don't worry, girls; I promise to bring our new pet bug friend back tomorrow, and during free time, we all get to enjoy our bug together as a group." Suzume promised, getting a cheer from her students before they left.

Soon, Naruto was alone in the room with Suzume. He eyed the woman wearily. She had long, curly, black hair and wore oval glasses along with red lipstick. Her outfit consisted of a simple pink kimono with mesh armor underneath and a pair of baggy red pants with flip-flop-like sandals worn with socks.

"Well, little one; first off, I want to tell you good job making it through the day. From the way my preschoolers were after getting to see you're harmless, you really captured their hearts. As a good pet should. You'll be loved on by the girls quite a bit from now on."

Naruto paled at that. It didn't sound like a good thing from his perspective!

His fear grew as he watched the teacher pull out an ordinary glass jar and set it down before looking at him. "In you go, bug." she said casually, before thumb and forefinger closed around Naruto, lifting and dropping him into the glass prison. The impact hurt, a tiny *ping* sounded as he landed.

Pushing himself up, all Naruto could do was watch his captoress set about finding a plastic cap for the cup, she snapped it on and gazed at him. "Okay, little one...Time to go." Suzume said as she then carried the shrunken and naked Uzumaki out of the classroom and headed to her home for the night.

After arriving and closing the door to her home, Suzume then walked to a nearby coffee table and then walked into the kitchen and while Suzume was in the kitchen, Naruto was looking around to see if he can find a way to get out of here until he heard Suzume, "All right little one... before I can actually let you stay in my home with me... I must have you properly cleaned and sterilized so come here." as Suzume then grabbed Naruto in a glove covered hand and before the shrunken Uzumaki could attempt to run he was already caught in the latex glove and then she walked quickly into another room, towards what is obviously a "sanitizing" station and turned the sink on. Hot water started to fill the sink. The woman pushed in the stopper and let the water fill up into a nice steamy pool and then plunged the bug into the scalding hot water.

Naruto hit the scolding hot water face first and sunk. He struggled to move and kicked his way to the surface. He broke the surface and sweet air filled his lungs then he suddenly found himself sucking in water.

Suzume looked at the bug and then put both hands in the water as she started rubbing it all over and started rolling it around, then getting some soap and dunking again. She held both her hands and the bug underwater, making it all soapy. She hummed a small rhyme to herself as she worked her fingers over the bug.

Naruto was drowning as Suzume worked. He was grabbed and nearly pulled apart as his legs went one way and his torso was pulled another. He tried to make it up for air, but only get a gulp before he cascaded down again. Suzume's gloved hands rolled him into a ball and squeezed, then wiggled him out, then rolled again and squeezed. Naruto screamed, loosing all his air as his arms and legs were bent back and forth and strained. He yelped, wriggling and flinching in the water and at the subsequently added chemicals and vigorous scrubbing via stiff bristle-brush.

Finally, Suzume seemed satisfied, as she pulled her preschool class' bug from the sink, dried it efficiently and roughly with a hand towel, than carried the little thing into the kitchen and set the bug down on the table while she took up a seat in front of it and considered what to do next.
145211222121222221212.title: Suzume's Bug Scrub

choices: Suzume locks him in a box until morning
Suzume puts him in her sock and wears them to sleep
Suzume tapes him to a lightbulb and leave it on all night
1452112221212222212122.content:
Pushing her glasses up, Suzume narrowed eye eyes at her class' pet. It was a strange bug...it wasn't black or green or anything most bugs were colored. More like peach or tan. And it only had four legs...almost like a person....

"...That's absurd..." the teacher shook her head. "...a tiny person...even thinking this little bug is one is just silly..."

Naruto withered at the titanic teacher's dismissal of him and continued to assume he was a bug. Then again....because of those jutsu used on him, this was something he would have to get used to. He sighed. He couldn't afford to say a preschool class pet! He still had to find who did this to him and why they did! He got up and started moving. First step was escaping this woman!

Suzume stared at the bug scrambling around on the table, letting it run a bit before blocking the bug off with her hands, making it crash into them before the bug turned and ran another way, only for the same thing to keep repeating as she kept cutting it off.

Naruto panted. He had to get away, but every time he tried, he was blocked and bumped into those yellow, rubber walls that Suzume called hands. He glanced up at her and was humiliated to see that she was smirking down at him in amusement. Ok...he had to throw her off somehow.

Then Naruto ran towards the edge of the table and then quickly jumped off of the edge, shocking Suzume she then attempted to snatch him from the air but Naruto ran on top of her hands and jumped off her gloved covered fingers until she saw him land on the floor.

Stunned by his landing, Naruto rolled over with groan before a shadow came up from above him. Looking up, all he could see was the underside of Suzume's sock-covered foot just before she brought it down. He scrambled out of the way as the foot came down, but didn't get any rest as the other foot quickly rose up and came down for him. Naruto tried to run, but could do nothing as the chunin kunoichi continued to stomp her feet down around him. With one last jump, he landed on something soft. Looking down, he quickly realized just what he had landed on...then clutched the fibers of the sock as the foot he was on rose up and then, an impossibly tough fingernail bashed at him, and Naruto's body took the prompt as an excuse to relax, letting go of the sock and toppling down, down and after a while, the color of his surroundings changed. As it did, so did what they felt like. Rubber. He looked up and saw Suzume looking down at him. She'd put him in one of her gloves!

Holding the glove by it's open end, Suzume watched as a tiny bump tumbled into one of the fingers. Grinning, she prodded at it for a bit. "Heheh...got you. Now...time to punish you for trying to run away, little one." The woman smirked and carried the glove the bug was trapped in.

Naruto whimpered as he felt his current prison be carried off to a new part of the teacher's home. Punish?! Punish how?!
1452112221212222212122.title: Escape is a no-go

choices: She keeps him in her socks with her feet for the night
She goes out dancing with him in her sock
The following day, Suzume's plans for Naruto
14521122212122222121222.content:
Suzume then had an idea and pulled off one of her socks before she stuffed the bug inside and looked down at it, "This is your punishment, I hope you won't take this personally, but naughty little bugs deserve to be punished."

Naruto paled as Suzume inserted her bare foot back into the sock and he tried to run, but he was trapped as he felt Suzume's toes hit his back and push him to the toes of the sock.

Suzume was relaxing on her bed with her socks on and couldn't help but giggle as she felt the bug struggle against her toes in her sock and then she flexed them all, but made sure not to crush the tiny bug inside of it. She smiled and closed her eyes joyously.

"Such a unique bug. And all mine to play with. The idea of loosing you to anyone makes me just wanna. . . . pop you. Hee Hee Hee!! Squishy squishy in my sock!! You go squishy, little one!!" Suzume said playfully.

Meanwhile inside Suzume's sock, Naruto was not having fun as he was getting battered around by Suzume's toes as they played with his body, occasionally flexing on his body and Naruto was trying to fight his way out, but he was too weak from the "bath" earlier that he was barley putting up a fight.

"Ahahaha! That feels nice~! Should I keep you in there forever?" The teacher taunted playfully, rolling the bug under her toes and lightly squeezed it like a stress doll. All things considered, Suzume was enjoying her utter domination over her class' pet. She really would need to thank the Hokage...Oh!

Finally escaping the toes, Naruto backed away from them only to fall down before something pressed the wall of fibers that made up the inside of the sock into him and Naruto was pinned to the sole of Suzume's foot by it.

Feeling the tiny bulge the bug made, Suzume let out a moan as she dragged it all over along her sole using the big toe of her left foot, feeling the bug struggle all the while.

"Heheheh...fee fi fo fum! See what happens when you try to run?!" The teacher taunted.
14521122212122222121222.title: Cell Block Sock

choices: hide-and-seek, Naruto vs the entire class
1452112221212222212123.content:
The next morning, Suzume woke up and saw the container she placed Naruto in and remembered what happened as the bug attempted to escape and, thinking it learned it's lesson by now, she went to the container and then got Naruto and placed him back into his jar and sealed the lid and went to do her morning ritual.

Then she saw what time it was and soon put on her socks and sandals and then picked up her classes papers, her "report on the pet" and the class pet's jar and went out the door and locked it, as she then went towards the school.

After a while Naruto woke up dazed and confused as he wondered what happened until he saw that he was back inside the jar that brought him here and that's when everything hit him like Tsunade's monster punches then he felt the jar being lifted up and saw the classroom and then he felt the jar turn to show him Suzume's face.

"Adieu, little one...indeed, parting is such great sorrow! I enjoyed having you, but once today is out, one of my students will get you. Part of me wishes I could keep you as a personal pet, but you belong to everyone in my class. At least I can see you all throughout the day, and you shall never want for affection with the girls." the teacher said, somewhat dramatically before blowing him a kiss.

After that, Suzume placed his container back on the counter and she went back to her desk. Suddenly, to Naruto, the room started to shake as if he was in a earthquake and then he realized what time it was, he paled as the door was forced open as he saw the giant preschooler girls stampede into the room while saying hello to Suzume until one of them saw Naruto and then they all ran to his container and one girl grabbed his body until another attempted to hold him and before the shrunken and naked Uzumaki knew it, they were all fighting over him until thy all heard Suzume, "That's enough girls!"

As the class all stopped and looked at her, Suzume frowned at the girls, "If you don't behave yourselves, I'll have to take our class pet away!"

"But teacher....you already got to have the bug!" One of the girls whined.

"And if you're all too rough with our class' new little bug friend, we won't have him anymore. You could hurt or squish him if you're not careful!" She scolded in reply.

At that, the preschoolers all looked horrified.

"I told you all yesterday, during free time, we all get to enjoy our bug together as a group. Put him back and wait, ok." Suzume said.

Nodding, the girls did so, reaching into the case and lightly (to them) patting their class pet on the head as they said sorry to both Naruto and Suzume. After that, the day proceeded much like it had the day before where All of the girls did as they were told and went to do their school work, but they also took occasional glances at Naruto when they thought their teacher wasn't looking.

Finally, the girls went to go eat lunch, but as they gathered their meals and went outside, they each stopped at Naruto's case and deposited a bit of food into it for their bug.

Well...at least Naruto wasn't going to starve. As the students filed out, the de-aged Uzumaki made his way over to the meal pile and started eating. He had a feeling he was going to need the energy. It took him what felt like hours to finish each tiny crumb of food the class had left him, and his stomach felt full to bursting. He laid down flat on his back with a groan and waited to feel better after digesting everything.

All too soon for Naruto's liking at all, the bell rang to signal the end of the lunch period, and then suddenly the door then burst open as all of the girls in class stampeded in and Naruto could only watch with a look of horror on his face. In moments, he was surrounded on all sides by giant, young, eager faces as the girls all jostled to get a look at him.

He felt a girl's hand grab his arm and began to flail him above the her head only for her grip to slip and Naruto then flew into the air and landed in a nearby toy pile where some other girls raided and then he was grabbed by a little girl who had her mouth open and then Naruto's face was then smothered by her tongue while at the same time being shoved into her mouth and then the girl pulled Naruto's head out of her mouth and then shoved him into her shirt and started to jump around acting like she was a kangaroo, but then another girl then stole Naruto from her and then began to run while holding onto his leg, all the while Naruto's face went rigid in horror and his right eye to now constantly twitching, and then he felt like he was grabbed by another girl who was now wearing a tiara and then sat with him in front of a toy with shaped blocks and a wooden hammer next to it, only to Naruto horror she never grabbed the hammer but she was now using his face as the hammer to pound the block through the board, then Naruto felt like his arms were being pulled by two girls, as the girl wearing the tiara was now pulling his left arm and another girl that was wearing a different tiara was pulling on the right arm.

Naruto felt like his arms were going to be pulled off until he was then quickly snatched up by a girl and she pressed his face into her lips and she began to cover his face with saliva and then Naruto was pulled away from her and then shoved into another girl's chest as he was now being hugged, then another girl grabbed Naruto and pinched his cheeks, and then he kept getting grabbed and "loved" on by the girls in their own way....

As the preschoolers all loved on their little bug, they talked among themselves, trying to decide on something they could all enjoy doing with their class pet until the drawing to take the bug home with one of them happened again.

Eventually, the girls all smiled down at their bug as the class decided on...
1452112221212222212123.title: The following day in the girls preschool classroom

choices: Class is over, time to see who gets to take the bug home by picking another name
Naruto sees an opening and attempts to escape
The class thinks of another game to play
14521122212122222121233.content:
All of the girls then sat down on the rug in the center of the classroom and they each took off their sandals and then sat in a circle as the girl who was holding Naruto placed him right in the center of the circle.

Naruto was looking for a way to escape from the preschool girls, but all he could see were their giant feet all around him as he was fully surrounded by their barefeet with their toes wiggling in excitement and anticipation.

Then Naruto heard one girl say, "Okay the rule are whoever's feet our bug friend goes to must not laugh for ten seconds cause if you laugh you lose and the last one in the circle gets to play with our bug friend until recess is over okay?"

14521122212222221.content:
Karin was having a weird day, as she for some reason or another couldn't help but feel like something or more like SOMEONE was missing from her life and she didn't like it, she didn't like it at all. She never had the best childhood as she remembered she lost her mother being leeched dry of her chakra, just to save a few dying, but ungrateful grass-ninjas before they used her for the same thing. Karin shuddered, she still sometimes got flashbacks of their filthy teeth sinking into her skin, vampirizing her...

She shivvered, she clung to Sasuke and was so loyal to Orochimaru! They were pretty much the only "good" people she'd had in her life since her mom was leeched dry of all her chakra by those Grass village bastards. With her troubled life, she'd developed into the type that'd cling to anything "good" in her life.

She shook those thoughts off as quickly as they came, those moments of her life were over now, thanks to Sakura and....someone she couldn't remember taking her to Konoha and convincing the Hokage to allow her to stay here as a ninja. And Karin found herself quite happy with that. All in all, Karin found herself enjoying Konoha more and more. This was what she'd been missing all those years without ever realizing it. An actual life… not always on the run from someone or something. Not always under the watchful eyes of cruel superiors or being stared up at by eyes begging for mercy she could never grant. Control of her life was back in her hands.

NOW IF ONLY SHE COULD TELL WHAT WAS MISSING!

At first, she agreed with Tsunade by saying that Sasuke saved her and brought her to the village, but something that sounded like her mother's voice always told her that it was a lie and that Sasuke tried to kill her instead of saving her.

She didn't know why but she always believed in the voice and just played along, anyway, as she was walking by she saw the Konohamaru squad being denied pay by some creep with a bug fetish, so she "accidentally" tripped him and when he hit the ground, his bug case spilled open and all the insects began running away. Karin smirked at that, it felt GOOD teaching jerks like that a lesson! But then, her eyes zoomed in on a strange bug still in a jar held by Moegi, just looking at the insect she could feel a familiar sense of warmth and brightness in her life. She didn't know why, but she had to have that bug in the jar!

Konohamaru and his friends all laughed as the bug-creep as he ran off bawling and whining like a baby.

Konohamaru smiled greatfully at the redhead "Thanks. Is there a way we can pay you back for teaching that jerk a lesson for us?"

Karin's eyes lit up a bit. Score! This was just what she'd need to get that but and see why it seemed so familiar! "Actually, there is. Mind if I have that last bug in that case. Wouldn't mind studying it." Karin told them.

"You...want this bug?" Udon asked.

Karin shrugged, "What? I did do work as a researcher under one of my...old bosses..." she said,being sure to avoid Orochimaru's name around Konohamaru, the snake sannin HAD killed Konohamaru's grandfather, after all.

The trio all looked at one another and shrugged before Moegi held out the bug's case and Karin took it.

Inside the case, Naruto gulped as he changed hands and was then brought up to Karin's face as she smirked at him.

Just great. He was shrunk, de-aged, naked, everyone had forgotten about him, he was mistaken for a bug, and now he was in Karin's possession! Who knew what she'd do to him?!
14521122212222221.title: Something's "bugging" Karin

choices: "Who needs sleep?" She continues her study on the "bug" all night long

145211222122222211.content:
As Karin was walking home with her new possession, Naruto couldn't help but feel that his day was getting worse by every passing second, First he has been shrunken to one inch, then while he shrunk he also de-aged back to being five years old, also everyone has seemed to forgot about him and now he was the possession of Karin Uzumaki and she was going to study him like some kind of guinea pig, he had to try and get away from her.

As Karin made it to her apartment, it was a duplex with three rooms, well four if you count the bathroom, there was the main room which Karin just entered, her room which had a queen sized bed for two, a dresser and a closet full of clothes and of course the kitchen.

Karin then took off her sandals and left them by the door and placed Naruto's case on her coffee table in the main room as she went to the kitchen to make herself some dinner before she began to study her new "bug".

After having a quick microwaved meal, the redheaded giantess was back looking down at him in his case before taking the top off and picking him up between her fingers.

"Now...let's see just what you are and why you feel so familiar to me, little bug." Karin said, placing Naruto into a laboratory pan and tapped his arms and legs down spread-eagle.

Being put in that position made Naruto struggle, deeply embarrassed.

Seeing the "bug" struggling, Karin shook her head, "Sorry for making it so you can't move, but I can't get a good look at you if you're crawling around everywhere, bug." she said as she picked up a magnifying glass and looked down at Naruto through it.

Naruto gulped and shuddered as Karin's massive, magnified eye stared directly at him. It was very intimidating, to say the least.

"HMMM...INTERESTING...YOU'RE A VERY FUNNY LITTLE GUY AREN'T YOU. YOU'RE NOT BLACK OR GREEN OR ANYTHING, YOU'RE MORE LIKE PEACH OR TAN... AND YOU ONLY HAVE FOUR LEGS, YOU'RE NOTHING LIKE ANY OTHER BUG I'VE EVER SEEN... AND WHAT'S THAT YOU HAVE ON THE TOP OF YOUR LITTLE HEAD? IT LOOKS... LIKE... HAIR. AND NO EXOSKELETON, EITHER...WEIRD."

Naruto winced at the way the size difference effected the sheer volume of Karin's casual voice this close and made him feel like a thunderbolt had gone off right next to his ear, her vocalization was battering his body, even her hot breath scalded his bare body.

Karin frowned as she noticed something off about the bug, the image of it seemed to blur worse and worse the more she tried focusing on it and it's features....that wasn't normal.

Pulling out a notepad, the redhead jotted down everything she observed, including the blurring image. After that, she then carefully removed the tape from the bug's limbs and picked it up, carrying it over to a controlled environment box she'd set up, complete with fake insect finger puppets for company, rocks for it to climb over, and artificial grass turf so the bug felt more relaxed. And in order to see what the bug ate, there was a small pile of dried fruits and vegetables in one corner.

Naruto actually sighed in relief as the redheaded giantess carefully lowered him into his new environment, and looked up at her as she adjusted her glasses and looked down at him.

"You're no ordinary bug, that's for sure. You'd better get yourself comfortable, little guy...cause it looks like you and me are in for a long haul together." she told him.

Looking at the time, Karin thought about turning in for the night, but she felt excited and wanted to keep studying this fascinating bug and she then decided...

14533222.content:
Here's an idea:

The most dreaded type of specter in japanese culture is the onryō. They are the ghosts of people who died with such strong passions —jealousy, rage, or hatred —that their soul is unable to pass on, and instead transforms into a powerful wrathful spirit who seeks vengeance on any and everything it encounters. Onryō appear as they did when they died. Often they were victims of war, catastrophe, betrayal, murder, or suicide, and they usually display wounds or marks indicative of the way they died.

Onryō are easily powerful enough to swiftly kill any person; however, they prefer letting the object of their hatred live a long life of torment and suffering, watching those they know suffer and die. They inflict a terrible curse on the people or places that they haunt. This curse can be transmitted to others through contact like a contagious disease, creating a circle of death or destruction that is far more devastating than any ordinary ghost. They make no distinction in whom they target with their grudge; they just wants to destroy. Moreover, this vengeance can never be satisfied as it can for most ghosts. While most yūrei only haunt a person or place until they are exorcised or placated, an onryō’s horrible grudge-curse continues to infect a location long after the ghost itself has been laid to rest.

Occasionally, an onryō’s curse is born not out of hatred and retribution, but out of intense, passionate love which perverts into extreme jealousy. These onryō haunt their former lovers, exacting their wrath onto new romances, second marriages, their children, and eventual end up destroying the lives of the ones they loved so much in life. Whatever the origin, the onryō’s undiscriminating wrath makes it one of the most feared supernatural entities in all of Japan.

Well...think Mikoto Uchiha's spirit —motivated by guilt over Naruto's life and the role the Uchiha Clan had in wrecking it, as well as feeling she failed Kushina by not taking care of her best friend's son —could become an Onryō and make the ENTIRE LAND OF FIRE SUFFER for the misfortunes Naruto's had to endure?

How does THAT sound to you?
14533222.title: Onryō option
