145332221.content:
Naruto looked around. What the...? The last thing he remembered was falling asleep in his own bed, how had he gotten to a courtyard? Pushing himself up, he noticed he wasn't in just any courtyard, it was in the middle of the ruins of the Uchiha clan compound and he wasn't alone. There was also another occupant, practicing katas.

Slung across their back was a shakujo, or monk's staff. The metallic pole was a deep ebony black, seeming to absorb the very light around it. The ring that sat atop of the staff was a burnt orange color. Running vertically through the ring was a simple bar covered in black leather. Stitched into the leather were etchings of six magatama, comma shaped symbols. Instead of the usual rings that dangled from the main ring, This shakujo had nine short lengths of chain hanging from it.

Gripped the bar that lay inside the ring portion of the shakujo, the person gave a tug and revealed that hidden inside the pole of the staff was a razor sharp blade, the staff portion of the shakujo having acted as a sheath for it. The blade itself was carmine in color, and had only a single edge and lacked a curve, meaning that it was a chokuto-class blade. The blade produced an aura that was luminescent green and smokey, and when swung, it left green mist in its wake.

The one welding it wore a high-collared, white-coloured kimono held closed by a black sash. The collar of the kimono was adorned with black magatama designs, and they wore a black full-bodied suit underneath and black gloves covered their hands, along with the usual type of shinobi combat sandals that covered the instep and ankles, yet left their toes and heels exposed, the sandals being black in color.

Covering the person's face was a Hannya mask, similarly used in Noh theater, possessing two sharp bull-like horns, metallic eyes, and a leering mouth. The Hannya mask was said to be demonic and dangerous but also sorrowful and tormented, displaying the complexity of human emotions. When the actor looks straight ahead, the mask appears frightening and angry; when tilted slightly down, the face of the demon appears to be sorrowful, as though crying. The Hannya mask represented the portrayal of the souls of women who have become female demons due to obsession or jealousy. Hannya masks appear in various skin tones: a white mask indicated a woman of aristocratic status, a red mask depicted a low-class woman, and the darkest red depicted true demons. The mask was framed by the individual's long, straight black hair with bangs hanging on either side of their face to roughly frame their cheeks.

The individual stopped their practice and whipped around, exposing the Hannya mask was such a deep shade of red, it was nearly pitch black! Ok...what kind of person saw themselves as THAT demonic?!

The person reached up and removed the Hannya mask to expose the face of a fair-skinned woman with long, straight black hair with bangs hanging on either side of her face that roughly framed her cheeks. Mangekyō Sharingan in the form of two overlapping trefoils of red on black looked back at Naruto sadly as his own eyes widened in shock. Naruto's jaw dropped. No...no freaking way!

"MIKOTO UCHIHA?!"

Said woman gave him a small, sad smile. "Hello Naruto-kun...you've grown." she said softly.

"Wha...?! But...?! You were...! You're supposed to...?! WHAT IS GOING ON?!" Naruto sputtered at the supposedly dead woman.

"I reached out to be able to touch your dreams so we could talk, Naruto-kun." the woman explained as Naruto gaped at her.

"Then...why are you here? I mean...shouldn't you have passed on?"

Mikoto laughed brokenly, spreading her hands wide, "I would have, but my spirit's far too burdened to ever allow that, given all my failings in life. I failed to stop Fugaku-teme from ripping apart Itachi's childhood, I did nothing about the Uchiha's attempt at a coup, even though most of them didn't even WANT it to happen! Itachi was forced to slaughter our entire clan, the children...oh kami the children, he spared Sasuke because he couldn't bring himself to kill his little brother, Sasuke became so black-hearted and it just kept getting darker and darker until there was nothing left but an endless abyss of murderous hatred that he became an international criminal just so he could have more people to hate and kill after committing Fratricide! And worst of all; I failed both YOU AND KUSHINA —the life you could have had and the role the Uchiha Clan had in destroying it, how I never even helped you...Kushina Uzumaki was my best friend and more importantly your mother, and I failed by not adopting you and taking care of my best friend's son the one time she really needed me—after she and Minato died and you were orphaned! I didn't even get to see you once or ever let you know I knew her! I've done nothing but fail the people who truly mattered to me when they needed me most over and over again!"

Naruto winced at that, sympathy and pity reigned supreme among his emotions towards Mikoto after hearing that. Truth be told, he didn't blame or hate her for that. Given Fugaku's plans, as well as the Uchiha's and Kurama's history with one another (a large case in point being that madman Madara's showcasing his Sharingan hypnosis being used on the kitsune way back when during his fight with the Shodai Hokage) it would only have ended poorly in one way or another if she tried giving Naruto a home and family by taking him in. Even if people didn't misinterpret why she would take him in, the bijū within him would have gone absolutely rabid for the ways the Uchiha wronged it in the past. If that didn't happen, the rest of the Uchiha clan would have wanted to see Naruto become weaponized for them to use. If Mikoto gave Naruto the kind of life he deserved, then he would have developed a sense of attachment to her that the rest of the Uchiha clan would have exploited. Worse case scenario, they would have tried breaking the seal open to use Kurama...

"It's OK Mikoto, it wasn't your fault." Naruto reassured the distressed woman's spirit.

Mikoto gave a hollow smile. She was glad that Naruto was forgiving, but that only fueled her guilt.

"Hey you have the Mangekyō Sharingan? But you aren't the type for the horrendous atrocities that are usually committed to obtain that level. Your too humane for that." Naruto said, trying to find a topic that wouldn't leave her feeling guilty.

"I know, but the Mangekyō Sharingan is triggered by a great emotional surge that accompanies a highly traumatic event. It was between Kushina's death and my own failings to take care of you that gave me this, how couldn't I not get it?" she asked, replacing her mask on her face.

Naruto winced at that. That was actually the opposite of what he intended. "I'm so sorry." he apologized, the words tasted ashen, stale, and hollow in his mouth.

Mikoto shook her head. "It's OK you didn't know. But, about that part about me being too humane, I actually now find it funny since I'm no longer human—if I ever deserved to say I was one in the first place, given how I made so many regrets by playing the obedient housewife, pretending all of the most important things were someone else's problems...I realize now that I gave up all the power to change things willingly. You see, what I've become is one of the ghosts of people who died with such strong passions —anger, jealousy, rage, or hatred, or even intense, passionate love —that their soul is unable to pass on, and instead transforms into a powerful wrathful spirit: an Onryō."

Naruto gulped. Great just great...he was speaking to a desolation-causing grudge-spirit! Naruto wasn't really afraid of anything really—if you didn't count his phobia of ghosts (What? Years of growing up alone in a small and old apartment, as well as a lack of parental love and/or protection from such 'terrors' had done well to turn what was a childish fear into a very paralyzing phobia. Was it embarrassing? Yes. Did Naruto really care? No. He was brown-pants-required afraid of ghosts, and while he had accepted it, it still didn't change the fact that he couldn't punch a ghost square in the face.)

"And...uh...why am I here, then?" he squeaked, feeling frightened. And for good reason: not only did the specter Mikoto say she'd become a vengeful spirit to kill someone, but he heard that onryō were capable of doing things like influencing natural disasters such as earthquakes, fires, storms, drought, famine and pestilence for example; however, they could also put the ones affected by their vengeance-curses not only through physical suffering, but rather psychological torture as well.

Mikoto smiled sorrowfully again, "Just to let you know we'll be seeing each other again real soon. You'll see, this was forged by another specter I met, the blade-smith Muramasa, using a piece of my own soul...if it's even possible for an Uchiha to say they have one." Mikoto said, holding up her shakujo staff sword. "I found out I can use it for something very interesting."

Mikoto then suddenly slashed the air, ripping what appeared to be a hole in the fabric between the worlds, exposing Konoha on the other side with what seemed to sound like a very loud woman's blood curtailing scream. Naruto's could of sworn his ears popped at the sound. Mikoto then walked through the rift, which closed behind her.

14533222211.content:
"Well Naruto...if you would be so kind, I was wondering if you would give me a nice full-body massage?" Katsuyu said.

Hearing that, Naruto looked up at Katsuyu, the slug being predominantly white in colour with three blue streaks that ran vertically down the middle and side of her body from her head and tapering off at her tail. Katsuyu's optical tentacles having a slight tint of grey to them and she also had two sensory tentacles on either side of her slit-like mouth, Naruto gulped, clearly intimated.

Katsuyu was enormous, easily as tall as the academy, which was the largest building in Konoha! And he was expected to give her a massage?!

THAT task was going to take a while!

"Uhh...Katsuyu...? Not to be disrespectful, but...well...you're pretty big..." he winced at that as his new owner loomed over him at that.

To his surprise, however, Katsuyu spoke in a soft, polite tone, "I see that, Naruto. You are quite itty-bitty compared to me." she giggled, making Naruto open his eyes and let out a relieved breath he hadn't known he was holding.

"Uh...yeah, and I don't want to do anything wrong, but I don't know about slugs, so..." Naruto trailed off.

At the unfinished request, Katsuyu nodded and started explaining about her anatomy. Starting with how slugs and snails were members of the phylum Mollusca, along with the clams and oysters as well as squid, cuttlefish and octopus. Slugs evolved from snails and many species still retained a vestigial shell hidden under their mantle. The remnant shell was, however, used primarily for calcium storage, rather than protection.

The slug’s cousin, the snail, has an outer shell that he can pull his soft little body into when a raccoon grabs him. The snail needs to have large enough calcium deposits in its environment to form this more substantial shell. The shell serves as a safe refuge from smaller predators as well as protection during dry weather conditions.

The slug is a gastropod, which translates to “stomach-foot.” A slug or snail moves by rhythmic waves of muscular contraction on the underside of its foot. At the same time a layer of mucus is secreted, which helps smooth the slug’s path across the ground.

Slugs and snails have two pairs of retractable tentacles on their head. The upper, optic tentacles, have light-sensitive eyespots on the ends. Each eye-stalk can move independently and can be re-grown if lost. The eye-stalks are also used for smell. Lower on the slug’s face are two smaller tentacles for feeling and tasting. The rasping mouth parts that will chew up food are under these tentacles. Slugs eat using a radula, a rasping, tongue-like organ, covered with thousands of tiny tooth-like protrusions called denticles.

Body openings include the anus and genitals, which are hidden under the mantel. The odd position of these openings so far forward on the body is a result of the slugs evolutionary descent from snails. In a snail these openings must be outside the shell (nobody wants to poop in their own shell, after all). Slugs are hermaphrodites with both male and female sex organs (thought Katsuyu informed Naruto that in spite of being a hermaphrodit, SHE was female). These sexual organs come out only when an especially attractive possible mate appears. What constitutes an attractive slug? One that will let another slug mate with it. Not too picky, but that expands the slug dating and mating world extensively.

Since slugs were such slow movers, they couldn't afford to wait until the third date to go for it. One may follow a slime trail to another slug, introduce itself, and get down to business. The mating dance begins as the slugs encircle each other and exude a heavy layer of slime. When both parties are ready the genitals are extended from under the mantel.

Slugs practiced “apophallation,” the entwining of corkscrew-shaped penises for the exchange of sperm. However, the corkscrew method was more easily done than undone. Mating often ending with one or both slugs chewing off the other’s penis. The slug-sans-penis is still able to mate using its female sex organs, but must develop a more feminine outlook on the whole game.

And finally, seeing as Katsuyu noticed Naruto's very green face after all that about slug reproduction, she took pity on her new pet and told him about a large respiratory pore, usually on the right side, called a pneumostome, which lead to the single lung slugs possessed.

Naruto groaned, feeling like information overload would fry his brain. "Well...asked and answered about needing to learn about slug bodies for this, but that massage is still going to take a while to do...I swear, it'd be so much easier if I still had access to my chakra..." he rubbed his temples. Oh, when he got his hands on that pink-haired, screaming bitch...!

Katsuyu couldn't help agreeing with him there, a horde of Shadow Clones would make his job easier. But then, while Naruto was unable to do that, Katsuyu had the ability to divide herself into smaller clones of various sizes to evade attacks or to serve small-scale functions, and was capable of quickly reforming herself if need be.

Realizing that, Katsuyu knew that the downside to that was, Naruto would need to give Katsuyu DOZENS of massages if she did that as opposed to a single, admittedly very time-consuming, rubbing if she stayed her current, massive size.

Well...to be fair, Katsuyu DID plan on using Naruto as her treat, but eating wasn't what she had in mind for him..

Naruto panicked at that, thinking he was going to end up getting swallowed, but he didn't move any further into Katsuyu's maw. Katsuyu was sucking on him?!

"Come to mama, little thing!" the slug cooed, laughing as gravity drew him closer to her. Naruto screamed as he fell forward. As he was falling he could see just how enormous Katsuyu was, easily as tall as the academy, which was the largest building in Konoha! Ino...but this was NOT the Ino he knew.

The Ino-like monster girl resembled a combination between a dog and a lion, she had fair skin, featureless blue eyes, platinum blond fur on most of her body and at the end of her long tail. She had long, platinum blond hair worn in a ponytail, with bangs framing the right side of her face, wore a golden crest with a emerald colored gem on her forehead, had floppy ears that looked like they could possibly stick up like a rabbit's and had a brown scale-like underbelly but left her breasts bare (although, it DID look like she was wearing a golden bra) and on the top of both of her arms and legs.

Naruto's jaw dropped. 'Good thing Ino isn't here...otherwise she'd flip over how hairy that monster-version of her's is...!' he fearfully thought, knowing that the Ino he knew back home would have a major fit over the sight of this version of herself.

"So... Hina, have you gotten any bolder?" she asked and Hinatazilla squeaked.

"...Queen Inosar..." Hinatazilla said in a shy tone of voice.

Naruto's jaw dropped at the name of this new one. QUEEN?! Okay...Ino would have loved hearing that!

"So, that's a no huh? Geeze Come on Hina! You'll never get anywhere by being a wallflower that withers at the slightest thing!" Queen Inosar said, then took notice of Naruto and grinned sardonically as she got an idea.

"For instance..." she said, quickly snatching up Naruto from Hinatazilla's claw before he could even say anything, "...you won't be able to stop anyone from taking this handome little guy away from you!"

1453322222221122222222.content:
Ok...time for a mismatch. How about a good girl mixed with an evil Kaiju?

Sāra from the movie "Naruto Shippūden the Movie: The Lost Tower" combind with the Kaiju, Destroyah?

Destoroyah is often considered one of Godzilla's most merciless, intelligent and evil foes. Unlike monsters that kill and destroy unintentionally and act only out of instinct or while under mind control, Destoroyah seems fully aware of the death and destruction he causes, and takes pleasure in causing it. His cruelty is most visible when he attacks Godzilla Junior, and later kills him while the latter is trying to reunite with his father. While Godzilla is grieving over his son, Destoroyah attacks him on two separate occasions, even appearing to laugh while he drags Godzilla by the neck. This makes Destoroyah only the second kaiju to attack Godzilla both emotionally and physically, after SpaceGodzilla. Destoroyah's strategies seem to revolve around causing as much pain to his opponents as possible, as his aggregate form is shown repeatedly stabbing Junior with his limbs and administering extremely painful doses of Micro-Oxygen into the wounds.
Non-film media also depict Destoroyah as incredibly evil and malevolent. According to Destoroyah's bio in the game Godzilla: Unleashed, Destoroyah "seeks nothing else than the total annihilation of all life-forms in existence." In the comic series Godzilla: Cataclysm, Destoroyah is described by one character as a "demon," and at one point splits apart into his juvenile forms and brutally massacres several villagers one by one. Destoroyah exhibits similar behavior in his appearances in other IDW comic series.

Meanwhile, the benevolent young queen, Sāra, has the power to feel and control Ley Lines (Pathways for the very essence of the planet!) and can grant infinite power to those who harness it. Sāra is capable of either opening up that power or sealing its flow and preventing anyone from using it.
Sāra has a stubborn yet brave personality. Even though she refused to believe that Anrokuzan was deceiving her, once she found out the truth, she did everything in her power to protect her people from him, and once they were all safe, continued to stand by Naruto's side to help stop Anrokuzan from misusing the Ley Line's power as a tool of destruction and domination.

Put the two togeather and you'd have Sārastroyah, one of (if not THE) most powerful beings on the planet!
1453322222221122222222.title: Sārastroyah

14533222222211222222221.content:
Just as Hinatazilla was about to take Naruto to her nest, she suddenly sensed that someone was coming and fast, someone who clearly wanted Naruto all for herself and when she thought of that, a loud series of stomps were heard and soon enough another Kaiju Girl appeared.

Hinatazilla was now clenching Naruto and holding him close to her breasts as she glared at the newcomer, Naruto looked at this new Kaiju girl and she also seemed very familiar to him, she seems to be around his age like Hinatazilla is, she has long red hair, violet colored eyes, red and black skin, she also has a single sharp horn in the center of her forehead, sports four pairs of bat-like wings on her back, a large pair on top and a smaller pair on the bottom, she also has a large pair of curved horns on the sides of her head, she also has a mouth filled with sharp teeth, she has a feminine humanoid body structure, has razor sharp claws on both her hands and feet, she also has a large pair of curved blood red spikes sticking out of where her shoulders should be, five spikes sticking around both the middle of her legs, and a long tail with a pincer at the end.

"Sarastroyah..." Hinatazilla hissed.

"Hinatazilla..." The newly named Sarastroyah replied.

Naruto's eyes widened for a number of reasons, one, was that he just learned that these Kaiju Girls CAN talk. Two, he just saw Hinatazilla activate the Byakugan as the bulging veins around her eyes were a dead giveaway for that. Three, speaking of the Byakugan, apparently the Kaiju Girls CAN use chakra, too. And four was more of a question than shock, why did this Sarastroyah look so familiar to him?

Aside from her human face, Naruto just couldn't put his finger on it, there was something very familiar to him about this Kaiju Girl standing in front of him and Hinatazilla, but what could it be?

As Sarastroyah looked at Hinatazilla, or to be more precise, the human male she was holding, for some reason she felt that she needed to have him with her, it wasn't a need or want actually it was more of a compulsion to be with him but she herself didn't know why, and the sooner she took him from Hinatazilla, the sooner she'd know why she had that compulsion.

"What do you want, Sarastroyah?" Hinatazilla growled out, not liking the fact that the she-devil Kaiju girl on this island was standing before them.

Sarastroyah looked surprised at seeing shy and sweet Hinatazilla sound so angry at the fact she was here and said in a somewhat hurt voice, "Can't I just stop by and say hello to one of my fellow Kaiju girls?"

"Not unless you want something out of said visit." Hinatazilla said, holding Naruto very closely without taking her eyes off Sarastroyah.

Sararstroyah just sighed and said, "Alright, fine nothing gets passed you Hinatazilla, I want that human you're holding and I won't take "no" as answer, so either hand him over now and you won't get hurt or we fight and I'll just take the human from you by force. So what's it going to be?"

Hinatazilla looked at Naruto for a moment or two and thought about what would happen if she just handed him over, she knew Sarastroyah was called the She-Devil of the Island for a very good reason, as far as any Kaiju Girl on the island knew, she loved to torment weaker creatures as a form of amusement and if she gets her claws on this human....

NO! no! She wouldn't let that happen! She WON'T let that happen! Not if she could help it! She sore that she would be this human's protector, his friend and maybe even his mate!!! She won't let him down now!

So with that in mind, Hinatazilla placed Naruto on the ground by her right foot and stepped in front of him, shaking the ground where he stood for a bit before he soon ran to find shelter and when he was far away enough from Hinatazilla, Sarastroyah used her horn and fired an energy beam and made a deep hole circling around Naruto saying, "Wouldn't want our prize to run away now do we?"

Hinatazilla roared after seeing Sarastroyah do that and charged at her, with her claws and teeth barred, and Sarastroyah using her four wings to fly straight towards Hinatazilla, the time for talk is over and battle for Naruto Uzumaki has now begun.

As he was watching this from his position Naruto could only say to himself, "Yep, definitely should've stayed home, and yet as I am a guy, Is it wrong for me to admit, that I'm not sure if I should be either turned on or terrified knowing that these Kaiju versions of girls I know are fighting over me?
14533222222211222222221.title: Hinatazilla Vs. Sārastroyah Intro

145332222222112222222211.content:
Hinatazilla was the first to strike a blow with a claw swipe with her left, but
the horn projecting from Sārastroyah's forehead suddenly generated an orange blade of energy that extended and took the form of a katana and sliced into her arm, making Hinatazilla cry in pain and backed away, but Sārastroyah's tail lashed out and the pincer it ended with caught Hinatazilla around the neck.

"What do you want with him?! Besides, could he even survive being around you since your cells contain miniaturized oxygen atoms that contain more chemical energy than normal oxygen atoms that cause violent and corrosive chemical reactions that penetrate or disintegrate virtually any material!?" Hinatazilla said, struggling with the pincer around her neck.

"Like you're one to talk! Your necular radioactive energies leave everything in your wake contaminated! Water, plants, animals! How long would that little thing even last with you before radiation poisoning killed him?!" Sārastroyah snapped, feeling offended the walking geiger counter overload was saying that.

It wasn't her fault that the Oxygen Destroy chemical that made up her cells isolated oxygen molecules, split, and then liquefied them so that any organism exposed to the chemical composition of her cell structure would first suffocate from the lack of oxygen, and then disintegrate, or that depending on the amount of the oxygen destroying chemical released, the body of the victim will either be eaten down to the bone or destroyed completely!

Naruto paled. While having no idea about what necular radioactive energies were, he understood this radiation was leathal!

The BOTH of these girls were leathal!

Sārastroyah let out a cry as Hinatazilla jabbed her index and middle claws into a point on her tail in what Naruto recognized as a gentle fist (or was it "gentle claw" in this case?) strike and the tail and pincer holdong her went slack. Gripping it. Hinatazilla started to twist and spun, throwing Sārastroyah away from her.

However, Sārastroyah opened her wings and caught the air and turned in the air before hovering above the ground looking down at Hinatazilla before she suddenly smirked and the sky above her darkened and suddenly, a piller of light amathyst energy erupted from the ground and enveloped her for a moment, came into itself and she absorbed the light and the piller faded and Sārastroyah landed, smirking at Hinatazilla.

"Did you forget that your pokes are redundant? I can feel and control Ley Lines and either open up or seal the flow to the pathways for the very essence of the planet, so channeling that power to override the effect of those taps of yours is an easy task for me!"

At that, Naruto's eyes widened. Ley Lines and the ability to control them...why did that sound so familiar? He suddenly gripped his head as it started throbbing like he had a sledgehammer pounding a railroad spike between his eyes! Through the pain, he saw flashs of a city of towers he'd never been, seeing the shadowed image of a red-haired girl's face, but not her features, and there was the sound of static roaring in his ears when he tried making out sound...what was wrong with him?!

He was brought out of it when everything shook and he saw that Hinatazilla and Sārastroyah had started fighting.

Seeing them clash, Naruto tried thinking of how to stop things before he was made collateral damage or a trophy. He could send two shadow clones to talk to them while they're fighting? Wait...no. The clones would get stomped like bugs if they got anywhere near those two while they were fighting like this. He considered summoning a toad, but he didn't want the summon toads dragged into the middle of that kind of fight...at best, they'd think he'd started acting like Jiraiya and refuse to help him once they saw the monster girls' bodies; at worst, the toads would get killed trying to get involved in the fights. Destoroyah is often considered one of Godzilla's most merciless, intelligent and evil foes. Unlike monsters that kill and destroy unintentionally and act only out of instinct or while under mind control, Destoroyah seems fully aware of the death and destruction he causes, and takes pleasure in causing it. His cruelty is most visible when he attacks Godzilla Junior, and later kills him while the latter is trying to reunite with his father. While Godzilla is grieving over his son, Destoroyah attacks him on two separate occasions, even appearing to laugh while he drags Godzilla by the neck. This makes Destoroyah only the second kaiju to attack Godzilla both emotionally and physically, after SpaceGodzilla. Destoroyah's strategies seem to revolve around causing as much pain to his opponents as possible, as his aggregate form is shown repeatedly stabbing Junior with his limbs and administering extremely painful doses of Micro-Oxygen into the wounds.
Non-film media also depict Destoroyah as incredibly evil and malevolent. According to Destoroyah's bio in the game Godzilla: Unleashed, Destoroyah "seeks nothing else than the total annihilation of all life-forms in existence." In the comic series Godzilla: Cataclysm, Destoroyah is described by one character as a "demon," and at one point splits apart into his juvenile forms and brutally massacres several villagers one by one. Destoroyah exhibits similar behavior in his appearances in other IDW comic series.

Meanwhile, the benevolent young queen, Sāra, has the power to feel and control Ley Lines (Pathways for the very essence of the planet!) and can grant infinite power to those who harness it. Sāra is capable of either opening up that power or sealing its flow and preventing anyone from using it.
Sāra has a stubborn yet brave personality. Even though she refused to believe that Anrokuzan was deceiving her, once she found out the truth, she did everything in her power to protect her people from him, and once they were all safe, continued to stand by Naruto's side to help stop Anrokuzan from misusing the Ley Line's power as a tool of destruction and domination.

Put the two togeather and you'd have Sārastroyah, one of (if not THE) most powerful beings on the planet!

1553332111.content:
As far back as anyone can remember, the life of a ninja is not an easy one but compare it to the life of a shrinkee, then the ninja life is the easiest life, for at least they don't have to worry about getting stomped, crushed, eaten, enslaved, used like a new version of guinea pigs for experiments or as living targets for genin to jonin's weapons and jutsus. But it wasn't always like this, let's turn the clock back, back to the days of the first hokage Hashirama Senju.

Hashirama was just sitting in his office bored and he was about to go to the Kage-Summit to form a lasting peace with the new villages by sharing the tailed beasts Konoha had acquired with them, thus balancing power amongst them. Then afterwards he would return home to continue to spoil his first granddaughter, Tsunade and hopefully have more children with his beautiful wife Mito but as soon as he got up from his chair a Konoha shinobi entered with a horrified expression on his face as he said, "L-l-lord Hokage I bring you terrifying news from border patrol!" Hashirama raised an eyebrow at this and said, "Alright calm down, take a deep breath and tell me what's the matter, you look like you just saw someone just dissappear right out of their clothes right before your eyes."

The shinobi did as he was told and said, "That's exactly what happened!" Hashirama had a stumped look on his face while he asked, "pardon?" The shinobi continued, "My whole troop was just doing our shift watching over the border, then a strange fog bank rolled by us covering everything in it's parh and when it fully passed us, at first we just thought of how odd it was until...until it happend, Mei suddenly began to shrink right before our eyes! She was shrinking fast until she was practically buried under her clothes at one-inch, and it wasn't just her Kenshin was then shrinking too, fortunately he stop at the one-inch mark, then Meko, then Yumi at one inch they were all shrinking around me and even now I'm beginning to feel the affects of the fog, I just dropped them off at the hospital" and as he was talking he really was shrinking fast right before Hashirama's eyes, before he knew it he dug through the shrunken shinobi's clothes to see him curled into a ball naked at exactly one-inch tall placing the shrunken shinobi on to his hand Hashirama asked, "Can you tell me where exactly did this fog come from?" The shrunken shinobi said, "That's the thing lord Hokage I Don't know it just appeared out of nowhere."

After Hashirama took the shrunken shinobi to the hospital to see if the medics can find a cure he left for the Kage-Summit to hopefully get some answers, when he arrived to his shock and horror he saw that some of the other Kages have shrunken to exactly one-inch tall too. It was then they came to an agreement, until they discovered an antidote for this strange epidemic no village was to attack eachother under a forced ceasefire and true to Hashirama's word he even shared the tailed beasts Konoha had acquired, thus balancing power amongst them.

Once he returned to the village he was further horrified at what he saw, apparently the fog didn't just affect shinobi and kunoichi, it also effected the civilians at radom many people normal sized or shrunken were running around the place, the normal people who were looking for shelter against the fog and the shrunken people who were trying not to get crushed by the people's feet.

Hashirama then called for a immediate council meeting and began to try and think of a solution. They deliberated over it until they finally came to an agreement, one which Hashirama didn't like at all, first they were going to separate the shrunken people from the normal sized people by giving them a new name, the new name shrunken people to be known by was now "shrinkees" second until they found a cure for the shrinkees they were to have to pay less than the normal people because of thier new height.

Hashirama knew that this was not going to end well but it was a majority vote so he didn't have a choice. Fortunately for him and his family seemed to have been spared from the fog and as the years went by things were not so bad for humans and shrinkee alike, until Madara Uchiha his old friend and rival eventually returned to Konoha with the Nine-Tails under his control, challenging Hashirama to one final contest. The Nine-Tails' power, as well as Hashirama's efforts to capture and contain it, devastated the landscape, carving out what would later be called the Valley of the End. Hashirama spent the duration of their battle trying to reason with Madara, but Madara ignored his pleas and continued fighting until he was too tired to even keep his Sharingan active. This enabled Hashirama to distract him with a wood clone while the real Hashirama stabbed him in the back. Madara collapsed and, before dying, noted how much Hashirama had changed from when they were children.

In the aftermath of the battle, Tobirama hid away Madara's body and Hashirama's wife, Mito, sealed the Nine-Tails within herself in order to contain its great power to Konoha's benefit. But the peace Hashirama had worked so hard for between not only the villages but also between the "humans" and "shrinkees" was starting to unravel; at some point in time Takigakure sent an assassin named Kakuzu to assassinate him. Although he defeated Kakuzu, many other wars began to break out and many more people began to shrink under the effects of the fog at random, and it was during one of these wars that Hashirama ultimately died. Before his death however he passed the title of Hokage to his brother Tobirama, but also instructed him not to mistreat the Uchiha clan or the shrinkees.

As the years rolled by Tobirama would work tirelessly to achieve political stability and implement the institutions that made the village system work, thus ensuring Konoha's continuity and prosperity, Tobirama's role as Hokage included helping Konoha's shinobi transition from valuing their clans above all else to valuing the village and everyone in it including the shrinkees. To this end he created such institutions as the Academy, the Anbu, the Shrinkee Research and Development and the Chunin Exams. While largely successful, enough that other villages adopted the same organisations, the Uchiha clan resisted the loss of their autonomy. Already wary of the Uchihas because of their history with Madara, Tobirama created the Konoha Military Police Force for the Uchiha to run, publicly as a sign of trust but primarily so that the Uchiha could focus their energies into something beneficial. Others, however, would come to see this as a way to marginalise the clan. Like Hashirama before him, Tobirama tried to foster good relations with the other villages. He planned an alliance between Konoha and Kumogakure, but during a formal ceremony he and the Second Raikage were attacked by the Gold and Silver Brothers and left near death.

During the First Shinobi World War, Team Tobirama, as well as Danzo Shimura, Torifu Akimichi, and Kagami Uchiha found themselves surrounded by Kumo's Kinkaku Force. With no way for all of them to escape, Tobirama volunteered to act as a decoy in place of Hiruzen. As he departed, he passed the title of Hokage to Hiruzen, before being killed by Kinkaku.

It was during Hiruzen's reign as Hokage that the relationship between humans and shrinkees in the village began to even worsen, while not his fault the "Humans" were becoming more upset to see that these "creatures" were getting all the benefits while they had to pay at full price and they constantly demanded change, at one time a group of shrinkee oppressors launched an all-out attack on the shrinkee research and development building and ironically destroyed what they thought could've been a cure as well as all the notes.

When Hiruzen stepped down from being Hokage, the civilian council with full support from the village elders elected Danzo Shimura to be the forth hokage and thus began to make the leaf village into his own image and also made a law that shrinkees were no longer to be considered as equals with "PURE" humans and anyone who killed a shrinkee without prejudice was forgiven and pardoned. But thanks to the efforts of Hiruzen's two students Jiraya and Tsunade (who are shrinkee supporters.) they drove Danzo and his root anbu out of the village but the damage he made has already been done even when Tsunade took over as hokage. She could not undo the law that Danzo created without the full approval from both sides of the council as well as the elders approval which she knew they would never do.

During the time of Danzo's reign as Hokage ending and Tsunade becoming Hokage, in a building that specializes in training shrinkees from birth to become pets or sexual toys that will put dildo making companies out of business was a young shrinkee boy at the age of eleven with lightly tan skin, blond spiky hair and blue eyes, while inheriting the shape of his mother's eyes and face. His trademark characteristic are the three whisker markings on his cheeks sitting in the corner of a cage with other shrinkees who just finished their training awaiting the day when they well be shipped out of here to be sold to the humans for their pleasure. While he may not have been raised by his parents due to them both already dead he knew he had to get out of here and he wasn't going to be renamed by some human, he already had a name his mother gave him with her dying breath, his name was Naruto Uzumaki and he was going to get out of here one way or another...
1553332111.title: Original Naruto series - How it all began

15533321111.content:
Naruto clenched his fists, resolved. He was getting out of here! Naruto was able to use "some" chakra but only for wall walking and water walking. No other shrinkee can have any of these abilities. Why he was different, he had no clue, but that wasn't important right now.

He'd carefully kept his abilities to use chakra secret from the breeders. No telling what they'd do with a chakra-capable shrinkee...

And with that chakra came something else. A dōjutsu kekkei genkai that gave him a blood red sclera, with a black pupil with a purple horizontal bar in the middle of the pupil. it gave genjutsu capabilities comparable to that of the Sharingan, and something else.

Somthing even more important right now, the means to freedom: the the ability to manipulate blood, or more accurately the iron in the blood, allowing the user to not only manipulate blood, but anything with high iron concentration almost magnetically.

However, his control over the abilities it gave him was bad, (seeing as, being a shrinkee, he was never trained as a ninja, so the abilities would trigger sporadically since Naruto wasn't taught how to control them and he could only use his eyes for a single minute). Which side or branch of his family it came from, or even what the dōjutsu was called, he had no clue. But just this once he had to make the abilities submit to him just this once!

Any minute now, the shrinkee breeders would be here soon to ship his cage-load of shrinkees off! Naruto glared at the bars, and a warmth wriggled and squirmed within his eyes; a wild wave of power flowing towards his retinas. The sensation settled into the center of his head and ebbed. As it did, his eyes changed and he pushed with all his will towards his desired goal. With a protesting creak, a few bars of the cage bent outwards and into a quadrilateral four-sided polygon shape. Naruto slumped forward, only just barely avoiding passing out as his eyes shifted back to normal of their own accord.

Naruto just about whooped. He did it! "C'ome on guys! We're outta here!" he said, stumbling as he got to his feet. As he rushed towards his opening, he noticed none of the others were following his lead.

Naruto stopped and turned to them. He didn't understand. "Everyone?"

"We're dead if we go out there." one said as they all looked solemn.

"And if we stay here, we die faster! Don't you see guys, this is our only chance! What's wrong with all of you?! Freedome can be more than a myth, more than a word, more than a dream! All we have to do is take it!" Naruto pleaded.

One of the others grabbed Naruto by his shoulders, glaring at him. "Idiot! Don 't you get it?! What's the point in going out there?! If we stay we at least have a chance of ending up with shrinkee supporters! Out there, what do we have you dumb kid?! NOTHING!" With that, Naruto was shoved out of the hole he'd made. He was too tired and confused and he was sent all flying. As Naruto fell, he noticed he had cleared the shelf the cage was upon and he headed for the floor. When Naruto was about to impact, however, he was sucked into an air vent. Tossed around in it, Naruto was slammed around, absorbing the painful impacts before the air current shot him out into the air outside the shrinkee facility and his small, light body flew until gravity kicked in and he was brought down for a painful impact on the doorstep of...

“Well I just assumed there’d be more. I mean, look at how shrimpy they all are! Would any of them fill you up?” The customer questioned.

“I can bring you a second order if you want.” The waitress suggested slightly irritated.

Aisha glared. "With Konoha being the most imfamous shrinkee-oppressive village in all the Elemental Nations?!" she demanded.

"That was Danzo Shimura...bastard was made Hokage before I was." Tsunade groaned, rubbing her temples. It felt dirty even thinking of Danzo running the village her grandfather made.

The reason he was no longer the Hokage was that Hiruzen, Jiraya, Tsunade and the heads of the shrinkee supportive clans (and a few people all dressed in black cloaks with white rectangular buttons, draped across their entire bodies, along with light bulb-shaped masks that split off diagonally with the color of black and white, their limbs covered by white gloves and boots to keep their identities hidden. Undoubtily members of the "Shrinkee Railroad") had found out after breaking a root shinobi into telling them what Danzo was doing for root and was even begging to turn the shrinkees they captured into living bombs and use them as weapons, nothing more than lifeless weapons and they drove him out of the village.

Furthermore, the daimyō of the Land of Fire was glade Danzo was gone, and the reason for that was when Danzo fled, Hiruzen had found Danzo's journal and mentioned that once Konoha was under Danzo's full control that he was going to assassinate him and his family and make it look like Iwa did it and claim the Daimyo's position for himself as well as be the Hokage.

Basically Danzo wanted to rule everything and didn't like to share.

"That twisted son of a bitch?! Shit...explains WAY too much about how shrinkees are treated in Konoha." Aisha winced.

Tsunade nodded, she was still working to stamp out Danzo's corrupt influence from Konoha, shrinkee treatment being a prime example of that struggle.
155333211122221.title: Alley of the Uzumaki Clan appears: the Ctral-Ctral

choices: Aisha makes it to the clan to report Tsunade's conditions with no problem
Aisha ran into some trouble during her trip home
1553332111222211.content:
After their discussion, Tsunade let Aisha go free but she couldn't let Aisha take the Uzumaki clan's possessions with her but she could take a live shrinkee from the pet-shop and she even gave the Ctarl-Ctarl girl a written order to let Aisha have any shrinkee she wants free of charge, while also giving her a message to give to her clan leader explaing Tsunade's conditions.

After she was freed to go, Aisha walked through the village until she found the pet-shop and went inside and strolled around, also hearing the owner tell her welcome.

Aisha looked around the shop looking at all the animals until her eyes landed on what she was looking for, as she found a cage having only one young shrinkee boy at the age of eleven with lightly tan skin, On his head was short, blond hair that stood up all over like the spines of a sea urchin and blue eyes. His trademark characteristic are the three whisker markings on his cheeks sitting in the corner of a cage with his knees up to his face as he had a depressed look on his face.

Aisha then tapped her finger against the cage, which caught his attention as the shrinkee rose to stand, Aisha saw the male shrinkee in all his naked glory as the shrinkee walked towards her fingers and brushed himself against them, Aisha then opened the cage and took the shrinkee out and played with him with her fingers and she couldn't help but giggle at the shrinkee as he played with her fingers and kissed them while nuzziling against them.

She found him absolutely adorable, 'If only you were my size...'
Aisha thought to herself but she quickly shook that thought out of her head, as she had a mission to do and besides she could always think of those thoughts later.

Aisha then looked at the price and her eyes widened at the price, 900000 ryo!!! If she didn't have that written order from Tsunade, Aisha would most likely be broke. The clan gave her some money, but just enough for food and to rent a hotel room for a couple of nights, but the rest was her own money from there on.

So thankful to Tsunade for helping her. Aisha carried the shrinkee in the palm of her hand and said, "I would like to take this shrinkee."

The owner looked at Aisha and the shrinkee and smiled while saying, "Good choice and it's your lucky day, cause sadly that's the only one I got today, apparently something very tragic happend at the shrinkee training facility and all the other shrinkees died.

"I see." Aisha replied as the owner asked for the money, but Aisha showed her the written order from Tsunade and nodding in understanding, the pet-shop owner was about to give Aisha a carrying case but the Ctarl-Ctarl was already heading out the door with the naked shrinkee in her hands.

Aisha while walking looked at the shrinkee and seemed to be thinking and asked, "All right, I bought you so I guess I should name you, and I do know you can speak so by any chance is there anything that you'd like to be called?"

The shrinkee looked up to Aisha and said, "My real name is Naruto, my mother gave me the name before she died."

Aisha nodded seeing Naruto was a good name so she accepted it and proceeded to a shrinkee accessory shop where people can get their shrinkees clothes, collars and other things.

While inside the shop, Aisha and Naruto then looked around until they both found something and Aisha took Naruto to a shrinkee changing room and after a moment or two, Naruto came out now wearing a tracksuit that consisted of orange pants and an orange shirt that had blue near the shoulders and was white at the neck, on the back of the shirt was a red spiral symbol, He had some bandages on his thigh and a plastic toy carrying case for tiny toy kunai knives. He also wore a small pouch on his belt for basic ninja supplies if there were any in his size that is.

Liking his new look Aisha picked up Naruto and went to the cashier and paid the full price for the suit and Aisha decided to at least finish her mission and proceeded to the village gates to return to her clan and deliver Tsunade's message.
1553332111222211.title: Naruto belongs to the Ctral-Ctral Clan

15533321112222112.content:
As Aisha and a now fully clothed Naruto who is sitting on her right shoulder are nearing the entrance of the leaf village to give the Ctral-Ctral clan leader to give Tsunade's message, a team of four leaf shinobi just arrived in front of them and after a brief talk most of them began to go their seperate ways but before they did Aisha got a good look at each of them.

The oldest one out of them seemed to be a jonin who has spiky silver hair often oriented to his left-side that somehow defies gravity, has dark grey eyes, and has typically a relaxed, heavy-lidded expression. He also seems to have his left eye covered with his forehead protector. This, combined with the mask he has used to cover the lower half of his face.

He also was wearing the standard jonin clothes a flak jacket, dark blue pants, and a long-sleeve shirt, standard shinobi sandals, etc. He also wears finger-less gloves with metal plates on the backhand and is seen with a chain necklace underneath.

Then Aisha looked at the younger three who seemed to around her age, and at least a year older than Naruto if she could guess.

The first, was a boy who has black eyes and spiky black hair which looks like a duck or chicken's ass with a blue tint. The boy's hair has hung over his face as bangs. He was wearing a navy blue, short-sleeved shirt with a high collar, white shorts, and, for a time, white arm warmers and blue shinobi sandals, and was wearing his headband on his forehead.

The second boy has short, straight black hair, and dark eyes which contrast with his translucent-looking pale skin. He is usually seen carrying a small backpack. He wears a short black-and-grey jacket with red straps. He also carries a tip-less tantō on his back. The rest of his outfit consisted of a high-collared midriff shirt, black pants, shinobi sandals and gloves with his index and thumb fingers exposed, also wearing the headband on his forehead.

The third and final member was a girl who has fair skin, green eyes, and long pink hair. (A forehead big enough to have it's own zipcode), and she is wearing a red qipao dress with sleeves, with slits along the sides accompanied by a zipper and white circular designs. She also wears tight dark green bike shorts with a shuriken holster around her right thigh, blue sandals, and the standard Konoha forehead protector worn as a hairband.

When the pink haired girl saw Aisha, but more notably Naruto the girl sneered and said in a loud voice. "What a revolting, weak little vermin that thing is! Somebody call an extermainator!"

The next thing Sakura knew was she was looking up at the sky, sprawled out on her back with her nose broken as the strange girl put the shrinkee in her pocket with one hand. The other was in a fist that had Sakura's blood on the knuckles.

Aisha placed a foot against Sakura's flat chest, and grabbed her arms under each of her own.

"NO!" The pinkette begged. "Please! DOOONN'T!"

The words didn't matter as they were quickly replaced by the Haruno's agony-filled scream. Two useless, bloody appendages dropped from Aisha's hands and onto the ground. Sakura's armless form flailed around helpless with blood quickly spraying from the nubs that remained of her arms. The girl's complexion was nearly as bone white as the two splinters that jutted from her nubs.

The Ctral-Ctral wasn't done. Grasping Sakura by the ankles, she yanked her back and raised a leg into the air, then brought it down like an axe blade. Sakura shreaked as she felt her pelvis shatter before the feline-like girl ruthlessly grabbed her legs and twisted around until, with a sickening snap, Sakura's legs were snapped off and tossed away.

"And then there was one..." Aisha growled, cupping one side of Sakura's jaw with her hand, the nails digging into skin. With a roar, the Ctral used all her strength and tore the other girl's jaw completely free of her head.

Sakura flailed in agony like a fish out of water in the center of a growing puddle of her own blood. Aisha sneered darkly then flipped the part she'd just removed over and slid it onto her hand and began using the injured girl's own jaw bone like a pair of brass knuckles, pounding away at what remained of Sakura's face.

"STOP IT!" Naruto cried, utterly horrified. "STOP! STOP! STOP! IN GOD'S NAME, PLEASE STOP IT!"

At the sound of the Uzumaki's voice, Aisha suddenly broke free of the murderous red haze that had blotted out her thoughts and stripped her of reason. Breathing hard, she looked down at what she'd done, eyes wide.

The only ones that could snap a Ctarl-Ctarl out of that blood-haze like that were...oh god! He was an Uzumaki?! He clan was going to go balistic over this! Turning to Sakura, Aisha glared.

"Members of my clan all have tiger in them, similar to those Inuzuka mutts and their dogs. You're lucky that my little friend Naruto saved your life, cause if he didn't, you would look like a piece of chewed and spit out bubble gum on the side of the road."

She backed away and medics started healing the injured cripple so Sakura didn't bleed out. Meanwhile, everyone gave the beast-girl a wide breath as she walked out of the village with her shrinkee.
15533321112222112.title: Brainless blossom vs Tiger Maiden

choices: Follow Aisha and Naruto as they go to the Ctarl-Ctarl Clan homeland
155333211122221122.content:
After Aisha's one sided fight with Sakura, she and Naruto began to head towards the home base of the Ctarl-Ctarl Clan but as they did two proud shrinkee oppressors were now heading towards the Hokage's tower with a look of determination on their faces as they both barged through the doors to Tsunade's office.

"Lady Hokage! This is an outrage! Just as my beautiful wife and I were on our daily walk, we had just saw a vicious beast-girl and her pet shrinkee savage viciously attack a girl for no good reason! This is exactly what we've been talking about for years and we demand for the immediate extermination of the shrinkee population of the entire village and that beast-girl's head and that savage pet shrinkee of her's be the first to go through the "shrinkeegeddon" project, NOW!" Kizashi Haruno yelled with his wife Mebuki Haruno by his side looking like she was crying when she was only faking it.

After seeing Aisha's "attack" they heard Naruto beg Aisha to stop and spar Sakura and they also heard everything what Aisha had said to Sakura.

After that, they made up there minds to offically disown Sakura as their child so they could save their reputation on the council and were already planning on making Sakura's replacement after they see both Aisha's and Naruto's deaths.

Tsunade frowned, and asked, "And why should I do that? I already know what really happened. So my question is why aren't you two with your daughter?"

"What daughter?" Kizashi and Mebuki asked, "Now do your duty as the Hokage and inact the Shrinkeegeddon project!" Kizashi said.

Tsunade's eyes flashed in rage and yelled, "ANBU! ARREST THESE TWO, THEN CALL FOR A VILLAGE-WIDE ASSEMBLY!"

In seconds, the two Harunos were wrestled to the ground with blades at their throats.

Tsunade glared. The Shrinkeegeddon project was going to be one of Danzo's most greatest achievements. It was going to drain all shrinkees in the village completely dry of their life force and transfer it into himself to not only restore his youth but also increase his own vitality, so basically, by continually using the Shrinkeegeddon project, Danzo would have been immortal as long as he had shrinkees to drain.

Fortunatly, it was one if the first things Tsunade had personally done away with after becoming Hokage...not like the Harunos knew that, however.

"Barking orders at your Kage and expecting they inact a complete genocide just because you demanded it...seems you shrinkee-oppressors have gotten too use to being power-drunk. Well that'll be fixed soon enough. I tried being fair and seeing you all change your ways for the better on your own. But after seeing that isn't possible. Now that you oppressors are too used to getting what you want, you think even the Kage are beneath you...your public executions will fix that!" Tsunade snarled.

"You can't do that Tsunade! This village will be NOTHING without us!" Kizashi yelled completely abandoning his manners before Tsunade.

"I should have known you shrinkee parasite supporters would do this! Damn you and those shrinkee Parasites, DAMN YOU ALL TO HELL!!! Danzo-Sama is the one true Hokage of this village, LONG LIVE DANZO-SAMA!!!" Mebuki Haruno screamed while she and her husband were being dragged to their respective cells.

"Lady Hokage, are you all right?" A anbu with long purple hair wearing a cat mask asked Tsunade in concern.

Tsunade looked at the anbu and said, "Yes cat, I'm fine infact I just thought of a new law, make a not of this, as of right now, from this day forward, any and all shrinkee oppressors are now crimnals guilty of treason, and any and all signs shrinkee mistreatment or abuse is an automatic death sentience to the ones responsible."

The anbu wrote all that down and gave it to Tsunade to look it over and smiled at the sight of it and said, "As of today, Konoha is gonna change it's reputation and we are going to help find a cure for the shrinkees and we will not rest until we have found it and cure every shrinkee we find."

As Naruto sat in his cage, he heard the bell ring announcing that customers had arrived and raised his head and saw a trio of wealthy looking people who he assumed were a family.

But what Naruto didn't know was that this family was not only very rich indeed, they weren't even from the Elemental Nations, but rather a foreign natiton that was on the other side of the world.

As it turned out, they had captured a former Konoha ninja that had been on the lands they called home by posing as humanitarians while their true nature was extremely vile and sadistic. When they heard of what happend in the Elemental Nations, they got on the fastest boat they had and set sail. Eager to see things for themselves.

As Naruto looked at the family, the one who drew his attention the most was the daughter, she was a young girl, with shoulder-length blonde hair, topped with a fluffy light blue accessory, and blue eyes, she was wearing a white long-sleeved shirt, with a light blue ribbon on her neck, above her shirt, she wore a sleeveless light blue dress, with a black bodice, and white frills, she wearing white boots.

She then saw Naruto and she and her family walked up to his cage and they all looked at him with interest.

They then saw the price for him and went to the petshop owner, and the mother asked, "Miss, my family and I are curious, why do you only have one shrinkee, a male, I might add, at such a high price?"

"Oh, well you see the reason is because all the other shrinkees at the shrinkee training facility died, and he is the only one left." The petshop owner explained.

"Well, I want him." The daughter said, then opened up her purse and emptied it out, dropping gold coins, small jewls and diamonds on the counter and the petshop owner's eyes widened at the sight and said without a moment's hesitation, "SOLD!"

Beaming, the girl went over to Naruto and he stood up and went near the bars until the daughter's hand came in and quickly grabbed him and yanked him out of the cage.
Hugging the shrinkee to her chest, she started twirling around like she was dancing, an almost utterly lovestruck

After the rich family purchased Naruto, the daughter then got a shrinkee collar and put it on Naruto's neck, along with getting him a pair of black leather breeches, a black leather jerkin, and black leather boots made for shrinkees, then they walked out of the village with smiles on their faces, and Naruto believed that maybe they were shrinkee supporters, until they all made it to the boat and set sail and the daughter (and Naruto's mistress as his owner) who Naruto learned was named Aria, made it to her room with Naruto in her hand and closed the door locking it, and placed rags in the bottom of it.

After what seemed like an eternity, Naruto had FINALLY finished all of Aria's undoable tasks, Naruto was glade that he was going to get his reward, even if it was just clothes.

Aria then looked at the clock as it rang for the new hour of the day and then she held Naruto up to her face and said, "Guess what time it is my little Lover? It's time for my dancing lessons!" Naruto let out a sigh of relief as Aria said that and that meant she would put him back in the jewelry box for two hours, until Aria said, "And today is a special day as you will be joining me from this day onward in my shoe as my insole!"

So I personally killed her! I DESERVE THAT HAIRSTYLE! I DESERVE EVERYTHING!!!!"

But before Aria could continue, the safe house door behind the dead girl soon burst opened and six figures then entered...

Naruto is a pure soul. He is a hero. He is willing to give his life for others. He does not deserve to suffer but he will.

Welcome to the story - the main character is Naruto and he will be abused. Pretty much anything goes however the story should mostly be about femdom. Story is written in the third person. Feel free to add. If you add I can give you GPs or add to your own story. :)
